Odehe, Peter, Jakob ar boni buphlung Johan buthu khe garhi de gibin saosi khe bo rikpha riya.
Jaira ni noh ha sohiba de subung buthu jiu gra laihi dongba khe Jisu nuhi ba.
Bo noh ha hapsing hi bonsi khe thi ba, Snadi jabani jiu gralai hi dong ba? Ansa de thihya, bode thuba se.
Bo ode thiba khe subung buthu minithai ba. Bo bonsi khe rikkhlai tharhi, ansa ni buma bupha ar boni yaohon rikphayarao gatham khe langpha hi ansa dongyaba ha bo hapsing ba.
Odehe, ansa ni yao rem dada, bo thi ba, Talitha kumi, boni ortho de Nandi, ning baija thiyaba se.
Boha ning bo baija hi hem lang la kha. Bo maithai jhigin ni ansa se. Ebo khe nuhi bonsi hamsi ning gmang lai ba.
Thikhabo, Jisu ebo grao khe saosi niha bo sainthiya mane magna ba, ode bo thi ba, Bo ne asaba jimane ri lah.
Jisu oraha ni phrang, boni yaohon rikphayarao jang, boni nolei ha thangphin ba.

Lenggo basain ha sunagog ha thanghi khrip subung buthu ne sling ri ba. Boni slingrithai khe khna hi, oraha dongyarao khrip bo gmang hi bonsi thi lai ba, Ebo subung la braha ni phrang grao mai ba? Bone riyaba ringthai snadi kho? Bede khlai hi bo gmang thaosisi khusi khe dang ba?
Ebo la Jakob, Josia, Juda ode Simon ni buphlung, Mari ni basa, mistri niya kho? Boni bahandao thu eraha dong ba niya kho? Odehe, bonsi bokhe hamjaoya kha.
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Jar ni nolei hade, hainthirao khe garhi de khrip habo gorasali khe man khlai re.
Khaisa subung limyarao ni saoha yao denghi ham riba khe garhi de, bo hathan ha gibin gibin gmang thaosisi khusi khede dang phuya.
Subung buthu bokhe lonya bani hamsi ning gmang ba.
Odehe, bo hathan ni nolei buthu ha Jisu thang hi, subung buthu khe sling ri ba.
Odehe, bo jhigin khe longthim hi, gini gini khlai hi haiha ba. Bo bonsi khe bese gusu buthu ni basao ha raothai rihi haiha ba.
Bonsi khe thi ba, Nisi thangba ha goda khe garhi de hon, juli, rang, musi khebo da lang pha.
Yaphadap ga lah, grang gin da lang phah.
Bonsi khe eleibo thi ba, Nisi khe sere noh ma thao ri du, oraha ni phrang baigoya hi, oraha ning dong lah.
Asaba habo nisi khe noh ha hap riya ar nisi ni grao khebo khnaya thikhade, oraha ni phrang baigo langba ha, bonsi mithi mane, nisi ni yapha ni haduri khe thisa khla lah.
Odehe, bonsi thang hi subung buthu khe khah phin mani grao khe sainthi ba.
Gabang bese gusu buthu khe rikkhlai hi limyarao sayarao khe khro ha thao huhi ham ri ba.

Jisu ni bumu khrip hathan ha gubblung tharba ni Raja Herod tharmai ba. Baptisma riyaba Johan githi ni phrang baija phin ba, odebani se gmang thaosisi khusi khe dang mane boniha raothai dongba thi hi lon ba.
Gibin subung thi bu du, Bo Elija se ode, sereba subung buthu thi bu du, Manang ni gorasalirao ni bising ha saosi ja nai du, thihi thi ba.
Herod bo grao khe khnahi thi ba, Johan ni bokhro khede ang ning dainso ri ba, bo githi ni phrang baija phinba se.
Herod jar ni buphlung Philip ni bihih Herodias khe noh jama jaya thihi Johan magna bani, Herod ning subung haiha hi, bokhe remhi, khah dada phatho ha jeb mani hukhum ri ba.
Johan ning Herod khe alang alang thi ba, Ning nini buphlung ni bihih khe noh dang jiba de dara ha giri.
Odebani khlai hi ning Herodias de Johan khe naisle hi bokhe sthaima baoba; thikhabo Herod ni khlai hi bo sthai phuya.
Herod de Johan khe subung gibi ar gathar thihi tharmai du ar khinbo khinhi bokhe naiso re. Boni grao sainthiyaba khe khusi hamba gabang dangba thihi khajahi khna re.
Yaohon thao ha Herod ni hajaiba basain sophai kha bani, boni rajini gedebarao ar siphaiyarao ni hojarao ode Galili raji ni gedebarao dongba si ne mel salai riba ha,
Herodi ni bisik phaihi bai ba. Bo Herod ar mel jiyarao khe khaja ribani Raja bokhe thi ba, Ning snadi khe nangjao du, sain lah, ninthane ang ri nang;
Ning asaba sainyaba khede raji gejer jakhabo ang ninthane ri nang, ode thihi boni ha bo smai dang ba.
Odehe, masainjik baigo langhi, jarni buma niha sing ba, Ang snadi khe sain ma?
Baptisma riyaba Johanni bokhro khe sain lah, thihi boni buma thiphin ba.
Boha bo mathla srap Raja niha thanghi thiba, Baptisma riyaba Johanni bokhro khe, khopra masi ha anthane deng riphaima ang nangjao du.
Raja khnahi hamsi ning khah ha waimu nang kha. Thikhabo, bo jang khamphayarao ni sagang ha grao hanggai hi smai dangba ni khlai hi, bo grao slaiphin phuya kha.
Odebani, Raja bokhe raokhiyaba siphaiya saosi khe Johan ni bokhro khe dainso hi mane phatho ha haiha kha. Ode bo thang hi, Johan ni bokhro khe dainso kha.
Odehe, boni bokhro khe khopra masi ha dikhu buhi mathla ni yao ha ri kha. Mathla jarni buma ne ri ba.
Johan ni rikphayarao khnaba jang phai dada, boni manggathi khe laphai hi mangkhlong ha phip ba.
Yaohon rikphayarao Jisu niha bojom japhai hi snadi khusi khe bonsi dangba ar sling ri ba, bokhe khna ri ba.
Subung thangyarao phaiyarao bang bani Jisu jang yaohon rikphayarao, makham jimane hajora maiya bani bonsi khe bo thi ba, Jing bokja lenggo phuma ne, tha jing gibin hathan ha thang nang.
Bonsi rungha ga dada siri siriyaba hathan ha thang la kha.
Subung gabangma bonsi thangba khe nuhi tharmai dada, nolei sersi giding ni noleisarao igah jang hemhi bonsi thane sagang sohi ba.
Jisu rung ni phrang baigoba ha, subung gabang githim laiba khe nuhi, melma raokhiya giri lai nu dada, bonsi khe khasao sisi jajao hi khasaoma ni grao khe sainthi hi bonsi khe sling ri ba.
Sainbli ja kha bani boni yaohon rikphayarao phai hi bokhe thi ba, Duha sainbli ja kha, ar ebo hathan de siri siriyaba hathan se.
Ebo hathan ni rogong buthu ha ar nolei phadain buthu ha jima lingma barai mane subung buthu khe haikhla ha, ode bonsi thi ba.
Bo bonsi khe thiphin ba, Nisi ning bonsi ne jima ri lah.
Bonsi bokhe singphin ba, Jing thanghi rang rja gin ni hon barai hi bonsi ne rima?
Jisu bonsi khe sing ba, Hon pher bislei nisi niha dong? Nai sang.
Bonsi nai hi tharmai bani, Hon pher bowa ar nah magin dong, ode thi ba.
Jisu subung buthu khe sam dubri ha bojom bojom kham ri mani, jarni yaohon rikphayarao khe sani ba.
Subung buthu rensi ha rjasi ar dan dan kham ri ba.

Odehe, Jisu hon pher bowa khe ar nah magin khe laha hi, nokhasao gede naikhu dada, hamthai ri ba. Ode, hon khe sbai hi, bonsi ne ron rimane yaohon rikphayarao khe sani ba ar nah magin khebo khrip ne ron ri ba.
Bonsi khripbo jiha si mai ji lai kha.
Odehe, honduri ar nah bo longkhai jhigin gablai si khonthim ba.
Hon jiyarao de, miyahrao gajah rjing bowa lai ja du.
Bo jar ning subung buthu khe haidahi dihkharnai ni ojang nar, Bethsaida nolei ha boni sagang ha thang mane yaohon rikphayarao khe rung ha srap gakhu ri ba.
Bonsi khe haiha bani yaohon ha, bo bih mane khlai hi hading ha thang ba.
Odehe, sari hade rung dih kharnai gejer ha dong ba, bode hakhong ha sao jang dong ba.
Boni yaohon rikphayarao dih kharnai ha hamsi ning bar meser phai bani rung jaophuyaba khe nuhi hamsi ning dukhu nangba.
Thikhabo, bonsi Jisu dih basaoha hemhi bonsini gede phaiba khe nuba jang, Sgo janai du thihi bonsi jirikkhao ba.
Bokhe nuhi bonsi khrip khin ba; thikhabo Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Waimu da nang, ang se, da khin.
Bonsi dongyaba rung ha Jisu bonsi jang gakhu pha kha. Ode, baryung ho thao kha, Boha bonsini bisingha gmang lai ba.
Bede thikhade, bonsi hon ni balam ni graokhe bo bonsini khah rao bani, bonsi mithi phuya kha.
Odehe, bonsi dih nar khe bailang dada Genesaret rajiha sophai ba, Odehe, rung khe dergong ha khathaohi deng ba.
Rung ni phrang akhai buba jang subung buthu bokhe thi ba.
Bo rajiha dongyarao, bo oraha dongba thihi tharmai ba jang khaibu thar hi, limyarao sayarao khe rih ha thu ri hi, bainbu dada boni ha phai ba.
Noleisa, noleima, phadain habo Jisu braha thang ba, hathai habo, limyarao sayarao khe labu hi, boni rih bergong khe dopha mani khlai hi boni ha biba. Dophayarao si khrip bo ham ba.
Jerusalem ni phrang Pharisairao ode Dara khe slingriyarao phai hi, Jisu ni sersi giding bojom ja ba.
Boni yaohon rikphayarao gejesi yao suyahi makham jiba khe nu ba.
Bede thikhade, Pharisairao ar Judasarao phagara magararao ni mani phabuba ni yao suyahi jiya lingya.
Hathai ni phrang phai khabo, dugruyahi jiya lingya ar gibin gibin damsru bela khopra susa mani dara dongba khe bonsi mani ba.
Odebani, Pharisairao ode Dara khe slingriyarao Jisu khe sing ba, Nini yaohon rikphayarao la jug jug manihi phaipha buyaba dara khe maniya hi yao suyahi makham jiba ling ba?
Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Isaia gorasali nisini basao ha jamaisiyarao thihi thi langba lai grao gibi ning. Bo reb ba lai-
Ebo jug ni subung buthude, khuh ha se ning angkhe man khlai ba,
Thikhabo, khah hade ani phrang gajain dong ba se.
Bonsi ni khlimthaibo haglai thiyaba gibi se
Bonsi de subungni dara khe
Ani dara lai sling ri re,
Nisi buthu Madai ni graothai khe dangkhlai hi subung ni dara khe se mani ba.
Odehe, bonsi khe thiba kho, Madai ni graothai khe dangkhlai hi jarni slingrithai khe bede sling ma bao ba?
Odebani, Moses graothai ri ba, Nini buma bupha khe man khlai lah, ode jarni buma bupha khe sijima ri re, bode sthaima nang ma.
Thikhabo, nisi la elei se thi lai re, Sere subung jarni buma bupha niha thi re, Nisi angkhe yaowai mane asaba ha dong khabo, ebo korban se, thi re. (Eboni ortho Madai niha yaophaba).
Nisi ni buma bupha khe juruya thikhabo musi bera giri.
Nisi slingriyaba grao jang nisi elei jang Madai ni dara khe dang re. Ode eleiyaba gibin gibin khusi nisi dangyaba bangbi kho.
Odehe, subung buthu khe Jisu longphin hi bonsi khe thi ba, Ani grao khe khna lah ar buji lah.
Baji ni phrang subung ni bising ha hapyaba de bokhe gusu khlai phuya. Thikhabo, subung ni bising ni phrang baigoyaba se bokhe gusu khlai re.
Subung buthu githim laiyarao ni phrang thanghi bo noh bising ha hap hi, bo jang boni yaohon rikphayarao ebo graoni balam khe sing ba.
Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Nisi bo olei jasosi ning mithiba giri na somo? Ebo khe nisi tharmaiya kho? Asalai thikhabo baji ni phrang subung ni bising ha hapyaba de bokhe gusu khlaiya.
Bede thikhade khah bising ha hap hi hoh bisingha hap dada, sao ni phrang baigo lang la re. (Odelai ning khrip jimu de ragao bi thihi Jisu sainthi ba).
Ode, Jisu thi lai ba, Subung ni khah bising ni phrang baigo buyaba se subung khe gusu khlai re.
Bo buthu subung ni bising ni phrang regethai baigo hi,
Ul jamani, khao jimani, sthai mani, malai ni bihih jang hamjao lai mani, harbao mani, rege mani, thokhi mani, gaora-gaori ja mani, hingsa ja mani, siji mani, ode sanggama gibir,
Ebo buthu khrip hamya khusi subung ni khah bising ni phrang baigo buhi, subung khe gusu khlai re.
Odehe, oraha ni phrang baigo langhi Jisu Tura ar Sidon haphai ha thanghi noh masiha hap hi donghi kha. Saosi jang bo mithi jaoya, thikhabo bo mithi jaoyahi dong phuya.
Masainjik saosi boni bisik khe bese gusu gajaoyaba, Jisu ni grao khe khnaba jang boniha phai ba, ode boni igah ha blip pha ba.
Bo masainjik de Jentailjik, Suria raji ni Phoiniki ha hajai ba. Bo jarni bisik ni sao ni phrang bese gusu khe rikkhlai mane Jisu khe khainsu ba.
Thikhabo, Jisu bo masinjik khe thiphin ba, Jarni basathu ni honkhe se laha hi sisa ne riba de majangya dou.
Bo masainjik thiphin ba, Gabra, grao de gibi se, thikhabo, basang bakhla ha honduri galaiyaba khe sisabo jidu thi.
Masainjik khe Jisu thiphin ba, Ebo grao khe thiphin bani khlai hi, ning thangphin lah, nini bisik ni sao bising ni phrang bese gusu baigo lang kha.
Bo noh ha thanghi boni bisik thuthan ha thuba khe nuhi ba. Boni bising ni phrang bese gusu gibi jang ning baigo lang kha.
Jisu Tura raji ni phrang thang hi, Sidon rajiha hapsing dada Galili dihkharnai ha sohi ba.
Boniha subung saosi nathong ar abbra jayaba khe labu ba, ode boni basaoha yao denghi bimane Jisu niha khainsu ba.
Odehe, Jisu bokhe subung buthu ni phrang sao jang langhi, boni yao jang yaosi jaosing hi, khudi thuphra hi boni slai khe giding ba.
Jisu nokhasao gede naikhu hi hangma sik dada, boni ha thi ba,
Boha ning, bo subung khmao khna phu kha. Ar boni abbrabo ham kha, ode graobo hamsisi jo phu kha.
Jisu subung buthu niha thi ba, Ebo grao khe saosi nihabo da sainthi, thihi magna ba, thikhabo baradao hi se sainthi ba.
Khnayarao si khripbo gmang ba. Bo olei khusi bislei hamsisi khlai hi dang ri ba, nathong khebo khna ri ba, ar abbra khebo grao jo riphu ba, thi hi bonsi gmang lai ba.
Khaisa yaohonha, subung buthu boni ha githim phai ba, ar ji mane giri bani, Jisu boni yaohon rikphayarao khe longha hi bonsi khe thi ba,
“Subung buthu ani ha nokha saintham dongma ja kha ode duha bonsi niha ji mane musi bo giri. Ang bonsi khe hamsi ning khasao du.
Bonsi khe ji riya hi noh ha haiha khade, lama ha hukhri jaohi mangsin nangma se. Bede thikhade, bonsi gejesi ha gajain ni phrang phai ba se.”
Boni yaohon rikphayarao bo niha sing ba, Ebo hathan la hajengling se, elei subung gabang khe ji rima ne jagothai braha ni phrang labu ma?
Jisu bonsi khe sing ba, Nisi niha hon pher bisi dong?
Hon pher sni dong, thihi bonsi thiphin ba.
Bo subung buthu khe hah ha kham mane sani ba. Hon pher sni khe lahahi hamthai ri dada, hon khe sbai hi, bonsi ne ron mane yaohon rikphayarao ni yao ha ri ba.
Nahsa gijisa dong ba, bo khebo hamthai rihi bonsi ne ron rima sani ba.
Subung buthu jiha si mai ji kha. Buduri haglaiyaba longkhai sni khonthim ba.
Subung buthu rjing bri lai ja du, odehe bonsi khe haithar ha kha.
Bo jarni yaohon rikphayarao jang baosi rungha gakhu hi Dalmanutha thiyaba rajiha bo sohi kha.
Pharisairao Jisu niha phaihi, Jisu jang niyalaiba, bokhe nainai mane bonsi boni ha sorgo ni sin khe smai ba.

Thikhabo, Jisu hamsisi khah ha hoihi, bonsi khe thi ba, Ebo jugni subung rao snabani gmang thaosisiyaba sin khe smai ba? Gibi jang ang nisi khe thi du, duha ni jug ni subungrao de gmang thaosisiyaba sin khe rijao nang niya.
Bonsi khe gar dada, bo rungha gakhu hi dihnar ha thang kha.
Boni yaohon rikphayarao hon jagothai langma blao ba. Hon do si mang mang se ning rungha bonsi niha dong ba.
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Pharisairao ar Herod dolni humao ni phrang girik hi nisi dong lah.
Boha bonsi Jini ha hon ning giri, thi hi baolei ba.
Jisu bonsi snadi khe sainlai ba khe mithi hi, bo bonsi khe sing ba, Nisi niha hon giri bani grao khe snadi jabani sainlai ba? Duhabo nisi mithiya kho? Nisi ni khah bislei rao du?
Nisi niha muthai la dong, thikhabo nisi nuba ringya; nisi niha khmao dong, thikhabo nisi khna ba ringya.
Subung buthu rjing bowa khe hon pher bowa jang sabaihi ji riba ha khamphlu bisi haglai ba?
Khamphlu jhigin bonsi thiphin ba.
Subung rjing bri ne hon pher sni khe sabaihi ji riba ha, haglaiyaba khamphlu bislei khon khu ba?
Bonsi thiphin ba, Khamphlu sni.
Ode jangbo nisi mithiya kho lao? bonsi khe thi ba.
Bonsi Bethsaida ha sophai ba. Oraha subung gana saosi khe boni ha labu ba, ode boni yaokhe dopha mane boniha bi ba.
Jisu bo muthai gana subung khe yao rem dada nolei ni baji ha lang ba, ode boni muthai ha khudi thuphra hi boni basaoha yao dopha ba, ode bokhe sing ba, Ning muthai nu phu kha?
Bo subung naikhuhi thi ba, Ah, subung khe nu du, thikhabo ang bonsi khe buphang hemba lai nu du.
Jisu boni muthai ha yao dophaphin ba, boha ning hamso kha, ode khrip khe ragao sisi naiphu kha.
Jisu bokhe, Nolei bising habo da hap phin, thihi magna hi bokhe haiha kha.
Jisu jang boni yaohon rikphayarao baigo langhi Kaisari Philipi haphai ni rogong ni nolei buthu ha thang ba. Lama ha boni yaohon rikphayarao khe sing ba, Subung buthu angkhe sere thihi thi du?
Khrip subung buthu thi ba, Ning de baptisma riyaba Johan se, gejesi thiba Elija se, gibin buthu de gorasalirao ni bisingha saosi se, olei thilai du, thihi bonsi thiphin ba.
Jisu bonsi khe sing ba, Nisi la angkhe sere thihi thi lai du?
Peter thiphin ba, Ning de Messia se.
Bo boni grao khe saosi niha bo sainthiya mane magna ba.

Jisu jarni yaohon rikphayarao khe sling ri ba, Marsi ni Basa de dukhu rijao ma, ode hojarao, Jonthairao ode Dara khe slingriyarao bokhe negar ma, bonsi bokhe sthaima, thikhabo saintham ha bo baijaphin ma.
Bo grao khe bonsi niha ragaosisi bo thi ri ba. Odebani Peter Jisu khe gibin ha lang hi jo ba.
Thikhabo, Jisu yaohon giding phinhi, boni yaohon rikphayarao ni gede nai dada, Peter khe jo ba, Ani phrang thang lah, Soithan, nini baothai Madai ni phrang niya.
Odehe, Jisu boni yaohon rikphayarao ode subung buthu githimyarao khe longthim hi thi ba, Sere angkhe rikpha ma nangjao re, jarkhe blaohi jarni kross khe bainhi ani yaohon rikpha thing.
Bede thikhade, sere jarni hayu khe sogo ma nangjao re, bo jarni hayu khe khma ma, sere ani khlai hi ode hamba graojma ni khlai hi jarni hayu khe ri khade, bo sogo jao ma se.
Subung khrip mulug khe maithar khabo, jarni hayu khe khma kha la, bo ne snadi lab jama kho? Musi lab ja nang niya kha.
Subung jarni hayu ni baslai musi khebo ri phuya.
Ebo phaphi jug, gaora gaori ni jug ha, sere ani grao khe laji re, Marsini Basa jarni Bupha ni muima jang ar sorgoni degla gatharrao jang phaiba hade, bo bokhe laji ma se.
Jisu thi ba, Ang gibi jang ning khe thi du, Madai ni raji ni raothai jang phaiba khe nuyasi thiyahi dongyaba eraha dongyarao ni bisingha dong.
Nokha sain do ni yaohon ha, Peter, Jakob ar Johan khe gibin langpha hi, hading khro ha thang ba. Oraha bonsi khe se ning langpha ba. Boha bonsi ni sagang ha ning, boni saogari slai langla kha.
Boni rih phinyaba phirthi ha rih suyaba thabo phu daohi ja ba.
Yaohon rikphayah gatham de Elija ar Moses Jisu jang sainlaiba khe nu ba.
Peter Jisu niha thi ba, Rabbi, eraha dongba jinthane hambi. Eraha jing khepsa grang tham slam nang; ning thane masi, Moses ne masi ar Elija ne masi.
Bonsi hamsi ning khin hi, musi thiphrang phuya ja ba.
Odehe, jimi baigo phai hi, bonsi khe khlip phung kha. Ode, jimi ni phrang khurang masi ede thi ba, Ebo ning ani hamdao thaoyaba basa se, boni grao khe khna lah.
Boha ning bonsi naiding ba; thikhabo, bonsi jang dongphayaba Jisu khe garhi de saosi khebo nuya.
Hading ni phrang akhai buba ha, bo bonsi khe thihi magna ba, Marsini Basa thih hi baija phinya side nisi snadi khe nuba bokhe saosi nihabo da sainthi, thi hi magna ba.
Ode, bo graothai riyaba khe mani ba; thikhabo, Thih hi baija phinma thiyaba graothai la snadi kho? thihi jarni bising ha sainlai ba.
Odehe, bonsi Jisu khe sing ba, Dara khe slingriyarao Elija phaida ma thihi snadi jabani thiba kho?
Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, “Khrip dongba si khe salai rima ne Elija de phaida ma ning; thikhabo, Madai ni laisi ha, snadi jabani Marsini Basa dukhu rijao ma, dangkhlai jaoma thihi reb ba kho?
Ang nisi khe thi du, Elija de phai blai kha. Boni balamha reb ba lai ning bokhe bonsi boni basaoha nangjaoba lai dang kha.”
Boni gibin rikphayasarao niha phaiphin ba ha, subung buthu gabang githim lai hi dong ba, ar Dara khe slingriyarao gejesi jang niyalaiba khe nu ba.
Subung buthu Jisu khe nuba jang, khrip bo gamang lai ba. Khaipha lang hi khripbo bo khe khlim ba.
Jisu boni yaohon rikphayarao khe sing ba, Snadi grao ni balamha nisi niyalai ba?
Subung githim laiyarao ni bising ha saosi bokhe thi ba, Slingriyasa, ang ani basa khe nini ha labu ba,

Bokhe asaba ha bese gusu remthai kha ning, bokhe hah ha lemkhlai du. Boni bukhuh ha khudi baigo du, ar hathai wai du, ode boni sao rao thethe ja du. Nini yaohon rikphayarao niha ang khainsu ba, thikhabo, bonsi bese gusu khe rikhlai phuya.
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Bislei lonma giri hi dong ma kho? Bislei sosi nisi jang ang dongpha phu nang kho? Bislei sosi nisi khe jon nang kho? Ansa khe aniha labu lah.
Bo ansa khe Jisu niha labu ba.
Jisu khe nuba jang ning bese gusu ansa khe hamsi ning dukhu rihi, hah ha galai ri dada, khudi baigohi bo baider ba.
Jisu ansani bupha khe sing ba, Ansa elei jaba bislei lao kha?
Ansa ni phrang thihi thiphin ba.
Alang alang bokhe wai ha, dih ha nesing hi bese gusu bokhe sthaima bao ba. Blai khade, ning jingkhe juru lah.
Jisu bokhe thi ba, Blai re, ning londu thikhade lonma gnang nede khrip japhu du.
Ansa ni bupha srap jirikkhao dada Jisu khe thi ba, Ang lon du, thikhabo ani lonma raoya. Lonso mane angkhe juru lah.

Subung buthu boni gede khai buba khe nuhi, Jisu bese gusu khe hukhum ri ba, Ning nathong abbra bese gusu, ansa ni bising ni phrang baigo mane ang ningkhe hukhum ri du. Boni bising ni phrang baigo lah, ar musi khalibo da hap phin si.
Odehe, bo ansa bol jang jirikkhao dada sao nerphai hi bese gusu baigo lang kha. Ode, ansa de githi lai jahi dong ba. Odebani, subung buthu thilai ba, Bode thih kha.
Thikhabo Jisu bo ansakhe rem dada baija ri ba, ode bo songkhu kha.
Jisu noh bisingha hap phinba ha, boni yaohon rikphayarao bokhe phirik phirik sing ba, Snadi jabani jing bese gusu khe rikhlai phuya ba?
Bo bonsi khe thi ba, Eleiyaba khede hoh khongja donghi, Madai biya khade, musi jangbo rikhlai phuya.
Jisu ode boni yaohon rikphayarao bo hathan khe gar hi, Galili raji khe bailang hi thang la kha. Bo braha dong ba, saosi jang bo mithi jaoma nangjaoya.
Bede thikhade, bo jarni yaohon rikphayarao khe elei slingri ba, Marsini Basa khe subungni yaoha yaopha jao ma, bonsi bokhe sthai ma, ode bo nokha saintham ha baijaphin ma.
Thikhabo, bo grao thiyaba khe bonsi mithi phuya, sing phinmabo bokhe khin du.
Bonsi Kapernaum ha sophai hi noh ha hapbani yaohon ha, Jisu jarni yaohon rikphayarao khe sing ba, Nisi lama ha snadi grao khe niyalai ba?
Thikhabo, bonsi boni ha thiphin raoya. Lamaha bonsini bising ha sere dedao ja ma thilaiba ni grao ha bonsi niyalai ba.
Jisu kham dada, jarni yaohon rikphayarao jhigin khe long hi, thi ba, “Asababo sagangthao jama nangjao khade, bo khrip subung yaohonthao ja nang, ode khrip subung ni dangyasa jahi dongma nang ma se.”
Odehe, bo ansa saosi khe bonsini bising ha song ri ba. Bo ansa khe bam hi, bonsi khe thi ba,
Sere ani bumu ni khlai hi ebo ansa ni bising ha saosi khe lamjao re, ang khe se bo lamjao ba; odehe sere ang khe lamjao re, angkhe haihayaba khe se bo lamjao ba.
Johan bokhe thi ba, Slingriyah, subung saosi nini bumu jang bese gusu buthu khe rikkhlai ba jing nu ba, bo jing jang rikphaya bani jing bokhe magna ba.
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Bokhe da magna lah. Sere ani bumu jang gmang thaosisiyaba khusi dang re ang khe sijiya.
Sere jing jang nanglaiya, bode jini gede gaba ba se.
Gibi ning ang nisikhe thi du, nisi ani subung jabani, sere nisi ne dih bela masi mang mang bo ri re, gibi jang ning yaosandi mai nang.
Sere asababo angkhe lonhi khasi-daothaorao ni bisingha saosi khuda ri khade, boni gornaha mairong honkhliyaba longthai gedeba khe khah dada sagorha dangsing ba boni khlaihi hamdao.
Ode, nini yao jang doda ri khade, nini yaokhe dainso khla lah. Yao gonggin donghi norok waikhor thiyayaba ha thangba thanede, yao gongsi donghi hayuha thangba ningthane hamdao.
Norokni yungde thithaoya, waibo thithaoya.
Odehe, nini igah ning khe khuda rikha de, dainso khla lah. Igah gonggin jang norok ha thangba thane igah khora jahi hayuha hapba ninthane hamdao.
Norokni yungde thithaoya, waibo thithaoya.
Odehe, nini muthai ningkhe doda ri re thikhade, bokhe khaikho lah. Muthai thaigin jang norok ha thangba thane muthai thaisi jang Madai ni rajiha thangba ninthane hamdao.
Orahani hathan hade yungde thithaoya ar waibo thithaoya.
Bede thikhade, sem jang bandai riba ha thar riba lai khrip subung khe wai jang ragao rima se.
Sem hambi, thikhabo boni brabyaba gma kha la, bede khlaihi bokhe brab riphin ma? Nisi ni bisingha sem nangsmaiba lai saosi jang saosi nisi milihi dong lah.
Odehe, bo oraha ni phrang baigo lang hi, Jordan dihbu bailang hi Juda raji ha thang ba. Boha subung buthu boniha githim phaiphin ba, ode nalai lai ning bonsi khe slingriphin ba.
Pharisaorao gejesi boniha phai dada bokhe nainai mane sing ba, Subung jarni bihih jang gaolei mane jini dara ha dong?
Jisu bonsi khe thiphinhi sing ba, Moses nisi ne bede dara ri ba?
Bonsi thiphin ba, Subung jarni bihih ne gaolei mani laisi reb hi bokhe haiha phudu thihi Moses dara galang ba.
Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Nisi ni khah rao bani khlaihi se Moses elei reb ba.
Jenba ha elei niya. Habsao sangsai jenba ni phrang Madai jar ning bonsi gini khe miya masainjik slam ba thihi laisi gathar ha reb du.
Odebani khlai hi, subung de jarni buma bupha khe garlang hi bihih jang gathaisi dong ba,
Odehe, bonsi gini niyahi saomang masi ja kha.
Odebani Madai sere khe saomang masi slamyaba khe subung da gaolei ri thing.
Odehe, bonsi noh ha hap bani yaohonha yaohon rikphayarao Jisu niha ebo graoni balam khe sing ba.
Bo bonsi khe thi ba, Asaba bo jarni bihih khe garhi gibin masainjik jang noh japhin khade, bo subung jarni bihih ne khlai hi gaori ja ba se.
Masainjik bo jarni basai khe garhi gibin miyah jang noh japhin khade, bo masainjik jarni basai ni khlai hi gaori jaba se.
Odehe, subung buthu gejesi ansarao khe Jisu niha yao dopha mane labu ba, odebani boni yaohon rikphayarao bonsi khe jo ba.
Thikhabo, Jisu ebo khe nuhi hamsi ning jajaoya ba. Odebani bonsi khe thi ba, ansarao khe ani ha haiha lah, bonsi khe da mathao. Bede thikhade Madaini raji de elaiyaba subung buthu ni se.
Sere ansarao lai Madaini raji khe hamjaoba lai hamjaoya khade Madaini raji ha hap mai nang niya.
Odehe, ansarao khe bam hi, bonsini basaoha yao deng hi hamthai ri ba.
Jisu bo lama gede thang mane baigoba ha subung saosi boni gede khaibu hi boniha yasgu thuhi sing ba, Hamba slingriyaba, bede khlai hi ang thaoglao ni hayu mai phu ma?
Jisu bokhe thi ba, Snadi jabani angkhe hamba thi ba? Madai khe garhi de saosi bo hamba giri.
Dara disa khe ning mithi du thi; Malai khe da sthai, gaora gaori da ja, malai khe da thokhi bai, buma-bupha khe man khlai lah.
Bo subung thiphin ba, Slingriyah, ansa ni phrang ebo Dara disa khe ang mani hi phai ba.

Jisu bokhe nai dada khasao sisi nu hi bokhe thi ba, Nini masi thao du kho. Ning thanghi nini dongbasi khe phain tharhi, dukhi sarao ne ri lah, odese ning sorgoha don bangdaohi mai nang, ode ani yaohon rikpha lah.
Bo grao khe khnahi bo subung waimu nang hi thang la kha, bede thikhade bo subung gnang se.
Jisu boni yaohon rikphayarao khe naiding dada thi ba, Gnang subung ni khlai hide Madai ni raji ha hap ba du bi.
Bo ode thiba khe khna hi boni yaohon rikphayarao gmang ba. Thikhabo, Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Ani ansarao, Madaini rajiha hap ba bislei du du,
Gnang subung Madaini rajiha hap ba thane mihhajeng simi ni buphu ha hap ba laidao.
Ebo khe khna hi, boni yaohon rikphayarao hamsi ning gmang hi bokhe sing ba, Olei thikhala, sere sogojao ma kho?
Jisu bonsi khe naiding dada thi ba, Subung ni khlai hide du bi, Madai ni khlai hide lai bi. Bede thikhade, Madai ni khlai hide khrip khusi khe blai du.
Peter boniha thi ba, Nai lah, khripbo dangkhlai thar dada jing ningkhe rikpha kha.
Jisu bokhe thiphin ba, Gibi jang ang nisi khe thi du; sere ani khlai hi, ode hamba graojma ni khlaihi jarni noh ar bada buphlung, bubi bahandao, buma-bupha, basa-bisik khebo dangkhlai re,

Ode, jarni hadi hadam khe garhi ebo habsao ha thanghi dongba ning bo bangdaohi mai nang. Ar bada-buphlung, bubi bahandao, buma-bupha, jarni bihih, basa bisik ar hadi hadam phantha rjasi barahi mai nang. Ode, dukhu hadi rijaoba khe bo goron nang, ar phaiginyaba bubliha thaoglao ni hayu mai nang.
Thikhabo, subung sagangthao dongyarao yaohonthao dong ma, yaohonthao dongyarao sagangthao dong ma se, ode bo thi ba.

Jisu ode boni yaohon rikphayarao Jerusalem gede lamaha thang la ma. Jisu yaohon rikphayarao ni sagang thang bani bonsi gmang ba. Boni khlaihi bonsi khin ba, ar subung yaohon rikphahi phaiyaba bo khin ba. Jisu jarni yaohon rikphayarao jhigin khe gibin gede langpha hi, bo jarni basaoha sophai ginyaba khe sainthi da ba.

Bonsi khe thi ba, Nai lah, jing Jerusalem gede thang du. Oraha Marsini Basa khe Jonthairao niha ode Dara khe slingriyarao niha yaopha ma, sthai mane bonsi bokhe bisar khlai dada Jentailrao niha yaopha ma.
Bonsi bokhe mlaothai ma, khudi thuphra ma, su ma ar sthai ma. Thikhabo nokha sainthamha bo baijaphin ma.
Odehe, Jakob ar Johan, Zebedai ni basa thu gini Jisu niha phaihi boniha thi ba, Slingriyah, jinthane khusi masi ning dang mane jing nangjao du.
Jisu bonsi gini khe sing ba, Snadi khusi dang rima nangjao ba?
Bonsi thiphin ba, Nini muima ni rajiha ning Rajani khamthan ha kham khali de saosi khe nini yaoda gede ode, saosi khe nini yaosi gede kham ri mane jing nangjao du.
“Nisi sainyaba khede nisi mithiyaba se. Dukhu ni bela, ang lingginyaba ha nisi lingphu nang? Ang maiginyaba baptisma khe nisi mai phu nang”?
Bonsi thiphin ba, Jing mai phu nang.
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, “Gibi ning ang lingyaba bela ha nisi lingphu nang; ang maiginyaba baptisma khe nisi mai nang;
Thikhabo, ani yaoda ar yaosi gede kham rimane ang saikho phuya. Madai sere ne salai hi deng ba, bonsi ne bo ri nang”.
Gibin rikphayarao jhi khnahi Jakob ode Johan ni basao ha thamsi baigo ba.
Thikhabo, Jisu bonsi khe longhi thi ba, Jentailrao ni bising ha, bonsi khe naisoyarao Rajarao lai bonsi ni raothai jang bonsi yaowai du thihi nisi mithi du.
Nisini bising hade olei ja nang niya. Sere asababo nisi ni bisingha dedaothao jama nangjao re thikhade, bo nisi khrip ni dangyasa jahi dongma nang ma se.
Sere nisini bising ha sagangthao jama nangjao khade, khrip subung ni leng jahi dongma nang ma se.
Bede thikhade, Marsini basa bo dangjaoma ne phaiya; bode dang mane se phai ba, ode gabang subung khe sogo hi jarni hayu khe ri mane se phai ba.

Odehe, Jeriko ha sophai hi boni yaohon rikphayarao jang subung gabang buthu Jeriko raji ni phrang baigo bu ba. Ar subung gana saosi yao khrang jiyaba, Timai ni basa Bartimai bo lama bijingha khamhi dong ba.
Bo Nazareth Jisu thihi tharmai ba jang, jirikkhao hi thi ba, Jisu David ni Basa, ning angkhe khasao lah!
Gabang subung bokhe johi phirik phirik dong mane sani ba. Thikhabo, bak jadaohi jirik khao ba, David ni Basa, ning angkhe khasao. ode thi ba.
Jisu songthao hi thi ba, Bokhe eraha long hah.
Odebani, bonsi gana subung khe long ba, Khajahi ning bai ja, bo ningkhe long du.
Bo jarni rih khe garbuhi, baijlom dada Jisu niha phai ba.
Jisu bokhe sing ba, Ninthane snadi ang dang ma nangjao ba?
Rabbi, ang muthai numa nangjao du, thihi bo thiphin ba.
Odehe, Jisu bokhe thi ba, Ning thang lah, nini lonma jang ningkhe ham ri kha.
Boha ning bo nuphu kha, ode Jisu jang rikpha kha.
Jerusalem rogongha bo naiso phai dada, Oliv hading ha Bethphage jang Bethani nolei rogong ha bonsi sohi dada, boni yaohon rikphayarao ni bising ha subung gini khe bo haiha ba.

Bonsi gini khe thi ba, Nisi ni sagang gede dongyaba noleiha thang lah. Nisi oraha sohi ba jang mihleng ni basa, boni basaoha saosi bo gaba giriyaba khahi dongba khe nisi nu nang, bokhe khruhi labu lah.
Ode, malai nisi khe snadi jabani khru ba thihi sing khade, Gabra nangjao du thihi thi lah, ar sangga ning digar phaiphin nang, thi ha lah.
Odehe, bonsi gini thangba de daoglap baji nolei bising ni lama ha mihleng basa khe khahi deng ba nuhi kha, ode bonsi khru kha.
Oraha songhi dongyarao ni bisingha saosi sing ba, Snadi jabani mihleng basa khe khruba?
Jisu bonsi gini khe saniba lai thiphin ba, odebani bonsi haiha kha.
Odehe, mihleng basa khe siklang hi Jisu niha lang ba. Ode, mihleng basa ni basao ha rih yen rihi Jisu kham ba.
Gabang subung buthu, jarni rih khe lama ha yenpha lang ba. Ode, gibin subung buthu phadain ni sam bedeb dainhi yenpha lang ba.
Odehe, sagang gede thangyarao ar yaohon gede rikphayarao, Hosanna, Gabrani bumu jang phaiyaba de bakhan ja thing!
Jini bupha David ni raji phaiginyaba man jahi dong thing! Judaothao ha Hosanna! thihi jirikkhao du.
Odehe, Jisu Jerusalem ha sohi dada, bikhoh ha thang ba. Ode bo khrip gede naiding ba. Thikhabo, sainbli ja kha bani boni yaohon rikphayarao jhigin khe langpha hi Bethani ha thang ba.
Boni dakhna ni basain ha Bethani ni phrang baigo langba ha, Jisu makham hukhri jao ba.
Bo gajain ni phrang thaikhrao phang, balai gnang khe nubani, bathai mai nang thihi bo smai mane thang ba. Thikhabo, balai khe garhi de gibin musi khebo nuya. Bede thikhade bathai thaiblibo jaya kho.
Odebani Jisu thaikhrao phang khe thi ba, Musi khalibo, duha ni phrang saosibo nini bathai da maiji thing.
Ar boni yaohon rikphayarao bokhe khna kha.

Bonsi Jerusalem ha sophai baha, Jisu bikhoh ni bisingha hap ba. Ode, oraha ni jinis phainyarao baraiyarao khe rikkhlai thar ba ar rang slaiyarao ni basang jang daophri phainyarao ni khamthan khe khublip thar ri ba.
Okhali ni phrang saosi khebo jinis phain ma labu riya kha.
Odehe, bo bonsi khe sling riba, Ani nohde khrip jadini khlai hi bih mani noh thijao ma thihi sastro ha reb du; thikhabo, nisi la makhaorao ni longkhip slam ba kha.
Jonthaima jang Dara khe slingriyarao ebo grao khe khnahi, Jisukhe sthai mane balam smai ba. Thikhabo bonsi bokhe khin ba, bede thikhade, subung buthu boni slingrithai khe gmang ba.
Sainbli japhaiba ha, Jisu jang boni yaohon rikphayarao nogor ni phrang thang la kha.
Boni dakhna ni phorong nokha nai hi, lamaha bonsi hem langbaha, thaikhrao phang ni yader sosi rainlangba khe bonsi nu ba.
Peter wainso hi boniha thi ba, Nai sang, Rabbi, ning sariyaba thaikhrao phang de rain kha.
Jisu thiphin ba, Madai khe lon lah.
Ang gibi jang nisikhe thi du, asababo jarni khah ha lonsoya jayahi ebo hading khe degao langhi sagor ha galai sing mane thi re thikhade, olei ning jama se.
Odebani, ang nisi khe thi du, asaba khe nisi Madai bihi sain re thikhade, mai kha thihi bao lah, odese mai ma.
Ar nisi bi mane songbaha malai asababo nisini basao ha gajai riyaba khe map khlai lah, ode ning nisini bupha sorgoha dongyababo nisini gajai khe map khlai nang.
“Nisibo malai ni gajai khe map khlaiya khade, sorgoni nisini buphabo nisini gajai khebo map khlai nang niya,” thihi bo thi ba.
Jerusalem ha bonsi phaiphin ba. Jisu bikhoh ni bisingha daoding baha, Jonthaimarao jang Dara khe slingriyarao ar Khraorao boni ha phaihi bokhe sing ba,
Ebo khusi buthu khe dang mane hukhum sere ninthane ri ba?
Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Angbo nisi khe grao masi sing nang, nisi thiphin phu re thikhade, sereni hukhum jang ang khusi dang ba, bokhe ang thi nang.
Baptisma riyaba Johan la sorgo ni phrang na subung ni phrang angkhe thiphin sang?
Bonsi jarni bisingha sainlai ba. Sorgo ni phrang jing thi khade, bo snadi jabani boni grao khe lonyaba? thi bu nang,
Subung ni phrang jing thi khade jing subung buthu khe khin du; bede thikhade Johan khe khrip subungbo gibi gorasali thihi mani ba.
Odebani Jisu khe thiphin ba, Jing mithiya.
Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Ode thikhade angbo sereni hukhum jang ebo khusi buthu khe dang ba, ang sainthiya.
Odehe, Jisu bonsi niha daogari jang grao sainthi ba, Subung saosi grep ni bari dang ba. Ar sersi giding bari khe khading hi grep sep mane hakhorbo khu ba.
Grep min dada, khao mane basain sophaiba ha, jarni phantha khe mai mane bo jarni leng saosi khe khusi dangyarao niha haiha ba.
Khusi dangyarao bo leng khe rem dada, dohi suhi yao khongja jang haiphin ha ba.
Bubra gibin leng khe phin haiphin ha ba. Khusi dangyarao boni bokhro ha do dada bokhe laji phnu ba.
Bubra gibin leng khe haiha ba. Bonsi bokhe sthai ba, ode gabang lengraoni basao habo olei ning dang ba, ode gejesi khe doba suba ar sthai ba.
Yaohonthao ha, boni mayani basa saosi, mang mang se ning dong si ba. Ani basa khede bonsi man khlai nang thihi bao dada bokhe haiha ba.
Thikhabo, khusi dangyarao sainlai ba. Bubrani basa ebo ning don maiginyaba se, bokhe jing sthaihi bari khe jini ja thar la nang.
Odehe, bokhe sthai dada, grep bari ni bajiha dangkhlai ba.
“Bonsi olei khlai kha la, barini bubra phai hi snadi khlai nang?” ode thi dada Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Bubra phai dada subung buthu khe sthaihi bo bari khe gibin khusi dangyarao niha nepha ma se.
Ebo Madai ni laisi ni graokhe nisi phuriya?
Noh dangyarao nangjaoya hi dangkhlaiya ba longthai de
nang daothaoyaba longthai ja kha.
Ebo ning Gabra dangyaba khusi
Jini khlaihi de gmang thaosisiyaba se.

Bo daogari grao khe Judarao ni hojarao khna hi bonsini balam ha thiyaba thihi tharmai ba, ode Jisukhe rem ma bao ba. Thikhabo, bonsi subung githim laiyarao khe khin ba. Odebani bokhe garhi thang la kha.
Grao jobaha remphu mani khlaihi gejesi Pharisairao ar Herod ni dol ni subung gejesi Jisu niha haiha ba.

Bonsi boniha phaihi thi ba, Slingriyah, ningde gibi subung se. Saosi khebo bera khlaiya thihi jing tharmai du, ode saosi khebo dangkhlai daoya. Madaini grao khe hamsisi sling ri du. Jingkhe thi lah, Kaisar niha khajna riba la Dara ha dong na giri? Jing rima na riya?
Bonsini khah nainaiba khe Jisu tharmai hi bonsi khe thiphin ba, Snadi jabani angkhe khah nainai ba? Aduli bakhrai khe labuhi angkhe phnu sang.
Ode, bonsi aduli labu ba. Jisu bonsi khe sing ba, Ebo la sereni saogari ar sereni bumu?
Kaisar ni bonsi thiphin ba.
Odebani Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Olei jakha de, Kaisarni khede Kaisar ne ri lah, ar Madaini khe Madai ne ri lah.
Ar bonsi Jisukhe hamsi ning gmang kha.
Boha, gejesi Saddukairao, subung thihba ni yaohonha baijaphinba giri thiyarao, Jisu niha phaihi bokhe thi ba,

“Slingriyah, subung asababo basa bisik maiyahi thih re thikha la, boni buphlung boni bihih khe noh jama nang ma, odehe, bo boni bada ne khlai hi ansarao mai ri nang thihi Moses jinthane dara masi reb hi ri ba.
Khaphlung sni dong ba. Bonsini bisingha raodao thaoyaba noh ja dada, basa bisik maiyahi thih kha.
Gididaoyaba bo boni bihih khe noh ja ba. Bobo basa bisik maiyahi thih kha. Bo tha gididaoyaba bo olei ning ja ba.
Ode, bonsi khrip khaphlung snibo bo masainjik jang noh jahi, sasik maiyahi thih thar kha, ar yaohonthao ha bo masainjik bo thih kha.
Ode thikhala baija phinbani basain ha sereni bihih ja nang? Khaphlung sni khripbo bokhe noh ja kha.”
Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Nisini baothai de bao gajai se. Madaini laisini grao khe ar Madaini raothai khe nisi mithiya bani se.
Subung githirao baijaphinba hade sorgoni deglarao lai bonsi ja nang, noh ja nang niya kha.

Ode, githirao baijaphin bani grao hade, Moses ni laisi ha suphrip bejeng ha jingyaba waislai ni grao khe nisi phuriya? Ang ning Abraham ni Madai, Isak ni Madai ar Jakob ni Madai thihi sainlaiyaba rebba dong.
Bo ning thanghi dongyarao ni Madai se, githirao ni Madai niya. Nisi de bao gajai ba se!

Dara khe slingriyaba saosi bonsi grao sainlaiba khe khna hi bo oraha dongba. Ar Saddukairao khe ragaosisi khlai hi thiphinba khe nu ba, ode bo Jisu niha phai dada bokhe sing ba, Dara disa ni bisingha nangdao thaoyaba dara snadi?
Jisu bokhe thiphin ba, Khrip tha muima jadao thaoyaba de ebo se: O Israelrao, khna lah, Gabra jini Madai de Gabra masi se ning.
Ning nini khah muh jang, nini bese jang, nini khahsu jang, nini raothai jang, nini Gabra Madai khe hamjao ma nang du.
Boni yaohonha de, ning jarkhe hamjao ba lai ning, nini noharirao khebo hamjao lah. Ebo thane grao riyaba dedaohi gibin giri kha.
Dara khe slingriyah Jisukhe thi ba, Slingriyah, ning gibi ning thi kha! Ning thiba lai ning Gabra khe ning Madai se, bokhe garhide ar gibin Madai giri.

Odebani subung de Madai khe khah jang muh jang, khahsu jang, raothai jang, hamjao ma nang re. Ode jar khe hamjao ba lai ning jarni noharirao khebo hamjao ma nang du. Daomi jang gibin gibin dara jang Madai huba thane ebo dara magin khe mani ba nangdaothao.
Odebani bo girik hi thiphinba khe Jisu tharmai hi boniha thi ba, Madaini raji ni phrang ning de gabang jainya.
Eboni yaohon hade, Jisukhe gibin grao saosibo sing raoya kha.
Jisu Madaikhoh ha sling ribaha bonsi khe sing ba, Messiah David ni basa se thihi Dara slingriyarao bede thiphu ba?
Bese Gathar jang David grao johi thi ba, Gabra, ani Gabra niha thi ba, nini sotrurao khe nini igah ni bakhla ha ang dengya side, ning ani yaoda gede kham lah,
David jar ning bokhe Gabra thihi long ba, ode thikhala bedehe Messia David ni basa japhu ma kho?
Gabang subung Jisu ni grao khe khaja hi khna ba.
Bo bonsi khe sling ribaha bonsi khe thi ba, Dara slingriyarao ni phrang girik lah. Bonsi sola galao galao thuhi daobai ma nangjao re, ar hathai ha man khlai jaoma nangjao re.
Ode, bonsi sunagog buthu ni melha bo khamthan hamdao ha kham ma nangjao re;
Bonsi, banjikrao ni rang khe ji re, ode subung buthu khe thokhi mane budu galao Madai bi re. Bonsi hamyadao hi saja mai ma se!
Odehe, Jisu Madai khoh ha rang dengyaba khaojeb gabasi ha khamba ha subung buthu oraha khrangphain riba khe bo nuba. Gnangrao gabang khrangphain ri ba.
Boha, banjik dukhisa saosi phaihi paisa magin dangsing ba.
Jisu boni yaohon rikphayarao khe longthim hi thi ba, Ang nisikhe thi du, khrip thane ebo banjik dukhisa bangdao hi dangsing kha.
Bede thikhade gibin subung buthu de, bonsi niha gabang dongyaba ni phrang se ri ba. Thikhabo bode dukhisa jakhabo, thanghi dongmane boniha dongyaba si khe rithar ba.
Jisu Madaikhoh ni phrang baigo bani yaohon ha boni yaohon rikphayarao ni bising ha saosi bokhe thi ba, Nai lah, slingriyah, ebo noh ode longthai buthu de bisi majang du.
Jisu thiphin ba, Ebo noh gedeba khe nisi nu du? Longthai masi mang mang bo grungya hi dong nang niya; khrip longthai buthu grungya hi dong nang niya.
Jisu Madaikhoh gede sagang hi Oliv hading ha khamhi dong ba. Peter, Jakob ar Andria boniha phirik phirik phaihi sing ba,
Ebo buthu la bakhali ja nang, ning jinthane sainthi lah. Ode, bo buthu sophaima kha thihi phnu mani sin snadi japhai nang?
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Saosi bo nisi khe thokhiya mane girik lah.
Gabang subung Krista ang ning thihi ani bumu lahi phaima se, ar gabang subung khe thokhi nang.
Ode, jbah jang jbah ni grao gublungyaba khe nisi khna hi nisi da gmang. Bo buthu de sophaima ning, thikhabo jamma nede niya kho.
Jadi gibin jang jadi gibin jbah ja nang, raji gibin jang raji gibin jbah ja nang, hathan gibin gibin ha banglama phai nang, asari galai nang. Bo buthu de sao go mane saba lai se ja ma se.
“Odebani, nisi mirik hi dong lah. Nisi khe remhi bisardar niha lang nang. Hamba graojma khe sainthi mane nisi ani bumu ni khlai hi hojarao ar Rajarao ni sagang ha song nang.
Thikhabo, yaohonthao ni basain sophaiya sani sagang ha, hamba graojma khe sainthi ma nang ma.

Ar nisi remjao hi nisi khe bisar khoh ha lang khabo, snadi grao khe thi ma thihi nisi waimu da nang. Bo bubli sophai baha, snadi grao khe ning thi ba, bo nisini grao niyahi, Bese Gathar ni phrang phaiyaba grao ja ma.
Subungrao jarni bada-buphlung khe rem ri nang, odelei ning bupha jarni ansarao khe rem ri nang, ansarao bo jarni bupha khe sthai nang.
Ani khlai hi khrip bo nisi khe naisle nang. Thikhabo, yaohonthao sosi sere khah lao nang, bo se ning sogo jao ma se.”
Khinthaosiyaba boni songthan niyayaba hathan ha songba khe nisi nu nang. Sere phuri re ebo khe mithi thing. Boha de Judai rajiha dongyarao, bonsi hading gede khai la thing.
Sere noh khim saoha dong, musi jinis khe bo la mane da nakhai thing.
Ode, phadain ha dongyarao bo jarni rih khe laphai mane noh ha da phaiphin thing.
Sao khonggin jayarao ar nana gnangrao ni khlai hi bo basain buthu hade gabang dukhu ja ma.
Odebani, maisingha jaya mane Madai niha bi lah.
Bede thikhade, bo basain ni dukhu de Madai sangsai jenba ni phrang duha sosi musi khali bo jaya kho, ar jabo ja nang niya kha.
Bo basain buthu khe Gabra songthe daoriya thikhade subung saosibo thanghi dong nang niya. Bo jarne saikhoyarao ni khlai hi bo basain buthu khede songthe ri ma se.
Okhali ha asababo nisi khe thi nang, Nai lah, Messiah eraha dong ode oraha dong thi re thikhade bokhe da lon lah.
Bede thikhade Krista mosolrao ode gorasali mosolrao baigo nang, bonsi gmang thaosisi sin phnu hi khusi dang nang. Blai khade saikho jaoyarao khebo thokhiphu mani khlai hi khusi dang ma se.
Nisi de girik hi dong lah, bo basain phaiya sani sagang ha nisi ne khrip khe bo sainthi kha.
Bo dukhu ni basain ni yaohon hade sainbo andar ja lang la nang; ar dainbo jna nang niya kha.
Nokhasao ni phrang sathrai buthu garai nang ar nokhasao ha raothai buthu smao nang.
Okhali ni basain hade Marsini Basa, raothai gedeba ar muima jang jimi ha phaihi nujao nang.
Boni yaohonha mulug grongbri ha habsao thaothan sosi, boni deglarao khe haihahi bo jar saikhoyarao khe bojom khlai ma se.
“Thaikhrao phang ni phrang daogari nai hi nisi sling lah. Boni boso ridim hi balai gili baigo phai kha ning jalang japhai kha thihi nisi tharmai du
Odelai ning, nisi bo buthu sophaiba khe nu kha ning, bo phaima ni bubli sampha kha ar derga kholei ha songphai kha thihi tharmai lah.
Ebo buthu sophaiya side duha thanghi dongyarao khripde thihthar nang niya thihi wainso lah.
Habsao ar nokhasao jam lang nang, thikhabo ani graothai de jam nang niya.”
Thikhabo, bo basain ar bubli khede Bupha khe garhide sorgoni deglaraobo, ar Basabo, saosibo mithiya.
Nalaibo girikhi salaihi bi dada dong lah, bede thikhade bo basain ar bubli khe nisi mithiya.
Subung saosi jarni lengrao niha khusi dang mane nephahi ar derga naisoyaba khe bo girikhi dong mane sani dada, jarni noh khe garlang hi hah gajain ha thang la ba lai se.
Odebani, nisi grik hi dong lah, noh bubra bakhali sophai phin ma, sainbli habo ja la phu re, hor habo ja la phu re, daono gisi habo ja la phu re, phorong habo ja la phu re, nisi mithiya.
Ode niyakha la srap phaiphin khade, nisi thuhi dongba khe bo nu nang.
Snadi grao khe ang nisi niha sainthi ba, khrip niha ang sainthi ba se, girik hi dong lah.
Baiglaini mel ar humao giriyaba honni melni sain gin sagang ni basain ha, Jonthaimarao ar Dara khe slingriyarao Jisu khe phirik phirik remhi sthai mane lama smai ba.
Bonsi thi ba, Mel basain hade da ja thing, niyakhala, subung buthu nam khlai la phu re.

Bethani nolei ha Jisu khunthi jayaba subung saosi, Simon ni noh ha makham jihi kham ba. Masainjik saosi thao midim dam duyaba alabastar bithol gablai si labu hi phai ba. Bo bithol khe dokhrip dada thao midim khe Jisu ni bokhro ha lukhru ba.
Thikhabo, oraha dongyarao gejesi thamsi baigohi thi lai ba, Snadi jabani bo thao midim khe khma ba?
Aduli rjatham thane bangdao hi phain dada dukhirao ne riphu nang mu, thihi boni basaoha bonsi berlai ba.
Thikhabo, Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Bokhe musibo da thi. Snadi jabani nisi bokhe yesisi dukhu ri ba? Bo ani basao ha gibi ar majang sisi khusi khe ning dang ba se.
Dukhi sarao de nalaibo nisi niha dong nang, nisi nangba ha bonsi khe juru phu du. Thikhabo, ang la nalai bo nisi niha dong nang niya.
Bode jar dangphuba lai dang la kha. Ani saomang phip mane thao huda ba se.
Odebani, ang gibi khe nisi niha thi du, khrip habsao ha hamba graojma khe braha sainthi re, bo masainjik dangyaba khusi khe bo wainso mane sainthi nang.
Juda Iskariot, Jisu ni yaohon rikphayarao jhigin ni bisingha saosi, Jisu khe rem rimane Jonthairao niha thang ba.
Boni grao khe khna hi bonsi khaja ba. Odebani bonsi bone rang rimane grao hanggai ba. Odehe, Juda Jisu khe bonsi niha yaopha mane hajora smai kha.
Humao giriyayaba Baiglai Mel ni basain sagangthao ha, Jisu ni yaohon rikphayarao bokhe sing ba, Jing braha thanghi jinthane Baiglai ni Mel salai ma ning nangjao du.
Odehe, Jisu bonsini bisingha subung gini khe haihahi bonsi khe thi ba, Nisi nogorha thangba ha, subung saosi dihdig ha dih labuba khe goron nang. Boni yaohon rikpha lah,
ode bo hapyaba noh ha hap hi noh ni bubra niha edehe thi lah, Slingriyah thi ba, ‘ang jang ani rikphayarao Baiglai ni Mel jhiginyaba noh ni khutha braha dong ba?’
Odehe, bo ning nisi ne basaothao ni khutha gedeba khe salaihi dengyaba khe nisi ne phnu nang. Oraha nisi jinthane khrip khebo jimane salai lah.
Ode rikphaya gini baigo langhi thang dada nogor ha hap hi kha. Jisu bonsi niha sainthiba lai lai khripbo bonsi nuhiba ar oraha bonsi Baiglai ni Mel salai kha.
Sainbli jaba ha, Jisu jarni yaohon rikphayarao jang sophai kha.
Odehe bonsi khalai khamlaiba ha, Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Gibi jang ang nisi khe thi du, nisi ni bising ha saosi ang jang jiphayaba angkhe rem rima.
Odebani, yaohon rikphayarao waimu nang hi saosi saosi khlai hi, Ang la niya na? thihi bokhe sing ba.
Jisu bonsi khe thiphin ba, Nisi ni bising ha saosi ang jang khopra masi ha khalai jiphayaba ja nang.
Marsini Basa de Madai ni laisi ha rebba lai ning thangma se. Thikhabo, Marsini Basa khe rem riyaba de bislei boni khlaihi de bubain risi nang. Boni khlai hide hajaiyayaba se hamdao mu.
Odehe, bonsi jilai saiba ha Jisu hon khe laha hi hamthai ri dada sbai hi sbai hi boni yaohon rikphayarao ne ri ba, ode bo bonsi khe thi ba, Ebo ning ani saomang, laha hi ji lah.
Odehe, bo bela khe laha hi, hamthai ri dada bonsi ne yaopha ba, ode bonsi khripbo bokhe ling ba.
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Ebo de gadain hanggaiyaba ani bithi se, gabang subung buthu ne khlai hi baigoyaba,
Ang gibi jang nisi khe thi du, Madai ni raji ha gadain ling mani basain soya side ang lingphinya kha.
Odehe, bonsi rajab dada baigo langhi Oliv hading ha thang la kha.
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Nisi khrip bo jajaoya jama se. Madai ni laisi ha thiba lai ning, Melma raokhiyaba khe ang sthai nang, ode melma buthu khaiphlung thar ma
Thikhabo, ang thih hi baijaphin bani yaohon ha ang nisini sagang ha Galili raji ha thang da nang.
Peter bokhe thiphin ba, Ning khe bonsi khrip khah ha jajaoya ja khabo, angde musi khalibo ning khe garya.
Odebani, Jisu Peter khe thiphin ba, Ang ning khe thi du, dini hor ha, daola gisi gagin ni sagang ha ning ang khe phin tham niya ma.
Peter bol jang thiphin ba, “Ning thihba ha thih phama nang la khabo, ang niya nang niya”.
Gibin yaohon rikphayarao khrip bo olei ning thi ba.
Bonsi Gethsemani thiyaba hathan ha sophai ba. Jisu jarni yaohon rikphayarao khe thi ba, Ang Madai bidu si, nisi eraha ning kham lah.
Bo Peter, Jakob ar Johan khe langpha ba, ar glimdi galaisi dukhu waimu nang ba.
Bonsi khe bo thi ba, Ani khah ha hamsi ning dukhu nang bani thih thao thao ang ja du. Nisi eraha ang jang salai hi dongpha.
Bo thangdao hi thang dada hah ha blip pha ba, ar blai khade bo dukhu ni bubli khe lailang mane bi ba.
“Abai, nini khlaihi de khrip khebo blai du. Ebo dukhu ni bela khe ani phrang degaolang ri lah. Thikhabo ang nangjaoba lai da ja thing, ning nangjaoba lai ja thing.”
Bo phaiphin baha boni yaohon rikphaya gatham thuhi dongba khe nu ba, odebani bo Peter khe thi ba, Simon, nisi thuba se na? Gonta masi mang mangbo nisi smao hi dong phuya?
Ode, bonsi khe thi ba, Naigrik ha galaiya mani khlai hi smao hi ning bi lah. Bese de blai du, thikhabo saomang de raoya ja du.
Bo thangphin hi sagang ha thiba lai ning biphin ba.
Bo yaohon rikphayarao niha phaiphinba ha, bonsi thuba khe nu ba. Bonsi muthai naisi phuya si dongba ode bonsi snadi khe boni ha thi ma bonsi mithiya.
Ode, bo phai hi, phintham ha bonsi khe thi ba, “Duha de thu hi lenggo la ga, bublibo ja kha! Bubli sophai kha! Nai lah, Marsi ni Basa de phaphirao ni yao ha rem rijao ma kha.
Baija hi, jing thang la nang. Nai lah, angkhe remginyaba eraha sophai kha”.

Bo olei grao josaiba ha, yaohon rikphaya jhigin ni bising ha saosi Juda sophai kha. Bo jang baosi jahi Jonthairao, Dara khe slingriyarao ar hojarao jang haiha jaoyaba subung buthu seng ar daobu labu hi sophai kha.
Remginyaba subung buthu khe sin rihi thi ba, Sere khe ang khudim nang, bo khe ning remhi hamsisi khlai hi lang lah.
Juda sophaiba jang, Jisu khe Rabbi thihi bokhe khudim kha.
Odehe, bonsi Jisu khe remhi kha ba.
Thikhabo, oraha songyarao ni bising ha saosi jarni seng khe khaikho dada Jonthaima ni leng khe dainba ha, boni khmao saikhao se dainso ba.
Jisu bonsi khe thi ba, Ang khe makhao mithim khe rem mane phaiba lai seng jang daobu labu hi nisi phaiba na?
Madai khoh ha sain midi sling rihi, nisi niha ang dong ba. Nisi angkhe remya lao. Thikhabo, Madaini laisi ha grao dongyaba khe sophai mani khlai hi se elei ja ba.
Boha ning boni yaohon rikphayarao khrip bokhe gar dada khailang thar kha.
Naga saosi, rih guphu phinyaba, Jisu khe rikpha ba; bokhe bonsi remma bao ba.
Thikhabo, bo naga jarni rih khe dangkhlai hi, saoha rih giri hi bo khailang kha.
Jisu khe Jonthaima ni noh ha lang ba. Ode bo jang baosi khrip Jonthairao, Hojarao ar Dara khe slingriyarao oraha bojom jalai ba.
Peter gajain ni phrang rikpha hi Jonthaima ni noh ni daoglap ha hap ba, ar siphaiyarao jang baosi bo waisi kham ba.
Jonthairao ar khrip bisardarrao Jisu khe sthai mane balam smai ba, thikhabo bonsi saosibo musi balam mai phuya.
Jisu ni basao ha thokhi hi subung gabang mosol sakhi ri khabo, bonsini grao miliya.
Subung gejesi song dada mosol sakhi ri ba.
Ebo subung de subung ni yao jang dangyaba Madai khoh khe sbai dada saintham ni bisingha yao jang dangya hi gibin dangphin nang thiba khe jing khna kha, thihi thi ba.
Olei sosi bonsi sakhi ri khabo, bonsini grao miliya.
Jonthaima subung buthu ni sagang ha songkhu dada Jisukhe sing ba, Bonsi nini basaoha sakhi riyaba khe ning grao thiphin phuya kha?
Thikhabo, Jisu grao thiphinya hi phirik phirik dong ba. Odebani, Jonthaima bokhe singphin ba, Ning la Messiah, Judaothao ha dongyaba ni Basa na?
Jisu bokhe thiphin ba, Ang ning, ar Marsini Basa khe raoma jang Madaini yaoda gede kham dada, jimi jang phaiba khe nisi nu nang.
Jonthaima jarni rih khe jikhao hi thiba, Jing musi sakhi nangdaoya kho,
Bo ning Madai sijiba khe nisi khna kha da. Nisi bedehe bao du?
Bonsi khripbo bokhe sthai mane baolei ba.
Gejesi subung bokhe khudi thuphra ba, ar boni muthai khe khaphong hi bokhe do ba, Sere ningkhe do ba? Dei, thi sang, bonsi thi ba, ar siphaiyaraobo bokhe langhi bakhao lai ri ba.
Odehe, Peter noh bakhla ni hakhli ha khamba ha Jonthaima ni lengjikrao ni bising ha saosi mala phai ba.
Peter waisi khamba khe nuhi, bokhe naipha dada thi ba, Ning bo Nazareth Jisu jang dongphayaba saosi se.
Thikhabo Peter mithiya maisi hi thiphin ba, Snadi grao khe ning thi ba ang tharmaiya. Ode bo baji ha baigo lang kha. Boha ning daola gisi kha.
Bo lengjik mala bokhe nuhi oraha songyarao niha thi ba, Bo bonsini subung se.
Thikhabo, Peter niyaphin ba.
Khaisa yaohon ha oraha songyarao Peter khe thi ba, Ning bo Galili rajini se, bonsini bising ni subung se.
Thikhabo, Peter thi ba, Ang gibi khe thiba se, niyakhade Madai angkhe dukhu ri thing. Nisi thiyaba subung khe ang mithiya, thihi smai dang ba.
Boha ning daono phin gini gisi kha. Daono phin gin gisiyasa ni sagang ha ning angkhe phintham niya ma, thihi Jisu bokhe thiyaba grao khe Peter wainso hi, dukhu nang dada bol jang gra ba.
Phorongma ha Jonthaimarao, Dara khe slingriyarao ar bisardarrao jang goronlai hi sainlai ba, ode Jisu khe Pilat niha siklang ba.
Pilat Jisu khe sing ba, Ning Judarao ni Raja?
Jisu thiphin ba, Ning ning thila kha.
Jonthaimarao boni basao ha gabang gajai bisar ri ba.
Odebani Pilat bokhe phin singphin ba, Ning thiphinya kha? Nai lah, ning khe bisar riyarao khe.
Jisu musi khebo thiphinya bani Pilat hamsi ning gmang ba.
Baiglai ni melni bising ha, phathoha dongyarao ni bising phrang, sere khe subung buthu nangjao re, Pilat saosi khe bonsine haiger ri re.
Bo bubliha subung saosi, Barabba thiyaba, hamyayarao ni dol jang subung sthaipha bani phathoha dong ba.
Odehe, subung buthu Pilat niha bojom jahi nalai bede yaowaiba olei bonsi ne dang ri mani khlai hi khainsu ba.
Pilat bonsi khe sing ba, Nisi ni khlai hi Judarao ni Raja khe haiger ma nisi nangjao du?
Bede thikhade, Jonthaimarao hingsa ni rang jang bokhe boni ha yaophaba thihi mithi du.
Thikhabo, Jonthaimarao subung buthu khe bonsi ne Barabba khe haiger ri mane sani ba.
Odebani, Pilat githim laiyarao khe singphin ba, Judarao ni Raja nisi thiyaba khe snadi ang khlai ma?
Bonsi jirik khaophin hi thi ba, Bokhe kross ha dikpha lah.
Pilat bonsi khe thi ba, Bo snadi dang gajai ba?
Bonsi jirik khao ba, Kross ha dikpha lah.
Subung buthu khe Pilat khaja rima nangjao bani Barabba khe haiger ri kha, ar Jisu khe la su ri dada kross ha dikpha mane yaopha kha.
Odehe, siphaiyarao Jisu khe bisardar ni nohkhoh, Praitorian ha lang ba, ar bonsini dol ni khrip khebo long ba.
Bonsi Jisu khe rih gajao phin rihi, ar busuni bedep jang khrothu slam hi, bokhe thu riba.
Juthai, Judarao ni Raja, nini hayu lao thing! thihi bokhe bonsi khlim ba.
Bonsi boni bokhro ha goda jang do ba ar bokhe khudi thuphra ba. Ode, bonsi sagang ha yasgu thuhi khlim ba.
Odehe, bokhe mlao-thalao khlai bani yaohonha bonsi rih gajao khe khohi bone boni rih khe thuphin riba ar bonsi dikthai mane bokhe lang ba.
Kurini noleini subung saosi Simon khe siphayarao lama ha remhi Jisuni kross khe bain riba. (Bode Aleksandar jang Rufus ni bupha se.)
Odehe, Jisukhe Golgotha hathanha langba, boni ortho de Laokhrong hathan thiyaba se.
Oraha murra jang grep bidih gibringyaba khe bonsi bone ling rima bao ba, thikhabo lingya.
Odehe, bokhe kross ha dikpha kha ar bonsi boni rih phinyaba khe khophal naihi ron laiba.
Phorong ni bubli masgu ha ning bonsi Jisu khe kross ha dikthai ba.
Boni basao ha sijithai musuthai ni grao Judarao ni Raja khe reb hi deng ba.
Makhao mithim gini khebo bonsi Jisu jang baosi dikpha ba, boni yaoda gede saosi ar yaosi gede saosi.
Odelei ning Madai ni grao hade, Bobo phaphirao jang baosi sainpha jao kha thiyaba grao sophai ba.
Odehe, thangyarao phaiyarao nuhi, bokhro thingkhrai dada, musu ba, Yao, ning ning Madai khoh khe saintham ni bising ha dangphin ma thiyaba!
Duha ning jarkhe sogo hi kross ni phrang nakhai bu sang.
Odelei ning Jonthairao jang Dara khe slingriyarao Jisukhe mlaohi thi ba, Bo malai khe sogo phu du, jar khe la sogo phuya.
Jing nuhi lonphu mane Messiah, Israelraoni Raja duha kross ni phrang akhai bu thing, thihi bonsi thi ba.
Bo jang baosi gini dikpha jaoyababo bokhe musu ba.
Odehe, sainjer bubli magin phrang sainbli ni bubli matham sosi mulug andar ja ba.
Bubli matham ha Jisu bak jang jirik khao hi, Eloi, Eloi, Lama sabakthani (boni ortho de ‘Ani Madai, Ani Madai, snadi jabani ning angkhe dangkhlai ba’?)
Oraha songhi dongyarao gejesi khnahi thi ba, Khna sang, bo Elija khe long ba se.

Bonsini bising ha saosi subung khai phalang dada grep bidih khe jemyaba sponj lang hi goda buju ha khepre dada, bo Jisuni khujer ha sugu hi bone ling riba, ar thi ba, Jon kho, Elija bokhe dikhlai mane phai nang na phaiya jing nai nang.
Jisu bak jang jirik khao dada hang jam kha.
Madaikhoh bising ha dimphongyaba rih phi gin khlaihi basao ni phrang bakhla sosi jigao lang la ba.
Boni rogong ha songhi dongyaba siphaiyarao ni hoja, bo olei thiba khe nuhi bo thi ba, Gibi jang ebode Madai ni basa se.
Odehe, gajain ni phrang masainjik buthu bo naihi dong ba. Bonsi ni bising ha Mari Magdalin, gidi daoyaba Jakob ar Josep ni buma Mari ar Salomi bonsi ni bising ha dong ba.
Jisu Galili rajiha dongbaha bo jang baosi rikbaipha dada khusi dang juruyarao ar masainjik gabang Jerusalem ni phrang phai phayaraobo oraha dong ba.
Sainblibo ja kha ode Lenggo basain ni khlai hi, salai hi deng mani bubli bo jakha,
Boha, Arimathai nolei ni bisardar, man gnangyaba Josep, Madai ni raji khe asa khlai hi dongyaba subung, khinya hi Pilat niha hapsing dada Jisu ni manggathi khe sain ba.
Pilat Jisu srap thih bani grao khe khna hi hamsisi gmang ba. Bo siphaiyarao ni hoja khe longha hi thihba lao kha na laoya thihi bokhe sing ba.
Siphaiyarao ni hoja ni phrang grao khe khnaba ni yaohonha manggathi khe Josep ne ri kha.
Josep rih miyao dudu barai hi, manggathi khe dekhlai dada rih miyao dudu ha merai hi longthaima khe jaoyaba mangkhlong ha thu ri ba, ode mangkhlong derga khe longphlai jang khlip phung ba.
Mari Magdalin ar Josep ni buma Mari Jisu ni manggathi thu riyaba khe naihi ning dong ba.
Lenggo Basain jamba ni yaohon ha Mari Magdalin, Jakob ni buma ar Salomi bonsi khrip Jisu ni manggathi khe hu mane muli midim khe barai ba.
Odehe, basain sain sni ni basain sagangthao ha, sain baigo bani yaohon ha bonsi mangkhlong ha thang ba.
Bonsi masainjikrao thangsai baha sainlai ba, Sere jinthane mangkhlongni longthai derga gedeba khe disai ri nang?
Ode, bonsi naihaba ha, longthai disai jaohi dongba khe nuha ba.
Bonsi mangkhlong ni bisingha hapba ha naga saosi, rih guphu phin dada yaoda gede khamba khe nu ba, bonsi hamsi ning khin kha.
Thikhabo, bo thi ba, Da khin, dikphayaba Nazareth Jisu khe nisi smaiba thihi ang mithi du. Bode baijaphin kha. Bo eraha giri kha, bokhe thu riyaba khe naila phai.
Odebani duha nisi thang hi boni yaohon rikphayarao ode Peter niha sainthi lah. Bo nisi niha sainthi ba lai, Galili raji gede nisi ni sagang ha thang kha, oraha bokhe nisi nu nang.
Gmanghi khinhi mangkhlong ni phrang khailang kha. Bonsi khin bang bani saosi niha bo musi thiya.
Lenggo Basain phorongma ha Jisu baijaphin bani yaohon ha sagangthao bo Mari, boni sao bising ni phrang bese gusu masni khe rikkhlaiyaba saosi niha bo nujao ba.
Bo masainjik thang dada boni lugurao niha khna ri ba. Bonsi waimu dukhu nang hi gra ba.
Bo masainjik bonsi niha bode baijaphin kha ang nu ba, thihi khna ri khabo bonsi lonya.
Boni yaohonha, bonsini bising ha subung gini nolei gede thangba ha mukhang gibin khlai hi nujao ba.
Bonsi gini thangphin hi boni yaohon rikphayarao niha sainthi khabo, bonsi londaoya.
Odehe, yaohonthao ha, boni yaohon rikphaya jhiseh, makham jihi kham laiba ha, Jisu bonsi niha nujao ba, ar bo baijaphin bani sainthiyarao ni grao khe khna hi lonya bani bonsi khe jophlung ba.
Bo bonsi khe thi ba, Nisi khrip habsao ha thanghi khrip sangsai jaoyaba buthu niha hamba graojma khe sainthi lah.
Sere bokhe lonhi baptisma la ha re, bo go nang; sere bokhe lonya re gajai jahi dongma se.
Lonyarao ne gmang thaosisi khusi dang mane raothai ri nang. Bonsi ani bumu jang bese gusu buthu khe rikkhlai nang. Bonsi gmang thaosisi grao jo nang.
Jbu buthu khebo yao jang rem khabo, thiginyaba bis khe ling khabo musi ja nang niya. Bonsi limyarao sayarao ni basaoha yao deng nang ar bonsi ham lang la nang.
Gabra Jisu bonsi niha grao jo blai bani yaohonha bo sorgo ha sugu langjao dada Madaini yaoda gede khamhi kha.
Odehe, yaohon rikphayarao khrip bo rajiha thanghi grao sainthi phalang kha, ode Gabra bonsi jang khusi dangpha ba, ar gmang thaosisi yaoblai jang bonsi sainthiyaba grao gibi thihi phnu ba. Amen.
O Mayani Theophil,
Jini bisingha japhaiyaba grao khe gabang subung rebma bao ba.
Jenba ni phrang ebo buthu khe nuyarao ar boni khusi dangyaba ni graojma jini ha sainthiyaba khe reb ba.
Odebani, ebo buthu khe hamsisi khlai hi nai dada jenba ni phrang yaohonthao sosi, ninthane reb khade ham nang thihi ang bao ba.
Sagang ha ninthane, bonsi riyaba grao khe, gibi ning thihi ning tharmaihi buji mani khlai hi ang reb ba.
Juda rajiha, Herod Raja khamba ha, Abijah dol ni subung Zakaria thiyaba jonthai saosi dong ba. Bo Aron ni greng khe noh ja ba. Boni bihih ni bumu Elizabeth se.
Bonsi gini jang Gabra ni muh ha hamba subung se. Odebani, Gabra ni dara disa khe hamsisi manihi dong ba.
Elizabeth sagrima jabani, sasik maiya. Bonsi gini bo grasa grajik ja kha.
Zakaria nalai dangba lai sainsi khali Jonthai ni khusi dang mane Madaikhoh ha hap ba.
Odehe, Jonthai ni dara ha dongba lai, Gabra ni bikhoh ni bising ha hap hi bahai midim sao mane sama naiba ha boni saoha galai ba.
Bo duna saosaiba ha baji ha subung buthu Madai bi ba.
Gabra ni sorgo degla masi nujao phai ba, ode Madai huthan ni yaoda gede songpha phai ba.
Zakaria bokhe nu dada, waimu nang ba. Odehe hamsi ning khinbo khin ba.
Thikhabo, sorgo ni degla bokhe thi ba, Zakaria, da khin, Madai ning biyaba khe khna kha. Nini nohbrajik Elizabeth ninthane basa saosi mai ri nang. Ning bokhe Johan thihi bumu deng lah.
Bo hajai bani ning hamsi ning khaja nang, ode subung buthu gabang khaja nang.
Bede thikhade, bode Gabrani sagang ha subung gedeba ja nang. Bo grep bidih ar ju musi khebo ling nang niya. Hajaiya sani sagang ha ning Bese Gathar jang gablai ba se.
Bode Israelrao ni bising ha gabang subung khe jarni Gabra Madai niha khah phin rihi labuphin nang.

Bupharao ni khah khe basathu nihah phin phin ri nang. Ode, subung grao maniyayarao khe girikyarao ni gede phin phin ri mani Gabrani khlai hi subung buthu salai hi deng mani, Elija ni bese jang khusi dang phu mani Gabra ni sagang ha bo thang da ma.
Zakaria degla khe thi ba, Bede khlai hi ang tharmai phu nang? Ang bo grasa ja kha, ani nohbrajik bo grajik ja kha.
Degla bokhe thiphin ba, Ang ning Gabriel, Madai ni sagang ha songyaba. Ebo hamba graojma khe sainthi mane angkhe haiha ba.
Khna lah, bubli sophai ginyaba grao khe ning lonya bani, boni grao sophaiya si ning grao jophuya hi thao ma.
Zakaria khe subung buthu jonhi dong ba. Bikhoh bising ha budu lao bang bani bonsi hamsi ning gmang lai ba.
Bo baigo buba jang, grao jophuya kha. Odebani bikhoh bising ha nujaoyaba nu ba thihi bonsi tharmai ba, ode bo yao jang se grao jo si ba.
Bo jonthai ni khusi dangblai hi jarni noh gede thangphin kha.
Khaisa yaohon ha, boni nohbrajik Elizabeth sao khonggin ja kha, ar nokha dain bowa noh niphrang baigoya hi dong ba.
Duhade subung ni sagang ha musi jajaoya mane ani laji khe Gabra lang la kha, bo thi ba.
Odehe, Elizabeth sao khonggin daindo soba ha, Madai jarni degla saosi Gabriel thiyaba khe Galili raji ni nolei masi, Nazareth thiyaba ha,
mala gathar saosi niha haiha ba. Bode David ni sarik surik, Josep thiyaba jang noh jamane sandi dangseng hi dengyaba se. Bo mala ni bumu Mari se.
Degla boni ha phai hi thi ba, Juthai, nini ha santi dong thing. Ning jang Gabra dongpha du. Ninthane hamsi ning hamthai bo riha du.
Mari de olei sainthiyaba grao ni khlai hi hamsi ning khah waimu nang hi, Ebo khlimthai la sumjadi khlimthai ja kha thi hi bo khah ha bao ba.
Degla bokhe thi ba, Mari, da khin, Madai ning khe nangjao du.
Khna lah, ning sao khonggin jahi basa miyah mai nang, boni bumu Jisu thihi ning deng la nang.
Bode subung gede ja ma. Judao thaoyaba Madai ni Basa thijao ma, ode Gabra Madai bokhe boni phagara David ni khamthan khe ri ma.
Ode, Jakob ni sarik surikrao ni basao ha thaoglao jang bo Raja ja nang. Boni raji jam nang niya.
Mari degla niha thi ba, Bede khlai hi olei ja phu ma? Ang la basai ning maiya kho?

Degla boniha thiphin ba, Bese Gathar nini basaoha akhai phai nang, ar judaothao ni raothai jang nini basao ha sainkhlim ja nang. Odebani hajai phaiginyaba nana de subung gathar, Madai ni basa thijao ma.
Nai lah, nini sengphongjik Elizabeth bo, grajik jaba ni yaohon ha duha sao khonggin ja ba daindo ja kha.
Madai ni khlai hi dang phuyayaba khusi musi bo giri.
Odehe, Mari thi ba, Angde Gabrani lengjik se. Ning thiba lai ning ani basao ha sophai thing. Ode sorgoni degla thang la kha.
Boni yaohon ha, Mari de salai dada Juda raji ni nolei masi ha sangga thang kha.
Bo Zakaria ni noh ha hap dada Elizabeth khe khlim ba.
Mari khlimba ni khurang khe khna hi, Elizabeth ni hoh bising ha nana dongyaba mao kha. Ode, Elizabeth niha Bese Gathar gablai ba.
Bo bol jang jirik khaohi thi ba, Masainjikrao ni bising ha nini khophal hamdao thao.
Ani Gabra ni buma ani ha phaiba la sumjadi ni grao kho?
Ning khlimyaba khurang khe khnaba jang ani bohoh bising ha dongyaba nana baijlom kha.
Gabra boni ha grao sainthiyaba khe sophai ma thihi lon bani, boni khophal hambi.
Mari thi ba,
“Ani khah ha Gabra khe bakhan khlai du,
Ani bese sogoyahba Madai ni khlai hi ang khaja du!
Bede thikhade, bode boni lengjik khasi daothaoyaba khe wainso du.
Duha ni phrang khrip subung buthu ang khe khajayaba thi ba.
Raodaoyaba Madai anthane khusi gede dang ri kha,
Boni bumu bo gathar se.
Bokhe khin hi dongyarao ni basaoha
Jug jug khasaoma phnu nang.
Bo jarni yao ni bol khe phnu kha,
ar bonsini khah ha baoyaba sanggama buthu khe bo dra dri khlai kha.
Bo Raja gedebarao khe nekhlai hi,
Gibin jadi khasiyarao khe sugu kha.
Hukhri jaoyarao khe hamba jimu jang hoh gablai ri kha,
Ode, gnangrao khe yao khongja khlai hi haiha kha.
Jini phagrarao niha bo grao hanggai ba lai,
Boni leng Israelrao khe naiso la kha.
Abraham ar boni sarik surik niha,
thaoglao jang boni khasaoma khe phnu nang”.
Mari Elizabeth ni noh ha daintham lai dong hi jarni noh ha thangphin la kha.
Elizabeth nana mai mani bubli sophai hi bo nana miyah mai kha.
Boni noharirao ode hainthirao khna dada Gabra boni basaoha hamba khusi dang ri kha thihi hamsi ning bonsi bo jang khajapha ba.
Odehe sainjai so ba ha, nana khe bujuh raso mane bonsi phai ba. Bupha ni bumu lahi Zakaria thihi bonsi dengma bao ba.
Thikhabo, boni buma thi ba, Niya, boni bumu Johan deng nang.
Bonsi Elizabeth khe thi ba, Elai bumu de nisini daphlungrao ni bising ha saosi bo giri kho!
Odehe, bonsi boni bupha niha yao jang grao johi nana ni bumu khe sumjadi deng ma thihi sing ba.
Zakaria reb mane longthai bakhlap sain hi, oraha Boni bumu Johan se thihi reb ba. Bonsi khrip bo gmang lai ba.
Boha ning khuh slai khru dada grao johi Madai khe bakhan khlai ba.
Noharirao khinthar hi Juda raji ni nolei buthu ha bo grao gublung thar kha.
Ode, khnayarao si khah ha baohi, bo grao khe sing ba, Ebo nana bede jahi thao nang? bonsi thilai ba. Gabra ni yao boni basao ha dongpha du.
Boni bupha Zakaria, Bese Gathar jang gablai hi dong ba. Bo edehe grao sainthi da ba:
“Gabra, Israel ni Madai khe bakhan jahi dong thing!
Bo jarni subungrao khe juru hi sogo kha,
Boni leng David ni sarik surik ni phrang
sogoma ni bogrong bo song ri kha.
Odehe, gada habo jarni gorasali ni khuh jang
grao hanggai ba lai jasosi,
Jini sotrurao, jing khe naisleyarao ni
yao ni phrang jing khe sogo kha.
Jini phagararao ni basao ha khasaoma phnu mani, ode
boni grao gathar khayaba khe wainso mani
Jini phagara Abraham niha
smai dang hi grao hanggai ba.
Bo jing khe sotrurao ni yao ni phrang sogo nang
Jing thanghi dongba ha ning, gathar jang ragaosisi dongphu mani
Boni muh ha bo jingkhe saikho ba.
Ode nanadao, ning khe judao thaoyaba ni gorasali thihi thi nang,
ar boni lama khe slam mane
Gabrani sagang ha ning thang nang.
Bonsi ni phap map jama ni
sogo jaomane grao khe mithi ri nang.
Jini Madai ni khasaoma jang
ar magain dik dikyaba basao ni phrang
sain baigo hi jini ha jnama ri nang.
Andar jang githi ni sainkhlim ha khamyarao
ar bonsini igah khe santhi ni lama gede hem ri mani basao ni phrang jnama sophai nang”.
Ansa dephalang hi juphalang hi sao jang bese gede raodao phalang ba. Odehe basain soya side Israel sarao niha nujaoya hi bo hajengling ha dong ba.
Bo bubli ha Kaisar Augasta, habsao raji khrip dongba si ha, khrip subung ni bumu khe rebkhu mane hukhum ri ba.
Boha Suria raji ni Kurini latsap ni bubli ha bumu reb khu jen ba.
Khripbo jar jar ni nolei ha bumu rebkhu jao mane thang ba.
Odehe, Josepbo David ni sarik surik ar greng se bani Galili raji ni nolei masi Nazareth ni phrang Judai raji ni David ni nolei Bethlehem thiyaba ha,
Jar ni bihih Mari, sao khonggin jayaba khe langpha hi, bumu reb khu jao mane thang ba.
Bonsi oraha dongba ha ning hajai mani bublibo sophai ba.
Ode, hajai jenyaba basa sagra mai ba. Bokhe rih merai hi mihrung ha thu ri ba. Bede thikhade naorai thaothan ha bonsi dongthan maiya.
Odehe bo raji ni hathan masi ha gejesi melma raokhiyarao hor ha jarni melma khe raokhi hi dong ba.
Gabra ni phrang degla masi, bonsi niha songpha phai ba, ode sersi giding bonsi niha sring sring jdanpha ba. Odebani bonsi hamsi ning khin ba.
Thikhabo degla bonsi khe thi ba, Nisi da khin ar khna lah. Ang khrip jadi ni khlai hi khaja sisiyaba hamba graojma khe labuba se.
Dini ha nisi ne khlai hi David ni nolei ha sogoyah Gabra Krista hajai kha.
Odehe, nisi ni khlai hi mithi mani sin ebo se, nana khe rih merai hi mihrung ha thu riba khe nisi nuhi nang.
Boha ning, degla niha sorgo ni subung gabang nujao hi Madai khe edehe bakhan ri ba,
Judaothao ni Madai niha muima ja thing
Ode, habsao habo hamjaoyaba subungrao ni basaoha milima dong thing, thihi bonsi thi ba.
Deglarao sorgo ha thangla bani yaohon ha, melma raokhiyarao thi lai ba, Tha, jing Bethlehem ha thang nang, sumjadi japhai ba Gabra sainthiyaba grao khe naihi nang.
Ode, bonsi srap thang hi, Mari jang Josep, mih ni ahar riyaba mihrung ha nana thu riba khe bonsi nuhi kha.
Melma raokhiyarao bokhe nuba jang nana ni basao ha degla sainthiyaba graojma khe bonsi niha sainthi ba.
Khnayarao si melma raokhiyarao sainthiyaba grao khe khna hi gmang ba.
Thikhabo, Mari ebo grao buthu khe khrip jarni khah bisingha deng ba.
Melma raokhiyarao degla bonsi niha sainthiba lai jasosi nuhi bani Madai khe bakhan rihi bonsi thangphin la kha.
Sainjai so ba ha, bujuh raso bani basain so bani, bo sathip ha dongyaba ni ha degla bumu dengma saniba lai bumu khe Jisu thihi deng ba.
Odebani, Moses ni dara ha dongba lai bokhe thar mani basain sokha bani bokhe Jerusalem ha langpha hi thang ba.
Gabra ni dara ni grao ha dongba lai hajai jenyaba basa sagra khede Gabrani khlai hi gathar se thihi reb ba lai.
Gabra niha yaopha mani khlai hi daothu jorsi thikhabo, daophri basa magin thikhabo, Gabra ni dara ni grao ha reb ba lai labu hi bandai ri ba.
Bo bubli ha, Jerusalem ha subung saosi Simeon thiyaba dong ba. Bo dormo ni subung se. Bo Madai khe mani hi Israelrao khe sogo ri mane jon hi dongyaba se. Ar boni basaoha Bese Gathar dongpha ba.
Gabra Krista khe nuya side thi nang niya thihi Bese Gathar jang bokhe mithi ri ba.
Bese jang langpha jao hi, Simeon Madai khoh ha hap hiba. Dara ha dongba lai dang ri mane nana Jisu khe buma jang bupha labu ba ha,
Simeon nana khe bam dada Madai niha hamjaoma ri ba:
Gabra, duhade nini grao lai,
nini leng khe khah santi jang haiha la ga.
Bede thikhala nini sogoyah khe
ani muthai jang nu la kha.
Ebo khe khrip jadi ni muthai ha
ning ning salai rihi deng ba.
Jentailrao nini ha nini jnama khe nuphu mani khlai hi
ar Israelrao niha nini muima japhu mane.
Nana ni basao ha grao thiyaba khe buma bupha gini jang hamsi ning gmang ba.

Simeon bonsi khe hamthai ri dada boni buma Mari khe thi ba, Khna lah, ebo nana de Israelrao ni bising ha gabang subung buthu khuda mane ar sogo mane saikho ba. Ar malai jang siji jaomane sinbo phnu nang.
Nini khah bo seng jang iphlaba lai sa ma se. Ode gabang subung ni khah khebo baothai phnu nang.
Ode, Asher jadi ni Phanuel ni bisik gorasali saosi, Anna thiyaba dong ba. Bo hamsi ning grajik jakha. Bo noh jahi basai jang maithai sni mang mang dongpha ba.
Bo nokha maithai jang bisa bri maithai bri banjik jahi dong ba. Ar Madaikhoh khe garyahi nalaibo hoh khongja donghi bo Madai niha bi re.
Ode, okhali ni basain ha ning bo phai dada Madai niha hamjaoma ri ba, ode Jerusalem khe sogo mane lonhi jonyarao niha khrip nana ni balam khe sainthi ba.
Gabra ni dara ha dongba lai khrip khusi khe dangblai bani yaohon ha bonsi Galili raji, jarni nolei Nazareth ha thangphin la kha.
Nana de dedao phalang ba, ar raodao phalang hi bo girikthai jang gablai ba, ar Madai ni khasaoma boni basao ha dong ba.
Maithai phrong Jisu ni buma bupha Baiglai ni Mel mani mane Jerusalem ha thang re.
Bo maithai jhigin soba ha dara ha dongba lai Baiglai ni Mel mani mane bonsi thang ba.
Ode mel jamhi phaiphin ba ha, ansa Jisu Jerusalem ha dongthao la kha, bo khe buma jang bupha mithiya.
Odebani, sainsi ni lama ha thang hi bonsi subung buthu ni bising ha ar lugurao ni dol ha ar basao mithiyarao niha bo khe smai hi nuya kha.
Ode, bonsi bo khe nuyabani smai phalang hi Jerusalem gede thangphin kha.
Saintham ni yaohon ha Jisu khe Madaikhoh bising ha bonsi slingriyarao ni gejer ha khamba khe nuhi ba, ar bonsini grao khe khnahi singbo sing ba.
Bo joyaba grao khe khnayarao ar boni girikthai jang grao thiphinyaba khe khnayarao khrip bo gmang ba.
Odehe, buma jang bupha, bo khe nuba jang hamsi ning gmang ba. Odebani, buma bo khe thi ba, Ani basa, sumjabani jing khe elai dukhu ri ba? Nai lah, napha jang ang waimu jang ning khe smai ba.
Bo bonsi khe thiphin ba, Sumjabani nisi ang khe smai ba? Ani bupha ni noh ha ang dongma thihi nisi mithiya?
Thikhabo, bo thiphinyaba grao khe bonsi bujiya.
Ode, bo bonsi jang baosi Nazareth ha thangphin ba. Oraha bo bonsini grao khe mani hi dong ba. Boni buma khrip ebo buthu grao khe khah ha deng ba.
Jisu ringpha langhi girikpha langhi sao bo dedao phalang hi jupha lang ba, ar Madai jang subung buthu ni khasaoma hamjaoma maihi dong ba.

Kaisar Tiberius raja jaba ni phrang maithai jra ha Pontia Pilat de Judai raji ni latsap, Herod de Galili raji ni raja ar boni buphlung Philip de Ituria jang Trakonitis raji ni raja, Lusia de Abilene raji ni raja,
Anna jang Kaiapha Jonthaima jahi dong ba. Bo bubli ha hajengling ha Zakaria ni basa Johan niha Madai ni grao sophai ba.
Odehe, Johan Jordan dihbu dergong, khrip haphai buthu ha daopha lang hi, jar jarni phap map jama ne khah phin hi baptisma jama ne grao khe sainthi phalang ba.
Gorasali Isai grao sainthiyaba laisi ha rebba lai:
Hajengling ha subung saosi ni khurang jirik khaobaiyaba,
Gabra ni lama khe slam hi deng lah,
Boni lama khe beleng ri lah.
Khrip hakkole khe smai ri lah,
Hading harang khe hidao ri lah.
Lama gugui khe beleng ri lah, ode
Lama brayaba khe mili ri lah.
Odehe, khrip subung buthu Madai ni goma khe nu nang! thi hi rebba lai.
Baptisma jama ne subung buthu phaiyarao niha Johan thi ba, Jbu ni sarik surik rao, thamsi sophai ginyaba ni phrang khailang mane nisi khe sere sibring ba?

Nisi jarni phap ni phrang khah phin dada phnu mane hamba bathai thai lah. Ode, nisi jing Abraham ni sarik surik thihi khah ha da bao. Bede thikhade Madai ebo longthai buthu khe Abraham ni sarik surik slamphu du.
Odebani, duhabo khrip bongphang khitha ha rowa khe deng kha. Sereba bongphang ha hamba bathai thaiya kha de, bo khe bokhla hi waikhor ha dangsing ma.
Niya khala, jing sumjadi khlaima kho? thihi Johan khe subung buthu sing ba.
Bo bonsi khe thiphin ba, Sere niha sola magin dong, giriyaba ne ron la thing, ode sere niha jimu dong, bobo olei ning dang la thing.
Khajana khrangyarao bo baptisma jama ne boni ha phai hi sing ba, Slingriyah, jing la sumjadi khlaima kho?
Bo bonsi khe thiphin ba, Nisi ne rimane hanggaiba lai nisi la lah. Nisini mainphai ha khaja lah.
Gejesi siphaiyarao baptisma jamane boni ha phai hi bo khe sing ba, Jing la bede jama kho?
Bo bonsi khe thiphin ba, Saosi ni rang khe bol jang da lah, ar mosol grao jang bo malai khe bisar da ri. Nisi ni maiphain ha khajahi dong lah.
Subung buthu ni khah ha, Johan khe asa deng ba; Ebo ning Krista janai du? thihi baosai ba.

Odebani, bonsi khrip niha Johan thi ba, Ang de nisi khe dih jang baptisma ri du, thikhabo ang tha dedaoyaba phai du. Ang de boni yaphadap ni wadu khruma bo gathaya. Bo de nisi khe Bese Gathar ar wai jang baptisma ri nang.
Boni yao ha mai jaomane sangkhon dong. Maigrik khe boni maikhoh ha lusing ma, ode maijubu khe thih thaoyayaba waikhor ha saokhrip ma.
Odehe, bo subung buthu khe gibin gibin graothai jang sibbring ba, ar subung buthu niha hamba graojma khe sainthi ba.
Raja Herod, jarni buphlung Philip ni bihih Herodi khe noh jaba, ode gibin gibin hamya khusi dangbani balam ha Johan jo ba.
Johan khe Herod phatho ha jeb ba ar hamyadao hi khusi dangphin kha.
Subung buthu khrip baptisma ja blai hi, Jisubo baptisma ja ba, ar bo Madai bisaiba ha nokhasao khru ba.

Ode, Bese Gathar, saomang jahi, daothu lai birkhlai bu dada, boni basao ha baphai ba. Ode, nokhasao ni phrang khurang masi biring dada, Ning ani Basa khasao daothaoyaba, nini basaoha ang khaja du, thihi khnaphai kha.
Jisu khusi dangjenba ha maithai thimjhi lai ja kha. Subung buthu ni baothai ha de, bo de Josep ni basa, Josep Heli ni basa.
Heli de Mathat ni basa, Mathat de Levi ni basa, Levi de Janai ni basa, Janai de Josep ni basa.
Josep de Mattathias ni basa, Mattathias de Amos ni basa, Amos de Nahum ni basa, Nahum de Esli ni basa, Esli de Naggai ni basa,
Naggai de Maath ni basa, Maath de Mattathias ni basa, Mattathias de Semion ni basa, Semion de Joda ni basa,
Joda de Joanan ni basa, Joanan de Rhesa ni basa, Rhesa de Zerubbabel ni basa, Zerubbabel de Shealtiel ni basa,
Shealtiel de Neri ni basa, Neri de Melchi ni basa, Melchi de Addi ni basa, Addi de Cosam ni basa, Cosam de Elmadam ni basa, Elmadam de Er ni basa,
Er de Joshua ni basa, Joshua de Eliazar ni basa, Eliazar de Jorim ni basa, Jorim de Matthat ni basa, Matthat de Levi ni basa,
Levi de Simeon ni basa, Simeon de Juda ni basa, Juda de Josep ni basa, Josep de Jonam ni basa, Jonam de Eliakim ni basa,
Eliakim de Melea ni basa, Melea de Menna ni basa, Menna de Mattatha ni basa, Mattatha de David ni basa,
David de Jesse ni basa, Jesse de Obed ni basa, Obed de Boaz ni basa, Boaz de Salmon ni basa, Salmon de Nashon ni basa,
Nashon de Amminadab ni basa, Amminadab de Admin ni basa, Admin de Arni ni basa, Arni de Hezron ni basa, Hezron de Perez ni basa, Perez de Juda ni basa,
Juda de Jakob ni basa, Jakob de Isak ni basa, Isak de Abraham ni basa, Abraham de Tera ni basa, Tera de Nahor ni basa,
Nahor de Serug ni basa, Serug de Reu ni basa, Reu de Peleg ni basa, Peleg de Eber ni basa, Eber de Shela ni basa,
Shela de Kainan ni basa, Kainan de Arphaksad ni basa, Arphaksad de Shem ni basa, Shem de Noah ni basa, Noah de Lamek ni basa,
Lamek de Methusela ni basa, Methusela de Enok ni basa, Enok de Jered ni basa, Jered de Mahalalel ni basa, Mahalalel de Kainan ni basa,
Kainan de Enos ni basa, Enos de Seth ni basa, Seth de Adam ni basa, Adam de Madai ni basa se.
Jisu Bese Gathar jang gablai hi, Jordan dihbu ni phrang phaiphin dada, Bese Gathar jang bo khe hajengling ha langpha ba.
Oraha basain jang bisagin ni bising ha bokhe Diabol naigrik ba. Ode, bo basain buthu ha musibo jiya. Yaohonthao ha bo hukhri jao kha.
