Madai ni yaoda gede ha bakhan khlaijao hi dong ba, Bese Gathar hanggaiyaba khe Bupha ni phrang mai hi, bo nuyaba jang khnayaba khe bo lukhru ri kha.
David de sorgo ha gakhu langya, thikhabo bo ning thiba se,
Gabra de ani Gabra niha,
Ani yaoda ha kham lah,
Nini sotrurao khe nini yapha dengthan bakhla ha ang dengya si de, thiba.
Odebani, Jisu, nisi dikthaiyaba khe, Madai ning Gabra jang Krista jahi slam kha thihi Israel jadi khrip bo tharmai la thing!
Bo grao khe bonsi khna ba jang, bonsi ni khasu ha sainlai jalang la kha, Peter jang Apostol gibin buthu niha, Daphlungrao, jing bede khlai ma kho? thihi bonsi thi ba.
Peter bonsi niha thi ba, Nisi ni phap ni phrang khah phinhi, Jisu Krista ni bumu jang baptisma la thar lah; odese, nisi ni phap buthu khe map ja ma, ar Bese Gathar riyaba khe nisi mai ma.
Madai de nisine khlai hibo, nisini basathu ne khlai hibo, gajain ha dongyaba khrip ne khlai hibo, Gabra, jini Madai ning jarni ha bo longyarao ni khlai hi hangaiyaba gaja se dou, ode bo thi ba.
Peter, bonsi khe gabang grao gibin gibin lahi sakhi rihi thi ba, Duhani jugni subung hamyayarao ni phrang jar khe jar dimkhao lah, thihi bonsi khe sibring ba.
Boni sainthiyaba grao khe subung gabang mani kha, ar maniyaba si de baptisma la kha, okhali ni basain ha subung rjingtham lai bangdao hi bonsi mai ba.
Bonsi Apostolrao jang dongpha lai hi, bonsi ni phrang slingrithai mai ba, hon khe bo sabai hi, khah jang muh jang bi dada bonsi dongsong ba.
Apostolrao de gabang gmangthaosi ode sin buthu khe dang ba, ode khrip subung buthu bo gmang lai hi khin hi dong ba.
Ode, lonyaba si de asaba khebo bonsi ni don buthu khe yaowai phalai hi dong ba.
Bonsi jarni jinis ar don buthu khe phain hi, nangyaba khe jagothai bonsi khrip jang ron re.
Nalai bo khah masi jahi Madai ni bikhoh ha ning khah jang muh jang bonsi dong re, bonsi ni noh gede bo hon sabai hi, khajama jang ode khah manima jang bonsi jilai re.
Bonsi Madai khe bakhan khlai hi, khrip subung ni khajama khe smai hi, bonsi dong re. Ode, golam maiyaba si jang Gabra ning nalaibo bonsi niha dongpha re.
Sainsi khali Peter jang Johan de sainbli ha, bima ni bubli jakha bani, Madaikhoh ha thang ba.
Oraha ni, Derga Majang thiyaba ha, sereba subung saosi, hajaiba ni phrang igah khora dong ba. Bokhe bainbu hi oraha thu ri ba, ar bo hapyarao niha yao ajao jihi dong ba.
Peter jang Johan, Madaikhoh ha hapma jaba khe bo nuba jang, bo yao ajao ba.
Bonsi bokhe naihi ba, ar Peter bokhe thi ba, Jini gede nai ha sang,
Bo de bonsi ni phrang smaba mungsi mai ma asa jahi, bo naiha ba.
Thikhabo, Peter bokhe thi ba, Rang jang gajao musibo ani ha giri; thikhabo, ani ha bo se ning dong ba, bokhe ning ang ninthane ri nang, Nazareth Jisu Krista ni bumu lahi igah jang hemlang lah,
Boni yaoda ni yao khe remhi, bokhe sik khu kha; ode, boha ning boni igah buthu ode yamutho begreng buthu de bol rao lang la kha.
Ode, bo baijlom khuhi, bo song kha, boha ning bo igah jang baijlom khu hi, Madai khe bakhan khlai hi bikhoh ha bo hap pha kha.
Oraha subung buthu, igah jang hemhi ode Madai khe bakhan khlaiyaba khe nu kha.
Bikhoh ni derga majang ha yao ajao hi khamyaba se thihi bonsi tharmai hi, boni basao ha jinis sophaiyaba khe bonsi hamsi ning gmang hi, bonsi phirik phirik thao ba.
Ode, bo Peter jang Johan khe rem hi Solomon ni mandu thiyaba ha dongba ha, khrip subung buthu hamsi ning gmang ba, ar bonsi niha bonsi khaipha buhi bojom japhai ba.

Peter bonsi khe nuba jang bonsi khe sing ba, Nisi Israel subung buthu, ebo buthu khe snadi jabani nisi gmang ba? Jini raothai jang, jing Madai khe mani bani bokhe jing ham ri ba lai nisi ang khe naihi dong ba?
Abraham, Isak ar Jakob ni Madai, jini greng thuni Madai, jarni dangyasa Jisu khe muima khlai du. Nisi la bokhe rem rihi, Pilat haigerma bao lakha bo, boni sagang ha nisi nangjaoya ja ba.
Subung gathar ar dormo khe nisi la nangjaoya hi sthaibaiyaba khe se ri mane nisi khainsu ba.
Haiyu riyaba khe nisi sthai kha, thikhabo Madai ning bokhe githi ni phrang baija ri phin kha, bokhe jing sakhi ri du.
Ode boni bumu jang lon bani, boni bumu de ebo subung khe nuba jang nisi tharmaiyaba khe bo rao ri du. Jadu, boni khlai hi lonma dong phaiyaba ha nisi khrip ni muh ha bo ham rithar kha.
Thikhabo, O daphlungrao, nisini hojarao bo sida se bani bonsi dangba lai ning, nisini sida jabani se ebo khe nisi dangba thihi ang tharmai du.
Thikhabo, Madai ning khrip gorasalirao ni khuh ha, Krista de dukhu jamani grao khe sagang ha ning bo thida kha; olei jasosi ning, gibi jang sophai riba se.
Odebani, nisini phap buthu khe sajam phu mane khlai hi, khah phinhi phai lah, ode da naiphin si;
Odebani, Gabra ni phrang smao mani bubli buthu sophai phuma, Krista Jisu, nisine khlai hi bo salaiyaba khebo, bo haiha phuma.

Bede thikhade, khrip slam slammani bubli sophaiya si de sorgo ha bokhe dengma se; bokhe slam slammani grao khe de Madai ning phirthi sangsai jenba ni phrang jarni gorasali gathar dongyarao ni khuh jang sainthi kha.
Moses jar ning thi ba, Gabra Madai ning ang subung slam ba lai ning, nisi ni basathu ni bising ha saosi gorasali slam ri ma se. Bo ning nisi khrip niha grao sainthi nang, bokhe nisi khna lah.
Ode, subung asaba bo, bo gorasali ni grao khnama nangjaoyayaba de, subung ni bising ni phrang bonsi sjam jaoma se, ode bo thi kha.
Samuel dong ba sosi ni phrang bislei gorasali bonsi ni yaohon ni subung buthu jang phai hi, grao sainthiyaba de duha ni grao khe bonsi sainthi da re.
Nisi de gorasalirao jang grao khayaba ni basathu se. Madai ning, Abraham niha, Nini sarik surik buthu jahi habsao ni khrip jadi hamthai maima se thihi nisi ni greng buthu niha bo hanggai kha.
Madai ning jarni dangyasa khe salai hi, nisi ni phap buthu khe dangkhlai rihi nisi khe hamthai ri mane khlai hi, nisi niha bo sagang thao haihayaba se, ode bo thi ba.
Peter jang Johan, subung buthu niha bonsi grao sainthiba ha, Jonthairao, Bikhoh ni hojarao, Saddukairao, bonsi ni gede srap sophai ba.
Bonsi malaine sling rihi ode, Jisu ni dara jang githi ni bising ni phrang baijaphin bani grao khe bonsi thibani, bonsi khah ha hamsi ning jajaoya ja ba.
Ode, bonsi, bonsi khe remhi, sainbli jakha bani dakhna sosi ne khlai hi phatho ha bonsi khe jeb ba.
Thikhabo, grao khnayarao subung gabang mani ba; bangba ja kha de miyahrao gaja rjing bowa lai ja du.
Odehe, gibin basain ha bonsini hojarao, khraorao, Dara khe slingriyarao, Jerusalem ha bojom ja ba,
Jonthai dedao thaoyaba Anna, Kaiapha, Aleksandra, Jonthai dedao thaoyaba ni bumu buthu khrip jang dong ba.
Peter jang Johan khe boni gejer ha bonsi song ri ba, Ebo khusi khe sereni hukhum jang, sereni bumu jang nisi dang ba? thihi bonsi sing ba.
Peter de Bese Gathar jang gablai hi, bonsi niha, Khrip subung hojarao,
subung raoyayaba khe ham ri bani balam ha, ebo subung la bede ham ba thihi dini ang khe nisi nai nai kha de,

nisi khrip bo tharmai lah, Israel ni khrip subung bo tharmai la thing, Nazareth Jisu Krista khe kross ha nisi dikthai hi Madai ning subung githi ni bising ni phrang bokhe baija ri phin kha; boni bumu jang bo subung de eraha nisini sagang ha song du.
Ebo ning Madai ni laisi ha thiyaba,
Nisi noh dangyarao, nisi longthai dangkhlaiyaba,
bokhe suhi longthai nangdao thaoyaba ja kha, thiyaba bo ning ja kha.
Gibin saosi niha bo sogoma giri, nokhasao ni bakhla ni subung buthu ni bising habo jing khe sogo mani gibin bumu musibo giri, ode bo thi ba.
Peter jang Johan khitha raoba khe bonsi nuhi, laisi ringyayarao ode sida sada subung se thihi bonsi tharmai hi, bonsi gmang lai ba. Jisu niha bonsi dongba thihi bonsi tharmai kha.
Thikhabo, bonsi hamriyaba subung khe bonsi ni rogong ha songba nuhi, musi khebo bonsi niya phuya kha.
Odebani, bonsi bisar ni phrang bonsi khe haiha bani yaohon ha, bonsi jar jang jar sainlai ba.
Ebo subung buthu khe jing bede khlai ma? Gmang thaosisiyaba khusi bonsi dang du thihi Jerusalem ha dongyarao khripbo khna thar kha, jing bo niya phuya,
thikhabo, subung niha ebo grao ar gublungya mane khlai hi, duha ni phrang saosi nihabo ebo bumu jang grao thiya mane khlai hi jing ran nang, ode bonsi thi ba.
Odebani, bonsi khe bonsi longhi, Jisu ni bumu lahi grao thiya mane bonsi magna ba.
Thikhabo, Peter jang Johan de bonsi niha, Madai ni muthai jang Madai ni grao khe maniba thane, nisi ni grao khe maniba jadao, bokhe bao lah.
Jing de jing jinis nuyaba jang khnayaba buthu khe sainthiya hi dongphuya, ode bonsi thi ba.
Odehe, bonsi khe ranphin daohi, bonsi haiger ba. Subung bang bani saja ri mane bonsi hajora maiya; bonsi khusi dang bani khrip subung bo Madai khe bakhan khlai lai du.
Bo gmang thaosisi khlai hi ham riba de nokha maithai jang bisagin thane bo bangdao kha.
Peter jang Johan de bonsi goba jang bonsi ni dol buthu ni bising ha thang hi, Jonthaimarao jang khraorao bonsi niha thiyaba khrip grao khe khna rithar ba.
Bo grao buthu khe khnayarao de khurang baosi jahi bol jang Madai niha, Gabra, ning pirthi buthu, nokhasao buthu, sagor buthu, ode boni bising ha dongyaba khrip khebo, ning se slam ba;
ning ning Bese Gathar jang, jini greng nini dangyasa David ni khuh jang ebo grao khe thi ba;
Jentailrao snadi jabani bonsi thamsi baigo ba?
Khrip jadi snadi jabani jinis haglai khe bonsi bao ba?
Gabra jang boni Krista ni basao ha la,
Habsao ni rajarao bonsi naijiya ja ba,
Hojarao bo bonsi longthim lai ba.
Ebo nolei ha de nini dangyasa gathar, ning thao huyaba Jisu ni basao ha, Herod jang Pontia Pilat jang, Jentailrao jang Israel subung buthu gibi jang bonsi longthim lai ba.
Nini yao jang nini khasu jang khah mane khlai hi ning sagang ha ning salai dayaba bokhe ning bonsi dang du.
Odebani, duha O Gabra, bonsi ni raothai buthu khe nai lah; nini lengrao khe khitha raoma jang nini grao khe sainthi ri lah.
Subung buthu khe ham ri mani khlai hi, nini yao khe phlao lah; ode nini leng Jisu ni bumu jang sin ode gmang thaosisiyaba khusi dang phunu ri lah, thihi bonsi bi ba.
Bonsi bi blaiba jang bonsi ni dongthan noh khe smao hi, bonsi khrip bo Bese Gathar jang gablai hi, khitha rao dada Madai ni grao khe sainthi kha.
Lonyarao de khah masi, baothai masi jahi bonsi dong ba; bonsi ni bising ha masi bo bonsi ni rang dongyaba khe, Ani se thihi thiya; khrip jinis khe bonsi yaowai phalai re.
Apostolrao de raothai jang Raja Jisu thang hi baija phinyaba ni grao khe sakhi rihi, bonsi khrip ni basao ha hamsi ning khasaoma dong ba.
Bonsi ni bising ha saosi bo suliya jaya, hah buthu, noh buthu, bonsi niha dongyaba si khe bonsi phain hi boni dam khe labu hi,
Apostolrao ni igah rogong ha bonsi deng re; ode, bonsi nangyaba khe jagothai khrip ne bonsi ron re.
Ode, Josef, Levi jadi ni subung, Kupra hahgojo ha dongyaba, Apostolrao bokhe Barnaba thiyaba (boni bumu ni ortho de santi ni basa) de,
jarni hah dongyaba khe phain hi, boni dam khe labu hi, Apostolrao ni igah rogong ha deng kha.
Thikhabo, subung saosi, boni bumu Anania, boni bihih Sapphira jang bonsi dong ba. Anania de hah phain hi, boni bihih bo tharmai hi, boni dam khe gejesi bo dengkhao ba,
ode, gejesi khe labu hi Apostolrao ni igah rogong ha bokhe deng ba.
Peter bokhe thi ba, Anania, Bese Gathar khe thokhi mane ode hah ni dam khe gejesi dengkhao mane khlai hi snadi jabani Soithan jang nini khah ha gablai rijao ba?

Bo nini yao ha dongdu si nini ning niya na? Ning phain bani yaohon habo boni dam de nini grao ha dengya na? Snadi jabani eleiyaba grao khe nini khah ha ning bao ba? Subung khe ning thokhiya, Madai khe se ning thokhi ba, ode bo thi ba.
Anania de bo grao khe khna ba jang bo galai hi thih lang la kha; ode, khnayaba si de hamsi ning khinlai hi dong ba.
Nagarao de baija hi, dolei slam dada, bain lang hi bonsi bokhe phip kha.
Bubli gontha tham ni yaohon ha se, musibo mithiya hi boni bihih bo hapsing phai ba.
Peter bokhe sing ba, Hah khe olei jang se ning phain ba? aniha thi sang.
Boni bihih thiphin ba, Om, olei jang se ning phain ba.

Odehe, Peter boniha, Snadi jabani Gabra ni Bese Gathar khe nainai mane nisi graosi jaba? Nai lah, nini basai khe phipyarao ni yapha de derga rogong ha sophai kha, ning khebo bonsi bainlang ma se, ode bo thi ba.
Boha ning boni igah rogong ha, bo galai hi bobo thih lang la kha. Ode, nagarao hapsing phai hi, bo thih hi dongba khe nuphai hi, bonsi bainlang hi, boni basai ni rogong ha bo khebo phip kha.
Ode, longjomrao khrip bo ebo grao khe khnayaba si de hamsi ning khinlai ba.
Subung ni bising ha Madai ning Apostolrao ni yao jang sin ode gmang thaosisi gabang khusi dang re. Bonsibo khrip jang khah masi jahi Solomon ni hakhli ni khepsa ha bonsi bojom ja re.
Gibin subung de saosibo bonsi ni bising ha dongpha raoya; thikhabo, bonsi khe nalai bakhan khlai re.
Thikhabo, bo gadain lonyarao gabang miyah jang masainjik jang Gabra niha ning bonsi bangdao pha lang re.

Odebani, subung limyarao bo derga buthu ha bonsi bainhun hi, thuyam buthu ha, rih khe yenyaba buthu ha, bonsi thu rihi, Peter thangba lamai jang bonsi sigring jangbo gejesi khe thikhabo, sainkhlim phu mani khlai hi bonsi bao ba.
Odehe, Jerusalem gabasi ni nolei beren ni phrang subung buthu limyarao bo, sgain gusu jang dukhu rijaoyarao khe labu hi, bonsi bojom japhai ba; bo buthu khebo bonsi ham rithar ba.
Odehe, Jonthaima dedao thaoyaba jang boni lugurao, bonsi khrip gaba phai ba, (boni lugurao de Saddukairao ni dol se), hamsi ning bonsi hingsa jahi,
Apostolrao khe bonsi remhi, noleikhor ni phatho ha bonsi khe jeb kha.
Thikhabo, Gabra ni degla sao jang derga buthu khe khuru phai ba, ode bo khe bajiha lang hi thi ba,
Thang lah, Madai ni bikhoh ha song hi, khrip subung niha ebo hayu ni grao khe sainthi lah, ode sani ba.
Apostolrao bo grao khe khna hi, nokha naima jaba bubli ha, Madai ni bikhoh ha hap hi, bonsi sling ri ba.

Jonthaima dedao thaoyaba jang boni lugurao phai hi, bisardarrao jang Israelrao ni grengrao ni khraorao bonsi khrip longthim lai hi, Apostolrao khe labu mani khlai hi, phatho khoh ha bonsi subung haiha ba.
Thikhabo, subung remyarao de sohi dada, bonsi khe maiya, odebani bonsi phaiphin la hi,
Phatho ni noh de hamsisi phrao hi, bokhe raokhiyarao bo derga ha songhi dongba khe jing nu ba, ode boni bising ha saosi khebo jing nuya, bonsi ode thi ba.
Boha, Madaikhoh ni hoja ode Jonthaimarao bo grao khe khna hi, Ebo khe bede ja ba? thihi bonsi ni balam ha hamsi ning khah waimu nang ba.
Odehe, subung saosi phai hi, bonsini ha sainthi ba, Nai lah, phatho ni noh ha dengjaoyarao Madai ni bikhoh ha songhi subung buthu khe bonsi sling ri du!
Odebani, hoja de subung remyarao jang bonsi thang hi noharirao khe khin bani bonsi hamsisi labu ba. Ode niyakha de bonsi longthai jang lemjaoma khe bonsi khin ba.
Bonsi labu hi sophai ba jang bonsi khe bisardarrao ni sagang ha song ri ba. Ode, Jonthai dedao thaoyaba bonsi niha,

Ebo subung ni bumu jang slingriya mane khlai hi nisi khe jing magna ba, bokhe wainso lah; nisi ni grao khe sling ri hi Jerusalem ha nisi gablai thar ri kha, bo subung sthaiyaba khe jini gorna ha hokhlai ma bao du, thihi jo ba.
Thikhabo, Peter jang Apostolrao, Subung ni grao thabo Madai ni grao khe jing mani ma nangdao.
Nisi Jisu khe bondo ha khasi hi sthaiyaba de jini grengrao ni Madai ning bokhe mathang hi baija riphin kha.
Bo jar ning Madai ni Raja jang ode sogoyahsa jahi dong mane khlai hi jarni yaoda gede bokhe sugu kha. Israelrao khe phap ni phrang khah phin rihi sogo mane khlai hi,
Bo grao khe sakhi riyarao jing ning ja kha. Bese Gathar Madai ning boni grao maniyarao si niha bo ri kha, boni bo sakhi se, ode thihi bonsi thiphin ba.
Bonsi de bo buthu grao khe khna ba jang bonsi ni khah ha jajaoya jahi bonsi sthaima bao kha.

Thikhabo, bisardarrao ni bising ha de, boni bumu Gamaliel, Pharisai, Dara tharmaiyaba, khrip subung ni bising ha bumu jadao thaoyaba, subung saosi khe bo song rihi, bo buthu khe baigo da ri mane khlai hi bo hukhum ri ba,
ar bisardarrao niha thi ba, Nisi Israel subung buthu, ebo buthu ni basao ha nisi khusi dangma baoyaba khe girik lah.

Ebo ni sagang habo Ang subung gedeba se thihi Theoda thiyaba dongphai ba. Bo subung niha gabang subung rjabri lai bo jang baosi gaba lang la kha. Bo de sthaijao kha, boni grao khe maniyaba si de, bonsi khrip bo dra dri jathar hi bonsi musibo jaya kha.

Boni yaohon ha sainrik hi bumu reb khu ri mani basain ha Galili raji ni Juda bo dongphin phai ba. Boniha gejesi khe bo sikphin ba, thikhabo, bo de thih lang la kha, boni grao khe maniyaba si de, bonsi khrip bo dra dri jathar ba.
Odebani, ang nisi khe thi du, ebo subung buthu khe da dopha si, bonsi dong la ga thing. Elei bonsi khusi dangma baoyaba ode bonsi khusi dangyaba de subung se dang ba thikhade bonsi jam la ma se.
Bede thikhade, Madai se dangba thikhade, bonsi khe sajam phu nang niya; ode niyakha de, Madai jang se nisi nanglai ba jama se, bo ode thi ba.
Bo grao thiyaba khe bonsi jajao kha.
Odebani, Apostolrao khe bo longhi, bonsi suhi dohi, boni yaohon ha Jisu ni bumu jang grao thiya mane khlai hi magna hi, haiger kha.
Bisardarrao ni bising ni phrang bonsi baigo ba ha, boni bumu jang laji maikha bani, hamsi ning bonsi khaja kha.
Ode, nalaibo Madai ni bikhoh ha ode noh noh ha, Jisu de Krista ning thihi graojma sainthi hi sling ri ba, ode bonsi thiba thaoya kha.
Bo basain buthu ha rikphayarao bangdao phalang bani, bonsi nalai bo jinis ron ba ha, bonsi ni banjikrao khe baoya bani, Juda, Greek grao joyarao khe Juda, Hebrai grao joyarao ni basao ha berlai ba.
Odehe, bonsi jhigin Apostolrao, subung buthu khe jarni ha long hi thi ba, Madai ni grao khe sainthi ba haiger hi basang basao ha jing khusi dangba de ham nang niya.
Odebani, daphlungrao, nisi jarni bising ni phrang girikyaba ode Bese ha gablaiyaba subung, bumu hamba sni khe saikho lah; bonsi khe jing ebo buthu khe bisar khlai mane slam lai nang.
Thikhabo jing de, biyaba jang grao ni khusi dang hi ning dong ma se, ode bonsi thi ba.

Bo grao jang khrip subung buthu khe khaja ri du. Odebani, Stephan, lonma jang Bese Gathar ha gablaiyaba, Philip, Prokor, Nikanor, Timon, Parmen jang Nikol, Judarao niha hapyaba, Antiokei ni subung, khe bonsi saikho ba.
Bo buthu khe apostolrao ni sagang ha song ri ba, ode bonsi ni basao ha bonsi yao denghi bonsi bi ba.
Boha, Madai ni grao gublung thar ba, Jerusalem ha rikphayarao hamsi ning bangdao phalang ba. Ode, Jentail ni bising habo, lonma ha bonsi maniyaba ja kha.
Ode Stephan de gasainyaba ode raothai jang gablai bani, subung ni bising ha gmang thaosisi, ode sin gede gede bo phnu re.

Thikhabo, gejesi Judarao, ‘leng ni phrang goyarao’ thiyarao, Kurini nolei ar Aleksandria nolei buthu ha dongyarao, Kilikia raji ni subung gejesi, Asia raji ni subung gejesi, bonsi gaba lai hi, Stephan khe ran ba.
Thikhabo, boni girikma jang bokhe thipha riyaba Bese khe bonsi bo ni phrang hokhlai phuya.
Odese, subung buthu sereba sereyaba khe thi ba, Moses jang Madai khe se sijiba thihi jing khna ba!
Elei ning subung buthu, khraorao, Dara khe slingriyarao, bonsi jaokhu hi, Stephan khe rem hi, bisardarrao niha lang ba.
Odehe, bonsi mosol sakhi slam hi, ebo buthu khe thi ba, Ebo subung de ebo gathar hathan jang Dara khe hamsi ning siji re;
ebo Nazareth Jisu la ebo noh khe ruhi, Moses ni dara jinthane riyaba buthu khe gibin khlai nang, thihi bo thiba khe jing khna ba.
Boha, bisardarrao khrip bo Stephan khe nailai ba, boni mukhang khe degla ni mukhang lai bonsi nu ba.
Jonthai dedao thaoyaba thi ba, Ebo grao buthu la gibi ning?
Boha Stephan thiphin ba, Daphlungrao, Bupharao, khna lah! Jini greng Abraham Haran ha dong bani sagang ha ning, Mesopotamia raji ha bo dong khali, muima ni Madai de boni ha nujao phai hi,
boniha thi ba, Nini nolei jang nini greng ni phrang baigo hi, ninthane raji phnu riginyaba gede thang lah, thihi thi ba
Ode, bo de Kaldai raji ni phrang baigo hi, Haran ha dong hi kha. Ode, boni bupha thih bani yaohon ha, oraha ni phrang se duha dongyaba noh dongthan nogor gede Madai ning bokhe jai riphin ba.

Eraha de musi hathan khebo dong mane, boni igah dengthan bo bonthane riya; thikhabo, bo jang boni yaohon ni sarik surik sosi bo, don somphoti ne khlai hi ri mane bo basa mai mani sagang habo hanggai ba.
Boha Madai boni ha thi ba, Nini sarik surik buthu malai ni raji ha naorai jahi dong ma, ode bonsi jang leng slamjao ma, ode nokha maithai jang rjabri sosi dukhu rijao ma.
Thikhabo, Madai ning ede thiphin ba, Leng ne langginyaba jadi khe ang ning saja ri nang, ode, boni yaohon ha bonsi baigo nang, ebo hathan ha ning ani khusi khe bonsi dang ma se, odebo bo thi ba.

Odehe, Madai boni ha jogai bujuh raso bani grao kha ba. Odebani, Abraham thi ba, Isak hajai hi nokha sainjai ha boni bujuh rasoyaba khe khlai ba; ode, Isak ni phrang Jakob hajai hi, Jakob ni phrang se greng ni bumu jadi jhigin hajai ba.
Jakob ni basathu se Josef khe naijiya ja ba. Ode, Egypt gede bokhe phain ba, thikhabo, Madai bo jang baosi dong ba,

boni khrip dukhu ha bo sogopha lang hi, Egypt raji ni Raja khebo bokhe khasao rihi, subung buddi gnang se thihi bo tharmai riba. Odebani, bokhe Egypt raji ni ode jarni khrip noh ni basao habo hoja slam kha.
Odehe, Egypt jang Kanaan raji ni khrip hathan ha asari galai hi, hamsi ning dukhu sophai kha; ode jini greng buthu musi khebo bonsi maijiya kha.
Jakob Egypt raji ha mai dong thihi bo khna ba jang, jini greng buthu khe bo haiha ba. Ebo de sagangthao bonsi khe haijenyaba se.
Bonsi phingin thangba ha, Josef boni daphlung ne tharmai ri kha, ode Josef ni daphlungrao khe Pharao niha tharmai ri kha.
Odese. Josef jarni bupha Jakob jang boni daphlung khrip khebo long riba, ode bonsi khrip jang bisatham jra ja du.
Odehe, Jakob Egypt raji ha thang hi, oraha ning bo jang boni greng buthu thih kha.
Sekem nolei ha bonsi bainbu hi Abraham ning Sekem nolei ha Hamor ni basathu niha rang rihi, mangkhlong baraiyaba ha bonsi phip kha.
Madai ning Abraham niha grao hanggaiyaba sophai khali ha, subung buthu Egypt raji ha bonsi yerhi gabang bang lang la kha,
Josef tharmaiyayaba Raja gibin dong phai ba sosibo, bonsi dong ba.
Bo ning jini phagrarao khe thokhi hi bo dukhu ri ba, bonsi ni basathu khe bo hamya mane khlai hi bonsi dangkhlai ri ma galai ba.
Bo bubli ha, Moses hajaiphai hi, boni mukhang bo hamsi ning majang bani, bokhe nokha saintham sosi jarni bupha ni noh ha bonsi khrang ba,
ode, bonsi dangkhlai ba jang Pharao ni bisik bokhe lahi, bo jarni basa ne khlai hi khrang la kha.
Moses khe Egypt raji ni khrip buddi gyan khe sling ri hi, boni grao ode boni khusi bo hamsi ning blai kha.
Moses, nokha maithai jang bisagin japhai ba ha, bo jarni daphlungrao jang goron ma bao ba.
Bonsi ni bising ha subung saosi dukhu rijao ba khe nuhi, bokhe bo sogo ba; bo dukhu rijaoya bani baslai khe lahi, Egypt ni subung khe bo sthai kha.
Moses bo jarni yao jang ning bonsi khe dimkhao nang thihi boni daphlungrao buji ma thi hi bo bao ba, thikhabo, bonsi buji laya.

Gibin basain ha bonsi ni bising ha, subung gini jar jang jar nam jalai bani, bonsi ni gede bo baigo phai hi thi ba, Hoi, miyahrao, nisi bada buphlung se thi; snadi jabani nisi saosi jang saosi khe gajai ja ri ba? thihi bonsi khe bo bujai ba.
Thikhabo, boni lugu hamya daoyaba de Moses khe nekhlai phalang ba, Jini basao ha bisardar jang hojane khlai hi sere ning khe slam ba? ode bo thi ba.
Miya ha Egypt ni subung khe ning sthai ba lai, ning ang khe bo sthaima baoba na? ode bo thi ba.
Bo grao khe Moses khna ba jang, bo khailang hi, Median raji ha bo donghi ba, ode, oraha ning nana miyah gini hajai ba.
Boha, nokha maithai jang bisagin so bani yaohon ha, Sinai hading ni hajengling ni buphrip ha, wai jingyaba ha, degla saosi boni rogong ha nujao ba.
Moses de bokhe nu ba jang, hamsi ning gmang ba; ode, bokhe gabasi nai mane thang ba ha Gabra ni khurang jang,
Ang nini greng buthu ni Madai se, Abraham ni Madai, Isak ni Madai, Jakob ni Madai se, ode bo thi ba.
Boha Gabra bokhe thi ba, Nini yapha ni phrang nini yaphadap khe kho lah, ning songyaba hathan de hah gathar se.
Ang ning gibi jang jarni subung buthu Egypt ha dongyarao ni dukhu hadi khe nu kha. Bonsi khe sogo mane khlai hi ang thangma bao du. Phai, duha ning phai lah, ang ning khe Egypt raji ha haiha nang.

Bo Moses khe, Hoja jang bisardar ni khlai hi ning khe sere slam ba? thihi bonsi niya ba, buphrip ha degla boni ha nujaoyaba se bokhe juru hi, Madai jar ning hoja jang sogo ginyaba ja mane khlai hi bo ning haiha ba se.
Bo ning Egypt ha ja thing, sagor gajao ha ja thing, hajengling ha ja thing, ode maithai jang bisagin ni bising ha, gmang thaosisi ode sin buthu khe phnu phalang hi, bonsi khe bo langsmai ba.
Israel sarik surik buthu niha thi ba, Madai ang khe slamba lai ning, nisi ni daphlungrao ni bising ha, subung saosi gorasali nisi ne slam ri nang, thiyaba Moses ning ja kha.
Bo hajengling ni githimyarao ni gejer ha Sinai hading ha sorgo ni degla jang sainlaiyaba ode jini greng buthu jang baosi dongyaba bo ning ja kha; jinthane ri mane khlai hi grao gathang layaba bo se.
Jini greng buthu boni grao khe bonsi mani ma nangjaoya hi, bonsi niya hi bo khe rikhlai hi, jarni khah buthu khe Egypt raji gede ha bo thangphin la kha.
Odebani, bonsi Aaron khe thi ba, Jini sagang gede langsmaiyaba ja mane khlai hi, madairao a ne slam ri lah; Moses Egypt raji ha jing khe langsmaiyaba khe boni balam ha jing tharmaiya.
Boha, bo buthu ne musu jla ni saokhuli khe mih dain hi bonsi khlim ba, ode bonsi ni yao jang baigoyaba ni basao ha bonsi khaja ba.
Odebani, Madai boni mukhang phinhi haiger kha, nokhasao ni sathrai buthu khe khlim phu mane khlai hi saosi khe bo naiya kha; bedehe gorasali ni khuh jang thi ba,
O Israel jadi buthu, hajengling ha
nokha maithai jang bisagin sosi,
mih bandai jang mih sthai hi ang khe nisi jirik ba?
Molek ni rih ni noh ode,
Rephan madai, sathrai khebo khlim mane khlai hi,
boni saokhuli khe nisi slamyaba buthu khe se nisi mani lai re;
Odebani, Babulon banar gede ang nisi khe lang nang, thihi reb ba lai.
Bo saokhuli khe nuba lai slam mane khlai hi sere khe Moses thiba, bokhe bisar khlai mane, jini greng buthu hajengling ha jing sakhi riyaba rih ni noh ning bonsi niha dong.

Ebo khe ning jini phragrarao ni phagra japhin khabo, bonsi la phalang hi, Madai ning jini phragrarao ni sagang ha Jentail khe bo rikkhlai jaoyarao raji khe bonsi lala khali, Joshua jang baosi bonsi hap pha hi, David dongphai ba sosi oraha ning bo dong ba.
Bo David de Madai ni muh ha hamjaodao hi Jakob ni Madai ne khlai hi dongthan dang ri mane bo sain ba.
Thikhabo, Solomon se bo noh khe dang ri ba.
Thikhabo, jadaothao ni Madai de yao jang noh dangyaba ha bo dongya; Gorasali thiba lai,
Gabra thi du, Sorgo de ani khamthan se,
ar phirthibo ani yapha dengthan se;
Ning anthane bedeyaba noh dang ri ma?
Ani lenggothan la beleiyaba hathan ja ma?
Ebo buthu khrip khe ani yao jang ang slamyaba niya?
Subung haglairao, khah jang khmao rasoyayarao, nisi thaoglao ni Bese Gathar khe nangjaoya, nisi ni phagrarao dangba lai ning nisibo dang du.
Nisi ni phagrarao la sere gorasalirao khe dukhu riyaba dong? Subung hamdaothao phai mani grao sainthi dayarao khe bonsi sthai ba, ode, subung gibi khe remriyaba, ode sthaiyarao nisi ning ja kha.
Sorgo ni deglarao rilangyaba Dara ni bisar khe nisi mai kha, thikhabo bo khe nisi yaowaiya, bo ode thiba.
Bisardarrao bo grao khe khna ba jang, bonsi ni khah ha jajaoya hi, Stephan ni basao ha bonsi hathai wai ba.
Thikhabo, bo de Bese Gathar ha gablai bani, sorgo gede naikhu hi, Madai ni muima khe ode Madai ni yaoda gede ha Jisu song hi dong ba khe nuhi bo thi ba,
Nai lah, sorgo khuru hi dongba khe ang nuha du, ode, Madai ni yaoda gede ha Marsi ni basa songhi dongba khebo ang nuha du.
Boha, khurang bol jang bonsi jirik khao hi, bonsi ni khmao khe yao jang muthu hi, bonsi graosi jahi boni gede phai ba.
Nogor ni phrang bokhe bonsi rik khlai hi, longthai jang lem ba. Boni sakhi jayaba de saosi naga, boni bumu Saul thiyaba ni igah rogong ha bonsi ni rih buthu bonsi dengthar ba.
Stephan khe longthai jang lemba ha, bo Gabra khe, Raja Jisu, ani bese khe lang lah! thihi long ba.

Boha bo yasgu thuhi, khurang bol jang jirik khaohi thi ba, Gabra, ebo bonsi khusi gajai dangyaba khe bonsi ni basao ha da galai ri, Bo grao khe bo thiblai ba jang bo thu lang kha. Saulbo boni thihba khe jajao kha.
Bo basain ha de, longjom Jerusalem ha dongyaba buthu khe bonsi hamsi ning dukhu ri jenba; odebani, Apostolrao khe garhi de Judai jang Samari raji ni khrip nolei ha, bo ejang ojang khaiphlung thar ba.
Madai khe maniyarao gejesi, Sephan khe nuhi hamsi ning gra kha, ode bo khe phip kha.
Thikhabo, Saul de longjomrao khe hamsi ning dukhu rihi, noh noh ha bo hap pha lang ba, masainjikrao, miyahrao khe sikhon hi, phatho ni noh ha bo phraojeb re.
Lonyarao, ejang ojang saidra jaoyarao, khrip hathan ha thang hi, graojma khe bonsi sainthi phalang ba.
Philip de Samari nolei ha thang hi, Krista ni grao khe baipha lang ba.
Subung buthubo bo grao khe khna hi, bo gmang thaosisi khusi dang phnuyaba buthu khe nu dada, Philip grao thiyaba khe khah ri hi bonsi gainsong ba.
Sgain bese gusu jang gabang subung remjaoyarao bonsi ni bising ni phrang khurang bol jang jirik khao hi baigo ba, ar adur jayaba, ode khorarao bo bonsi hamthar ba.
Odebani, bo nogor ni subung buthu hamsi ning khaja lai ba.
Eboni sagang ha, subung saosi, bumu Simon thiyaba dong ba; bo jadu-montro khe yaowai hi Samari nolei ni subung buthu khe gmang ri re, ode bo jar khe subung gedeba thi la re,
ar khasiba ni phrang gedeba sosi, khrip subungbo bokhe man khlai hi thi re, Ebo subung niha Madai ni raothai dong, thihi bonsi thiyaba de ebo ning ja kha, thihi boni grao khe bonsi gainsong lai re.
Bo sagang basain ni phrang bonsi khe, jarni montro ni khusi jang gmang thaosisi khlai hi dang re; odebani bonsi bokhe mani re.
Thikhabo, Madai ni raji ni hamba graojma, Philip sainthiyaba khe lonhi, miyahrao ar masainjikrao bo baptisma la kha.
Boha, Simon bo lon hi baptisma la blai dada, bo Philip jang baosi dongpha ba. Sin jang gede gede raothai ni khusi buthu khe nuhi, bo hamsi ning gmang ba.
Apostol Jerusalem ha dongyarao, Samari nolei ni subung buthu, Madai ni grao khe lon kha thihi bonsi khna ba jang, bonsi niha Peter jang Johan khe haiha ba.
Bonsi sohiba jang, Bese Gathar khe bonsi maiphu mane khlai hi bonsi ne Madai bi ri ba.
Boni sagang ha, bonsi ni bising ha saosi ni basao ha bo Bese galaiya, Raja Jisu ni bumu jang se ning bonsi baptisma jaba kho.
Odehe, Peter jang Johan, bonsi ni basao ha yao deng hi, bonsi Bese Gathar khe mai kha.
Apostolrao yao deng bani se Bese Gathar khe bonsi riba thihi Simon nu hi,
Ebo grao ni raothai khe a nebo ri lah, asaba ni basao habo yao deng kha ning, bonsi Bese Gathar maiphu mane khlai hi, thihi bonsine rang rima bao ba.
Thikhabo, Peter bo khe thi ba, Nini rang de ning jang baosi jam thing. Bede thikhade ning la Madai riyaba yaosandi khe rang jang baraima se bisar khlai ba.
Ebo grao ha de ning gaba phaya, nini phantha bo giri; bede thikhade, nini khah Madai ni gede belengya.
Odebani, ning jarni ebo hamya ni phrang khah phin hi, Gabra niha bi lah, odese, nini khah ha baoyaba khe bo ning khe map khlai ma.
Bede thikhade, ning bikhli khayaba jang hamya jang khajao hi galaiyaba hathan ha dong thihi ang tharmai du, ode bo thi ba.
Simon de Peter jang Johan niha thi ba, Nisi thiyaba de musibo ani basao ha sophaiya mane khlai hi nisi ning Gabra niha a ne bi ri lah.
Bonsi sakhi rihi Gabra ni grao khe khna riba ni yaohon ha, Jerusalem ha thangphin la kha. Bonsi thangpha laiba ha, Samari raji ni subung buthu ni nolei buthu ha, hamba graojma khe sainthi phalang ba.
Gabra ni saosi degla, Philip khe thi ba, Baija hi, sain kharthi yaoda gede Jerusalem ni phrang Gaza lailangyaba lama ha ning thang la, bo lama hajengling khe lailang du.

Odebani, Philip baija hi thang la kha. Ode, oraha Ethiopia raji ni subung saosi, Ethiopia ni Rani Kandaki ni bakhla ha subung phida khaojaoyaba hoja dedaothao, boni somphoti khrip khe naisoyaba, Jerusalem ha Madai bi mani khlai hi bo phai ba.
Bo phaiphin baha de, bo jarni gorai ni gari ha kham hi gorasali ni laisi khe bo phuri phabu lai ba.
Boha, Bese Gathar Philip niha thi ba, Gabasi thang hi bo jang ja lah.
Philip bo subung phidao khaojaoyaba niha khaipha langhi, gorasali Isai ni laisi khe bo phuriba khna hi, Ning phuriyaba ortho khe buji du? thihi bo khe sing ba.
Bo thiphin ba, Saosi bo a ne thiphla riya kha la, ang bede buji phu ma?. Ode, boni ha khamphai mani khlai hi Philip khe bo jama ba.
Madai ni laisi phuriyaba de ebo ning ja kha:
Melma khe sthai mane langba lai bokhe bonsi lang ba,
melmasa boni bikhim khepyaba ni sagang ha, bo phirik phirik dongba lai,
bobo boni bukhuh khe khuruya.
Bo basasa jaba ni boni bisar de selajao ba,
Boni greng buthu ni kharmu khe sere ning thima kho?
Bede thikhala, habsao ni phrang boni hayu khe lang la kha, thi du.
Boha subung phida khaojaoyaba de Philip jang bo sainlai hi, boniha Gorasali eleiyaba grao khe thiba la, sere ni grao khe thi ba, jarni grao na malai ni grao? thihi sing ba.
Boha Philip grao joba, bo Madai ni laisi ni grao khe khitha ni phrang jenhi, boni ha Jisu ni grao khe thi ba.
Lama ha thang ba ha sereba dih ni hathan ha bonsi sohi ba, ode, bo phida khaojaoyaba thi ba, Nai lah, eraha dih dong, duha baptisma ne khlai hi sere ang khe mathao ma?
Boha, Philip bokhe thi ba, Ning khrip khasu ha lon kha de, ning lala phu du. Bo thiphin ba, Ang lon du, Jisu Krista de Madai ni basa ning thihi ang lon du.
Odehe, gorai gari khe bo songri hi, bonsi gini, Philip ar subung phida khaojaoyaba de dih ha thang kha, ode, Philip bokhe baptisma ri kha.
Dih ni phrang bonsi baigoba jang, Gabrani Bese Philip khe lang la kha. Phida khaojaoyaba de bokhe nuphinya kha, thikhabo, khajahi bo thang la kha.
Philip khe malai Azota nolei ha nuphin hi kha; ode, bo lailang hi, Kaisari nolei ha soya si de, nolei nolei ha hamba graojma khe bo sainthi phalang ba.
Thikhabo Saul, Gabra ni yaohon rikphayarao khe hophra mani grao ode sthaima baoyaba grao khe smai hi ning dong re.

Jonthai dedao thaoyaba niha bo thang hi, Damaska ha bojom jayaba khrip noh ha, subung buthu niha ri mani khlai hi bo laisi sain ba, bo lama ni subung asaba khebo, bo goron kha de, masainjik ja thing, miyah ja thing, kha hi labu phu mane khlai hi,
odehe, bo thangba ha, Damaska rogong gabasi sohiba jang boha ning nokhasao ni phrang jnama boni sersi giding jnaphai ba.
Bo hah ha galai hi, boni ha, Saul, Saul, ning la snadi jabani ang khe dukhu ri ba? thihi khurang khna ba.
Bo sing ba, O Gabra, ning sere?
Bo thiphin ba, Ang de ning dukhu riyaba Jisu se.
Thikhabo, baija hi, nogor ha hapsing lah, odehe, snadi dangma nang du, bonsi ning khe thi nang.
Saul jang baosi thangyarao thimane tharmaiya hi bonsi song hi gmang ba; bede thikhala, khurang bonsi khna du, thikhabo bonsi saosi khebo nuya.
Saul de hah ni phrang baija kha, ode bo muthai naiha ba, thikhabo bo musi khebo nuphuya kha. Odebani, bokhe yao remhi, Damaska ha bonsi langhi hapsing kha.
Nokha sain tham nuya hi, musi khebo bo jiya lingya hi dong ba.
Damaska ha ning, lonyaba saosi, boni bumu Anania thiyaba dong ba. Gabra bokhe saomi lai thi ba, Anania!
Boha bo thiphin ba, Gabra, ang eraha dong.
Gabra boni ha thi ba, Baija lah, ode Noleiyung Belengyaba thiyaba ha thang hi, Juda ni noh ha, Tarsa nolei ni subung, Saul thiyaba khe sing tha; khna lah! Madai bi hi ning dong,
odehe, boni bumu Anania thiyaba, subung saosi boni muthai khe nu ri mane khlai hi, boni basao ha bo yao deng ba jang muthai nu kha.
Boha, Anania thiphin ba, Gabra, ebo subung Jerusalem ha nini subung gatharrao ni basao ha gabang hamya khlai du thihi gabang subung ni khuh ni phrang boni balam ha ang khna ba;
eraha bo nini bumu khe layarao si khe rem mane khlai hi Jonthaimarao ni phrang grao ni hukhum mai hi ning dong thi.
Thikhabo, Gabra boni ha thi ba, Thang la ga, Jentailrao ni Rajarao, Israel greng buthu niha ani bumu khe labu mane khlai hi bo ang saikhoyaba mudik se.
Ani bumu ni khlai hi bo bislei dukhu khlai ma nang nang bonthane ang sainthi rima se.

Odebani, Anania thang hi, noh ha bo hapsing kha, ode boni basao ha yao denghi thi ba, Daphlung Saul, nini muthai nu mane ode Bese Gathar jang gablai hi ning dongphu mane khlai hi, Gabra, ning phaiba ha, ning jang nujaoyaba Jisu ning ang khe haiha ba se.
Boha ning boni muthai ni phrang smaba muphin lai galai hi, boni muthai nuphin kha; ode, bo baptisma la kha.
Makham jihi bo thar japhin kha, ode, Damaska ha lonyaba dongyarao ni bising ha khaisa basain bo dong ba.
Saul de sunagog buthu ha thang hi, Jisu de Madai ni Basa ning thihi bol jang sainthi ba.

Boha, bo grao khe khnayarao khrip bo hamsi ning gmang lai ba, Ebo subung la, Jerusalem ha boni bumu layarao khe dukhu riyaba niya kho? Ebo subung buthu de Jonthaimarao niha khahi lang mani balam jang se bo era phaiba niya? bonsi ode thi ba.
Thikhabo Saul, bol raodao phin hi, bo gibi gibi Krista ning thihi Damaska ha Juda dongyarao khe bo niyathai ba.
Basain galao ni yaohon ha Saul khe sthai mane khlai hi, Judarao masi jahi bonsi sainlai ba;
thikhabo, bonsi bisar khlaiyaba grao khe saosi subung tharmai kha. Bonsi bokhe sthai mane khlai hi nogor ni khorong daoglap ha sain hor jonhi dong re.
Thikhabo, boni yaohon rikphayarao bokhe lang hi, hor ha, khorong baji gede bonsi dikhlai kha.
Saul de Jerusalem gede thanghi sohi ba ha, yaohon rikphayarao jang goron laihi dongma bao ba. Thikhabo, bonsi khripbo bokhe khin ba; bede thikhade, yaohon rikphayaba se thihi bonsi lonya.
Odehe, Barnaba bokhe bo haijaoyarao niha langpha hi, lama ha Gabra khe goron bani balam ha, Jisu ni bumu jang Damaska ha khitha raoma jang boni grao khe bonsi niha bo sainthi ba.
Odebani, Saul de Jerusalem ha bonsi niha thang re, phai re, Gabra ni bumu jang khitha raohi graobo thi re.
Boha, Judaa, Greek grao yaowaiyarao ni bising ha, grao thihi, bo niyalaiba, thikhabo, bonsi de bokhe sthaima bao du.
Daphlungrao bo grao khe khnaba jang, Kaisari ha bonsi lang hi, Tarsa nolei ha haiha kha.

Odehe, longjomrao Juda raji ni haphai buthu ha, Galili raji ni haphai buthu ha, ode, Samari raji ni haphai buthu ha bonsi raodao raodao jahi, bonsi santi jang dong ba; ode, Gabra khe khin hi, Bese Gathar ni santi jang bonsi dong ba, ode, bonsi bangdao bangdao ja kha.
Peter khrip hathan ha thang ba, lamai jang Ludda nogor ha subung gathar dongyarao niha bo thang ba.
Oraha ning subung saosi, boni bumu Ainia thiyaba, adur jahi nokha maithai jai, thuyam ha thuhi dongyaba khe nu ba.
Peter bokhe thi ba, Ainia, Jisu Krista ning khe ham ri kha, baija hi nini yenyaba khe thon lah. Boha ning bo srap baija kha.
Odehe, Ludda nolei jang Saron haphai ha dongyarao khrip bo Ainia khe nuhi, Gabra ni gede bonsi phai ba.
Joppa nolei ha, lonyaba subung saosi, boni bumu Tabitha thiyaba, dong ba. (Greek grao jang de boni bumu Dorka se, boni ortho de mihsai se). Bo gabang hamba khusi dang hi riphain khe ri re.
Bo bubli ha ning limhi, bo thih lang la kha, ode, bokhe bonsi dugur rihi noh ni khutha basaothao ha thu rihi deng ba.
Ludda nolei de Joppa nolei ni rogong ha se bani, ode yaohon rikphayarao Peter khe oraha dong thihi bonsi khna hi, Phongsi phai thihi khainsu mane khlai hi boniha subung gini haiha ba.

Odehe, Peter baija hi, bonsi jang thangpha kha; ode, bo sohiba jang bokhe noh ni khutha basao ha bonsi lang ba, bo ha khrip masainjikrao boni rogong ha songhi, Dorka bonsi ni bising ha dongba ha bo sola slamyaba buthu, rih daoyaba buthu phnu hi bonsi gra lai ba.

Peter de bonsi khrip khe bo baigothar rihi, yasgu thuhi, bo Madai biba. Ode, manggathi khe bo nehi, Tabitha, baija lah, ode bo thi ba. Boha ning bo baija hi muthai nai kha, ode Peter khe bo nuba jang bo kham kha.
Peter yao phlao hi bokhe sik khu ba, ode subung gatharrao jang banjikrao khe longhi, bokhe gathang phnu kha.
Ebo grao khe Joppa nolei ni khrip bo khna thar hi, gabang subung bo bonsi Gabra khe lon kha.
Peter de gabang basain Joppa nolei ha Simon, migur slamyaba ni noh ha dong ba.
Kaisari nolei ha bumu Korneli thiyaba, subung saosi dong ba. Bo Italy dol thiyaba ni siphaiya rjasi ni hoja se.
Bo Madai khe maniyaba subung se, bonsi nokhorsi bo Madai khe khin re; ode, malai ne gabang jinis ri re, ar Madai niha bo bonsi hamsi ning bi re.
Bo ning sainbli japhai hi, saomi lai ragao sisi saogari jang Madai ni degla saosi boni ha hapsing hi, bokhe grao thiba khe nu ba, O Korneli, thihi.
Bo hamsisi nai dada khin ba, ode O Gabra, snadi? thihi sing ba.
Sorgo ni degla thiphin ba, Ning biyaba buthu jang jinis yaophayaba grao buthu khe wainso mane khlai hi, Madai niha sohi kha.
Duha, Joppa nolei ha subung haiha hi, subung saosi, Simon Peter thiyaba khe long tha.
Migur slamyaba Simon ni noh ha naorai jahi dong, boni noh jakha de sagor ni dergong ha dong.
Sorgo ni degla thang bani yaohon ha, Korneli jarni dangyasa ode Madai khe maniyaba siphaya saosi khe long ba.
Bonsi gini niha bo khrip grao khe sainthi blai hi Joppa nolei ha bonsi khe haiha kha.
Gibin basain ha, bonsi thangba ha, nolei gabasi ha sohi ba jang, Peter, sainjer ni makham jima ni bubli ha, Madai bima ni khlai hi, noh khim basao ha bo gakhu ba.
Bo hukhrijao phai hi, makham jima nangjao kha; thikhabo, bonsi ji mane salaiba ha ning, phain merei jao kha.
Nokhasao khuru hi sma ba bokhoh masi rih gedeba lai, sersi giding bogrong grongbri ni phrang khathai dada hah ha dikkhlai ba khe bo nu ba.
Boni bising ha de, igah gongbri ode hang gnang ar basao ha khrip jadi dao bo dong ba.
Boniha, masi khurang jang, Peter, baija hi, sthai hi ji lah, ode bo thiphai ba.
Thikhabo, Peter thi ba, Gabra, ang jiya dou, gathar niyayaba jang gathar khlaiyayaba asaba khebo ang jiya.
Phingin, khurang jang, Madai gathar khlaiyaba asaba khebo ning gathar niya da thi, ode thi ba.
Olei ning phintham ja kha, boha srap bo nokhasao ha sugu phin lang la kha.
Peter saomi lai nuyaba khe, bo la snadi ja kha thihi khah waimu nang hi dongba ha, Korneli subung haihayarao Simon ni noh khe singso kha, ode boha ning bonsi derga kholei ha songphai hi,
bonsi jirik ba, Simon, Peter thiyaba, eraha naorai jahi dong ba? thihi bonsi sing ba.
Peter boni saomi ni grao khe baohi dongba ha, Bese jang bokhe thi ba, Nai lah, ning khe subung gini smai du,
odebani, baija hi, akhai dada, musi khebo lonya jaya hi bonsi ni yaohon rikpha lang lah. Bonsi khe ang ning haiha ba se.
Odebani, Peter bo buthu ni sagang ha bo akhai hi, bonsi khe thi ba, Nisi smaiyaba de ang ning, nisi snadi khusi jang phai ba?

Bonsi thiphin ba, Korneli, siphaya rjasi ni hoja, jing khe haiha ba. Bo Madai khe khinyaba, Juda jadi khripbo man khlaiyaba, ar gibi subung se. Bo niha sorgo ni degla saosi nujao hi, ning khe boni noh ha thang mane longha du, ning grao sainthiyaba khna mane khlai hi.
Subung buthu khe noh ha longsing hi, bonsi khe thu ri kha.
Gibin basain ha, baija hi bonsi jang baosi bo thang ba, Joppa nolei ni subung sereba sereba lonyarao bo bonsi jang baosi thangpha ba.
Gibin basain ha, Kaisari nolei ha bonsi hapsing hi kha. Ode, Korneli de boha jarni apnarao ode jarni lugu khathik buthu khe bo longthim hi, bonsi khe jonhi ning dong ba.
Peter hapsing ma jaba ha, Korneli khe bo lamjao hi boni igah rogong ha yasgu thuhi Madai khe khlimba lai bo khe khlim ba.
Thikhabo, Peter bokhe yao remkhu hi, Song lah, ang bo subung se, thihi thi ba.
Bo jang baosi sainlai hi ning, noh bising ha hap ba, oraha subung gabang bojom jaba hi dengba khe bo nu ba.
Bonsi khe Peter thi ba, Juda jadi gibin jang dongpha lai ba bo gathar niyathai khe nisi ning mithi du; thikhabo, Madai ang khe thi du, asaba subung khe bo gathar gusu da thi.
Odebani se, ang musibo thiyahi nisi longba jang phai ba, duha ang nisi khe sing du, snadi khusi ni khlai hi ang khe long ba?
Korneli thi ba, Nokha saintham ja kha, ang jarni noh ha phintham hading ha biba ha, subung saosi rih guphu jnayaba khe phin hi ani sagang ha songphai hi, thi ba,
Korneli, ning biyaba khe khna ha kha, ode ning jinis yaophayaba buthu khe bo Madai tharmai kha,
Odebani, Joppa nolei ha subung haiha hi Simon, Peter thiyaba khe nini ha longha lah, bo sagor ni dergong ha, migur slamyaba Simon ni noh ha naorai jahi dong,
Odebani, nini ha ang srap subung haiha ba se; ning phai kha ham kha dou. Odebani, Gabra ning khe snadi grao thiba bokhe khna mane jing khripbo Madai ni sagang ha dong ba se.
Boha Peter thiba, Madai de subung hamjaodao hamjaoyadao jaya thihi gibi jang ang tharmai du;
thikhabo, khrip jadi ni bising habo sere bokhe khin hi, hamba khusi dangyaba si de, bo khaja jaoyaba subung jama se.
Bo ning, santi ni hamba graojma, Jisu Krista ni khuh jang sainthi hi Israel greng buthu niha grao haiha ba, (Jisu de khrip subung ni Gabra se).
Johan baptisma ni grao khe bai bani yaohon ha, Galili raji ni phrang jenhi, Juda raji ni khrip haphai ha grao gublung tharba khe nisibo mithi du thi.

Nazareth Jisu ni balam ni grao de, olei bokhe Madai ni Bese Gathar jang raothai ha lupha hi bo subung ni basao ha hamba khusi dang ba, ode Soithan jang dukhu rijaoya ba khrip khebo ham ri phalang re. Bede thikhade, Madai bo jang baosi dongpha du.
Juda raji jang Jerusalem ha bo khusi dangyaba buthu khrip ni jing ning sakhi se. Bokhe de kross ha dikpha hi bonsi sthai kha.
Thikhabo Madai ning bokhe nokha sain tham ha bo mathang phin hi, gibi jang bonsi ne phnu ri phai kha.

Ode khrip subung niha niya hi, boni grao ni sakhi ne khlai hi sagang ha, Madai ning saikho kha, jing ning subung githi ni phrang baijaphin bani yaohon ha bo jang baosi jipha laiyarao lingpha laiyarao se.
Bo githirao jang thanghi dongyarao ni basao ha bisardar ne Madai salaiyaba de ebo ning thihi, subung buthu niha bai mane ode sakhi ri mane khlai hi Madai ning jing khe sani ba se.
Sere bokhe lon du, boni bumu ni khlai hi phap buthu ni map mai ma se thiyaba boni balam khe gorasalirao khrip bonsi sakhi ri du, bo ode thi ba.
Odehe, Peter grao khe thisaiba ha ning grao khnayarao khrip ni basao ha Bese Gathar sophai kha.
Judarao ni bising ha lonyarao, Peter jang baosi phaiyarao, Bese Gathar riyaba khe Jentailrao ni basao habo lukhru bani hamsi ning gmang ba.
Bede thikhade, grao jophuyayaba jang grao thihi, Madai khe bakhan khlaiba khe khna kha.
Ebo ni balam ha, Elei subung buthu, jing lai Bese Gathar maiyarao de bonsi baptisma jaya mane khlai hi dih yaowaiba khe sere mathao phuma? thihi Peter thi ba.
Odebani, Jisu Krista ni bumu jang baptisma ri mani grao ri ba. Boni yaohon ha basain glao dongthao mane khlai hi bonsi bokhe khainsu ba.
Apostolrao ar Judai raji ni yaohon rikphayarao, Jentailrao bo Madai ni grao khe mani kha thihi bonsi khna ba.
Peter, Jerusalem ha sohiba jang jogai bujuh rasoba khlaiyarao bo jang grao banglai hi,
boni ha thi ba, Jogai bujuh rasoyayarao ni noh ha hap hi, bonsi jang baosi ning jipha lai ba, thihi bokhe jo ba.
Odebani Peter jenba ni phrang singyaba si khe bo thiphla ri ba;

Joppa nolei ha, ang Madai bihi dongba ha, ang mereijao hi dong ba; saomi lai masi rih bubim gedeba lai, bo grong grongbri khahi, nokhasao ni phrang dik khlaiba khe ang nu ba; ani rogong gabasi ha ning phai ba.
Bokhe ang naihi ning, phirthi ni igah gongbri, hagrani mih buthu, hang gnang jinis, ode basao ni dao buthu khe ang nu ba.
Odehe, ede khurangbo khna ba, Hoi Peter, baija hi sthai dada ji lah! thihi ang khe thi ba.
Thikhabo, ang thi du, Gabra, ang jiya dou! Gathar jang gusu ani khuh ha musi khali bo hapya!
Nokhasao ni phrang khurang phintham ha, Madai ning gathar khlaiyaba khe ning gathar niya da thi, thihi bo ang khe thiphin ba.
Olei jasosi ning phintham japhai ba; ode khrip jadi nokhasao ha sugu langphin jao kha.
Okhali ha, subung gatham, Kaisari nolei ni phrang ani ha bonsi haiha hi, ani dongthan hakhli ha bonsi song ba.
Bese jang jajaoya jaya hi bonsi ni yaohon rikpha mani khlai hi ang khe thi ba, ode, ebo daphlung dobo ang jang baosi phaipha hi Korneli ni noh ha jing hap ba.
Bo jini ha thi ba, Jarni noh ha sorgo ni degla songhi dong ba nuyaba khe, ode, sere sorgo degla jang thijaoba, Joppa nolei ha subung haiha hi, bonsi Simon Peter thiyaba khe labu lah;
bo nisi khe grao thi nang, boni grao ni dara jang ning ode nini nokhor buthu bo goma mai ma se, thiyaba grao khebo bo sainthi ba.
Odehe, ang thanghi grao thijen ba ha, jini basao ha Bese Gathar phaiba lai bonsi ni basao ha bo sophai ba.
Boha Gabra grao thiyaba khe ang wainso ba, Johan dih jang baptisma ri ba, thikhabo, nisi Bese Gathar jang baptisma mai ma se.
Madai jing khe yaosandi riba lai Jentailrao khe bo goma nangjao du thihi ang tharmai ba. Odebani, ang sere, Madai khe mathao phuma? thihi ang tharmai ba.
Bo grao khe khna ba jang, bonsi phirik phirik thao ba, Ode thikhade, Madai ning Jentailrao khebo khah phin hi haiyu mai mane nangjao du, thihi bonsi Madai khe bakhan khlai kha.

Stephan khe dukhu riba ha khaidrayarao de daopha lang hi daopha lang hi Phoiniki raji, Kupra hahgojo ha, ode Antiokei thiyaba sosi bonsi thang hi, Judarao niha garhi de saosi nihabo bonsi grao thiya kha.
Thikhabo, bonsi ni bising ha gejesi de Kupra hahgojo ode Kurini ni subung buthu se, bo buthu ning Antiokei ha bonsi sohi ba jang Greekrao nihabo Jisu ni hamba graojma khe bonsi khna ri ba.
Gabra ni yao jang bonsi khe juru dada, gabang subung lon hi, Gabra ni gede sagang tharlai kha.
Bonsi ni grao de Jerusalem ha longjom dongyarao ni khmao ha khna kha; odebani, Barnaba khe Antiokei sosi bonsi haiha kha.
Bo oraha sohi ba jang Madai ni khasaoma khe bo nuhi hamsi ning khaja hi, khah jang muh jang Gabra khe remsong hi dong mane bonsi khrip khebo bo sibring kha.
Barnaba hamba subung, Bese Gathar ar lonma jang gablaiyaba se bani, gabang subung bo Gabra ni gede phai kha.
Odehe, Barnaba Saul khe smai mane khlai hi Tarsa nolei ha thang ba, ode, bokhe bo nuba jang Antiokei ha bokhe labu ba.
Maithaisi phura longjomrao bojom jayaba ha bonsi jang baosi dongpha hi, gabang subung khe sling ri ba. Antiokei ha ning bo se khrip tha sagangthao Kristian thijao jenyaba de.
Bo bubli ha ning sereba gorasali Jerusalem ni phrang Antiokei ha thang ba.

Bonsi ni bising ha subung saosi, boni bumu Agaba thiyaba, songhi habsao khrip ha asari phai ma thihi Bese jang thijaoyaba khe bonsi ne khna riba. Bo asari de Klaudi thiyaba Raja jahi dongba ha sophai kha.
Odebani, lonyarao ning, blai ba lai lai, khrip Juda raji ha daphlung dongyarao ne khlai hi rang khrang hi, bonsi haiha ma bao ba.
Bokhe bonsi olei ning dang kha. Barnaba jang Saul ni yao ha, bo raji ni khrao niha bonsi ri kha.
Bo bubli ha, Raja Herod longjom ni subung gejesi ni basao ha dukhu rima baohi bo bonsi ni basao ha yao sugu ba.
Jakob, Johan ni daphlung khe, seng jang bo dainthai kha.
Boha Judarao de khah hamba khe bo nuhi, Peter khebo rem ma baophin ba (Bo basain jakha de humao giriyaba hon ni mel sohi phaiba basain se).

Peter khe rem bani yaohon ha phatho ha bokhe jeb ba, ode siphaiya bri bri khlai hi dol bri, bonsi slai slo khlai hi raokhi ri ba. Bede thikhade, baiglai mel jam bani yaohon ha khrip subung ni sagang ha bokhe labuhi bisar khlai ba bao ba.
Odebani, Peter khe bonsi phatho ha phirik phirik deng ba; thikhabo, longjomrao bonthane khlai hi khah jang muh jang Madai niha bi ri ba.

Herod subung buthu niha Peter khe labu mani sagang ha, okhali ni bohor ha de, Peter khe jingjri magin jang khahi siphaiya gini ni gejer ha thu ba, boha naiso hi raokhiyarao bo phatho khe bonsi naiso hi raokhi ba.

Srap khlai hi Gabra ni saosi degla boni rogong ha songphai hi, khutha bising ha jna phai hi, Peter ni sangkhreng ha yaosi jaopha hi bokhe masa ba, Sangga baija lah, ode bo thi ba. Ode, bokhe khayaba jingjri buthu galai lang la kha.

Sorgo ni degla ning boni ha, Jengkhong khahi nini jutha khe ga lah, ode thi ba. Bobo bo saniba lai dang la kha. Ode, sorgo ni degla boni ha, Nini rih khe hamsisi phin hi, ani yaohon ha phai lah, bo ode thi ba.
Peter de baigo hi, boni yaohon rikpha lang kha. Sorgo ni degla dongthai khe gibi ning thihi bo tharmaiya, bo saomi nuba lai se jajao ba.

Bonsi sagangthao ni naisoyaba jang boni gibin naisoyaba khe lailang bani yaohon ha de, baigo ginyaba ser ni derga ha sohi, bo bonsi ne khlai hi khuru lang la kha; ode, bonsi baigo hi, daoglap masi bonsi lailang kha. Bonsi thangsai ba ha ning, sorgo ni degla de srap dangkhlai hi thang la kha.
Peter smao ba jang, Gabra ning jarni degla khe haiha hi, Herod ni yao ni phrang, Juda subung buthu ni asama khrip ni phrang, bo angkhe sogo kha thihi duha gibi jang ang tharmai kha, bo ode thi ba.
Ode, tharmai hi Mari ni noh hah hap ba, bo Johan, Marka thiyaba ni buma se. Oraha ning gabang subung Madai bi dada bojom jahi dong ba.
Hakhli ni daoglap khe bo doba jang, mathla saosi, Rodi thiyaba lengjik, sing mane khlai hi bo phai ba.
Bo Peter ni khurang khe khna ba jang, khaja hi derga khe khruya hi khaising phin hi, Peter de derga kholei ha song hi dong, thihi sainthi ba.
Thikhabo, bonsi bokhe thi ba, Ning gibir ja kha. Thikhabo, Gibi jang ning thiba se, thihi bo thi ba. Boha bonsi thiphin ba, Boni sorgo degla janai du.
Peter de derga dohi ning dong ba; ode, bonsi derga khuru ba de, bokhe nuhi, hamsi ning gmang lai ba.

Bo bonsi khe phirik phirik dong mane khlai hi yao jang magna ba, Madai ning phatho ni phrang bo labu bani grao khe sainthi kha. Ode, Ebo grao khe Jakob jang boni daphlungrao nihabo sainthi lah, thi ba, ode, bo baigo hi raji gibin ha thangla kha.
Phorong japhai hi, siphaiyarao de, Peter bede ja ba? thihi bonsi hamsi ning waimu nang ba.
Herod de bokhe smai ba, thikhabo, maiya hi raokhi hi naisoyarao khebo johi, sthai mane khlai hi hukhum ri kha.
Odehe, Herod Judai raji ni phrang Kaisari nogor ha thang hi, oraha ning bo dongsong kha.

Herod de Tura jang Sidon nogor ni subung buthu ni basao ha bo hamsi ning jajaoya ja ba. Bonsi ning Blasta, rajani noh khe naisoyaba khe, bonsi jang baosi slam hi, graosi jahi, boni ha bonsi phai ba, ode bonsi ni nogor gede ni Raja ni nogor gede ni jimu barai lai bani mili mane bonsi khainsu ba.
Bo basain khali de, Herod ning Raja ni gainsari khe phin hi, Raja ni khamthan ha kham dada, bonsi niha bo grao thi ba.
Khrip subung thi ba, Ebo de Madai ni khurang se, subung ni khurang niya, thihi bonsi jirik khao ba.
Bo de Madai niha bakhan riya bani Gabra ni sorgo degla srap bokhe rem hi husrangma jang jijao hi bo thih lang la kha.
Thikhabo, Madai ni grao de gublung thar hi, bangdao phalang ba.
Barnaba jang Saul khusi khe dang blai hi, Jerusalem ni phrang bonsi phaiphin hi, Johan, Marka thiyaba khe labu pha kha.

Antiokei ha longjomrao ni bising ha ning grao sainthiyarao ode slingriyarao dong ba, bonsi Barnaba thu, Simeon, bonsi Niger thijaoyaba thu, Kurini nolei ni Lukia thu, Raja Herod ni daphlung Manaina thu, Saul thu se.
Bonsi Gabra ni khusi dang hi, hoh khongja dongba ha, Bese Gathar jang, Barnaba jang Saul khe anthane khlai hi, ang saniba lai khusi dang mane, gibin khlai ha, thiba.
Odebani, hoh khongja donghi, bonsi Madai bi blai bani yaohon ha bonsi ni basao ha yao deng hi bonsi khe haiha kha.
Odebani, Bese Gathar haijao hi, bonsi thangla kha. Selukai nolei ha thang hi, oraha ni phrang Kupra hahgojo ha rung jang bonsi thang kha.
Salamis nolei ha bonsi sohi dada, Juda bojom jayaba noh buthu ha Madai ni grao khe bonsi sainthi ba; Johan khebo bonsi ni khusi dang mani khlai hi langpha ba.
Odehe, bo hahgojo ha Paphos sosi bonsi thangpha lang hi, mosol gorasali, Juda subung saosi khe nu ba, boni bumu de Bar Jisu.
Bo de Rajani baslai ha khamyaba, Serjia Paula, subung girikyaba niha dongyaba se. Bo Rajani baslai ha khamyaba ning Barnaba jang Saul khe long hi, Madai ni grao khe khna ma nangjao ma.
Thikhabo, Elum (Bar Jisu ni gibin bumu, boni ortho de montro ringba thiyaba se) Raja ni baslai ha khamyaba khe lon riya mane baohi, bonsi jang niya lai ba.
Boha Saul, Paul thiyaba, Bese Gathar jang gablai hi bokhe naipha hi thi ba,
Ning subung thokhiyaba jang rege rege khrip ha gablaiyaba, Soithan ni basa, ning khrip jadi ha hamba giriyaba, ning Gabra ni lama belengyaba khe gugui khlai mane haigerya na?
Duha mithi lah, Gabra ni yao nini basao ha galai hi, nini muthai gana ja nang; ode, sain khe nu nang niya kha, bo ode thi ba.
Srap khlai hi andar jang jimi boni basao ha galai kha, bokhe yao rem mane smai kha.
Raja ni baslai ha khamyaba, bo sophaiya ba jathai khe nuba jang, Gabra slingriyaba grao khe hamsi ning gmang hi lon kha.
Paul de boni lugurao jang boha Paphos ni phrang rung ha thang hi, Pamphulia raji ni Perga thiyaba ha sohi kha; ode, Johan de bonsi khe dangkhlai lang hi Jerusalem ha bo thangphin la kha.
Thikhabo, bonsi Perga ni phrang thangpha lang hi, Pisidia raji ni Antiokei ha sohi kha; ode, lenggo basain ha bojom jayaba noh ha hap hi bonsi kham ba.

Odehe, Dara ni laisi jang Gorasalirao ni laisi phuri blai hi, bojom jayaba ni hojarao niha subung haiha hi sing ba, Daphlungrao, subung buthu sibring mani nisi niha dong kha de, nisi thi lah, bonsi ode thi ba.
Paul songkhu hi, yao sip hi thi ba,
Israel subung buthu ode Madai khe khinyarao, khna lah,
Israel buthu ni Madai ning jini greng buthu khe saikho hi, Egypt raji ha bonsi naorai jahi dong ba, oraha ni phrang Madai ni yao ni bol jang langthar kha.
Nokha maithai jang bisagin sosi hajengling ha bonsi khusi dangyaba buthu khe bo nai hi ning dong ba.
Kanaan raji ha jadi sni ni subung buthu khe sjam blai bani yaohon ha, nokha maithai jang rjabri gejer ni bising ha bonsi ni raji khe ning lala mane khlai hi bo ronpha lang ba.
Ebo khrip nokha maithai jang rjabri gejer nang ba. Ebo ni yaohon ha se gorasali Samuel ni bubli sosi bonsi ni bisardarrao ne bo nepha ba.
Boni yaohon ha, bonsi Raja sain ba; odebani, Madai ning Saul, Kis thiyaba ni basa, Benjamin sengphong ni subung khe bonsi ne Raja slam ri kha.

Bokhe nekhao bani yaohon ha se, bonsi ni Raja ne khlai hi David khe Raja slam ba. Madai ning jarni grao jang thi ba, David, Jesai ni basa, ani khah jang baosiyaba subung khe ang mai kha, bo ning ani nangjaoma khe phura dang ma se, ode thi ba.
Bo bongso ni bising ha Madai ning, jar grao hanggaiyaba lai jasosi ning, Israelrao niha saosi sogoyahba Jisu khe bo haiha ba.
Jisu jarni khusi dangjenba ni sagang ha, Johan de khah phinhi phap khe dangkhlai hi baptisma labani grao khe Israel subung khrip jadi ni bising ha sainthi kha.
Johan, bo jarni khusi khe phura dangba ha, thi ba, Ning ang khe snadi buji ba? Bo ang niya dou. Thikhabo, nai lah, ani yaohon ha sereba subung phai du, boni jutha kho ri mane bo ang gathaya.
O daphlungrao, Abraham ni greng ni basa thu, nisi ni bising ha khrip Madai khe khinyarao, jini ha ebo sogoma ni grao khe haiha kha!

Jerusalem ha dongyarao, ode bonsi ni hojaraobo, bokhe bonsi tharmaiya bani, ode gorasalirao nalai lenggo basain ha phuriyaba khe bonsi bujiya bani, bo khe gajai rihi bo grao buthu khe bonsi phura khlai ba.
Bonsi sthai mane sosi boha musibo gajai maiya; thikhabo, Pilat niha bo khe sthai mane bonsi khainsu ba.
Ode, boni balam ha rebyaba grao buthu khe phura khlai hi, bo khe kross ni phrang dikkhlai hi mangkhlong ha thu ri ba.
Thikhabo, Madai ning bokhe githi ni phrang mathangphin hi baija ri kha,
Galili raji ni phrang Jerusalem sosi bo jang baosi thangpha laiyarao gabang basain sosi bonsi jang nujao ba; bo subung buthu de duhabo subung niha bo grao khe sakhi ri du.
Jing bo jini greng buthu niha grao hanggaiyaba ni balam ha khajama ni graojma khe nisine sainthi phai du.
Odelai ning, Madai ning Jisu khe baija ri hi, bo ning hanggaiyaba khe jini greng buthu ni khlai hi phura khlai kha; Bakhan ni Rajabthai maginyaba ha reb ba:
Ning ani basa se dou,
Dini ha ning khe ang hajai ri kha.
Saoyaba hathan ha thangphinya mani khlai hi, Madai ning bokhe subung githi ni bising ni phrang mathang bani balam habo ede thi du,
David niha khasaoma hanggaiyaba buthu khe,
Nini ha ang ri nang.
Odebani, bo ar masi rajabthai habo thi du:
Ning jarni subung gathar khe sao mane ri nang niya.
Bede thikhade, David Madai nangjao ba lai jarni bubli ha bo khusi dangblai hi, thulang la kha, ode jarni greng buthu niha thuhi bo saolang la kha.
Thikhabo, Madai mathang phinyaba de musi khali bo sao nang niya.
Odebani, daphlungrao, nisi tharmai lah, eboni khlai hi se phap map mai mani balam ni grao khe nisi niha bo sainthi ba;
sere bokhe lon du, khrip habo gajai ha galai rijao nang niya, odebani Moses ni dara jang de nisi gajai jayahi de dongphuya.
Odebani, girik lah. Ode niyakhade, gorasalirao ni laisi ha bonsi thiyaba grao de nisi ni basao habo sophai ma se.
Nisi musuyarao, nai lah!
Ode gmang hi jam lang lah,
Bede thikhade, nisi thanghi dongba basain buthu ha ang masi khusi dang du,
bo jinis khe malai nisi khe thi la khabo nisi de lon nang niya.
Paul jang Barnaba sunagog ni phrang baigoba jang, subung buthu gibin lenggo basain ha bo grao khe thiphin mane khlai hi khainsu ba.

Odehe, bojom jayarao dra thar ba jang, Judarao jang bonsi ni dormo khe maniyaba Jentailrao gabang subung Paul jang Barnaba jang bonsi rikpha hi bonsi jang sainlai ba, ode Madai ni khasaoma ha dongsong mane khlai hi bonsi khe sibring ba.
Lenggo basain gibin ha, bo nolei si jang Madai ni grao khe khna mani khlai hi bonsi bojom japhai ba.
Thikhabo, Judarao subung bang ba khe nuhi, hingsa ja ba, ode Paul grao thiyaba khe jajaoya hi bonsi hamsi ning grao niya lai ba.

Paul ar Barnaba, khitha raoma jang thi ba, Madai ni graothai khe sagangthao ha nisi niha sainthi ma nangjao ba muh. Thikhabo, nisi bokhe dangkhlai bani, ar nisi jar khe thaoglao ni haiyu mai mane latha giri bani, duha Jentailrao ni gede jing sagang lang ma se.
Bede thikhade, Gabra ning olei jing khe sani du,
Ang ning khe Jentailrao niha jna ri mane slam kha,
Phirthi grongbri sosi sogoma nisi sophu mane khlai hi, thihi reb ba lai.
Jentailrao bo grao khe khnaba jang bonsi khaja hi, Madai khe bakhan khlai hi, ode thaoglao hayu ni khlai hi saikhu jaoyaba khrip bonsi lon kha.
Gabra ni grao bo raji ni haphai ha gublung thar ba.
Thikhabo, Judarao masainjik man gnang, Madai khe lonyarao ode nolei ni khraorao khe khuphai khao hi, Paul jang Barnaba khe bonsi dukhu rihi bonsi ni raji ni phrang rik khlai ba.
Ode, bonsi, bonsi ni basao ha bonsi ni yapha ni haduri khe thisa hi, Ikoniam ha sohi kha.
Antiokei ni lonyarao khajama ar Bese Gathar jang gablai thar kha.
Ikoniam ha Judarao bojom jayaba noh ha Paul jang Barnaba hapsing ba. Boha bonsi jang grao sainthi ba, odebani Greek jang Juda gabang bo lon la kha.
Thikhabo, lonma nangjaoya Judarao, Jentailrao ni khah ha bonsi sibring hi, daphlungrao khe bonsi nam jalai ri ba.

Odebani, Gabra ni grao khe khitha rao hi thi dada, oraha ning Apostolrao budu galao dong hi, boha ning sin ode gmang thaosisi khusi dang rihi bonsi ni yao ni phrang, bo jarni khasaoma ni grao khe sakhi ri ba.
Bo nolei ni subung buthu de bonsi degao ba; gejesi Judarao jang gaba kha; gejesi jakha de Apostolrao jang gaba kha.
Odehe, Jentailrao ar Judarao, bonsi ni hojarao jang Apostolrao khe laji phunu hi longthai jang lem ma bao bani bonsi khe bonsi tharmai la kha.
Apostolrao bokhe tharmaiba jang, bonsi Lukaonia raji ha ning, Lustra ode Derbe nolei ha ar bo raji buthu ni haphai ha khailang la kha.
Ode, bonsi oraha ning hamba graojma khe sainthi kha.
Lustra ha subung saosi khamhi dong ba, bo hajaiba ni phrang igah khora se, igah jang bo hemba giri.
Bo Paul grao thiyaba khe khna hi dong ba, ode Paulbo bokhe nai hi, ham mane khlai hi lonma dong thihi bo tharmai ba;
boha, Paul khurang bol jang jirik khao hi, Ning igah jang beleng hi song lah, bo ode thi ba. Ode, bo baijlom khu hi, igah jang hem lang la kha.
Subung buthu Paul khusi dangyaba khe nuba jang, Lukaonia grao jang khurang bol jang jirik khao hi, Madairao subung lai jahi jini ha akhai bu kha, thihi thi ba.
Barnaba khe bonsi Jupitar thi du, Paul khe jakha de grao thiyaba ja bani Merkuri bonsi thi ba.
Jupitar bikhoh nolei baji ha dong ba, bo bikhoh ni jonthai musu jlarao jang khim ni lik ni wadu, saokhuli buthu ni derga rogong ha laphai hi, subung buthu ni sagang ha bonsi bandai rima bao ba.
Thikhabo, Apostol Barnaba jang Paul de, bo grao khe khnaba jang, bonsi ni rih khe bonsi jekhao hi, subung buthu ni gejer ha birsing hi, bonsi jirik khao ba,

Hoi Ajurao, snadi jabani ebo khusi buthu khe nisi dang ba? Jingbo nisi lai ning subung se; ebo jinis haglai buthu khe nisi dangkhlai hi, nokhasao, phirthi, sagor, ar bonsi ni bising ha dongyaba khrip buthu khe slamyaba, thang hi dongyaba Madai niha nisi dong mane khlai hi hamba graojma khe nisi ne so riba se.
Bo Madai, gada ha khrip jadi khe jar jarni lama ha thangma ri re.

Thikabo, bo jar khe jar bonsi sakhi riba khe haigerya hi bo hamba khlai re. Nokhasao ni phrang hadi buthu ha rihi hamba maithai buthu khe nisi ne ri du, ode nisi ni khah ha ji mane khajama jang nisi khe gablai ri du.
Ebo grao jang subung buthu sainlai mane bandai riginyaba khe bonsi mathao kha.

Thikhabo, Antiokei jang Ikoniam ni subung sereba oraha phai hi, subung buthu khe jarni gede bonsi phuslai ba. Odebani, Paul khe bonsi longthai jang lemhi thih kha bao dada bonsi nogor ni baji ha siklang ba.
Thikhabo, lonyarao boni rogong ha sersi giding songphai hi, bo baija hi nolei ha happhin kha. Ode, gibin basain ha bo Barnaba jang baosi Derbe ha thang la kha.
Paul ar Barnaba, bo nolei buthu ha ning hamba graojma khe sainthi hi, gabang rikphayasa slam bani yaohon ha, Lustra ha dongyarao, Ikoniam ha dongyarao, Antiokei ha thangphin la kha.
Gabang dukhu khlai hi Madai ni raji ha jing hapma nang du, thi hi yaohon rikphayarao ni khah khe raodao ri ba. Odehe, lonma ha ning dong mane khlai hi bonsi khe sibring ba.
Khrip longjomkhoh ha khraorao yaopha lang hi, hoh khongja khlai hi, bonsi bi bani yaohon ha, lonyaba Gabra niha bonsi dengpha lang ba.
Pisidia thiyaba raji ha thangthar hi, Pamphulia raji ha bonsi sohi kha.
Boha Perga ha bonsi grao thiblai hi, Attalia ha bonsi thang ba;
ode, oraha ni phrang bonsi rung jang baigo hi, Antiokei ha sophai phin ba, bo hathan jakha de bonsi khusi dang blaiyaba khe dang mane khlai hi daphlungrao Madai ni khasaoma ha deng riyaba hathan se.
Odehe, bonsi sohi bani yaohon ha, longjomrao khe bonsi longthim hi, Madai ning boni khasaoma jang bo dangyaba khrip jang, ode Jentailrao ne lon mani derga bo khuru riba ni balam khe bonsi sainthi ba.
Ode, lonyarao ni bising ha ning gabang basain laohi bonsi dongthao ba.
Sereba subung Judai raji ni phrang phai hi, Moses ni dara ha dongba lai nisi jogai bujuh rasoma khlaiya thikhade, sogoma khe maiphu nang niya, thihi daphlungrao khe bonsi sling ri ba.

Paul jang Barnaba, bonsi jang nam khormo jahi ode niyalai hi bonsi grao banglai bani, bonsi ni bising ha sereba subung ebo grao ni balam ha Jerusalem ha Apostolrao ode khraorao niha thang mane bonsi nepha ba.
Longjom jang bonsi degar hi, bonsi Jentailrao khe khah phin mani balam ni grao khe thipha lang hi Phoiniki raji ode Samari raji ha sothar kha, odehe, khrip daphlung hamsi ning khaja lai ba.
Jerusalem ha bonsi sohiba jang, longjomrao, dangyasarao, ode khraorao bonsi khaja ba. Ode Madai bonsi khe yaowai hi khusi dangyaba khrip khe bonsi sainthi ba.
Thikhabo, Pharisai dolni lonyarao sereba baija hi thi ba, Jentailrao jogai bujuh rasoma khlai ma nang ma se, Moses ni dara khe mani mane hukhum ri ma nang du, bonsi ode thi ba.
Apostolrao jang khraorao bo grao khe bisar khlai mane khlai hi bonsi bojom ja ba.

Bonsi gabang grao banglai bani yaohon ha, Peter baija hi, bonsi niha, Daphlungrao, Jentailrao ning ani khuh ni phrang hamba graojma khna hi lon mani khlai hi, Madai ning sagang ha nisi ni bising ni phrang bo a ne nephaba khe nisi tharmai kha.
Ode, khah mithiyaba Madai, jinthane bo riba lai ning, Bese Gathar bonsi ni ha bo rijao hi, bonsi ni basao ha bo khaja du thihi bonsi sakhi ri du;
bonsi jang jing khe naidao naiyadao jaya hi lonma jang bonsi ni khah khe bo gathar khlai kha.
Ode thikhala, jini phagrarao jang jing horphuyaba jowal khe lonyarao ni basao ha dengma bao hi snadi jabani Madai ni gyan khe nisi nai nai ba?
Bonsi lon ba lai ning jing bo Gabra Jisu ni khasaoma jang goma mai mane jing lon ba se. ode bo thi ba.

Boha khrip subung buthu phirik phirik jahi Barnaba jang Paul khe Madai ning bonsi khe yaowai hi sin buthu jang gmang thaosisiyaba buthu khe Jentailrao ni bising ha dong hi sainthi du si de bonsini grao khe bonsi khna ba.
Bonsi thiblai bani yaohon ha, Jakob song hi thi ba, O daphlungrao, ani grao khe khna lah,
Madai ning sagang ha jarni bumu lama ne khlai hi bonsini bising ni phrang bo jarni subung buthu khe khaikho mane khlai hi Jentailrao phai bani grao khe Simon ning sainthi kha.
Bo buthu grao jang gorasalirao ni grao mili du:
Eboni yaohon ha se ang phaiphin hi
David ni khepsa baiyaba khe slamphin ma,
Bo hamyayaba khrip khe bo
ang hamsisi slamphin ma.
Odebani, gibin jadi, Jentailrao khrip ani bumu khe jirikyarao,
Gabra khe smai mane khlaihi khepsa khe songkhu ma.
Ebo grao buthu khe ning Gabra, habsao jenba ni phrang khna rihi phaiba se, thihi Gabra thi du.
Odebani, ang elei bisar khlai du; Jentail raoni bising ha Madai ni gede naiphinyarao khe dukhu riya hi,

saokhuli ne riyaba jinis gusu khe jiyaba buthu, gaori-gaora jayaba ni balam buthu, gorna derthaiyaba mih ni mogong jiyaba buthu, odehe bithi lingyaba buthu ni phrang gajain dongmane khlaihi bonsi niha reb ba khe se jing nangjao ba.
Bede thikhade, Moses gda ha ning khrip nolei noleiha boni dara ni balam ha sainthi hi sunagog buthu ha lenggo basain sophai kha ning sainthi re, bo ode thi ba.

Odehe, yaohon rikphayarao khrip longjomkhoh ni khraorao jang, bonsini dol ni subung khe saikho hi, Paul jang Barnaba jang baosi Antiokei ha haiha mane bao ba. Bonsi saikhoyarao ni bumu de Juda, Barsabba thiyaba, ar Silas se. Bonsi lonyarao ni bising ha man-gnang ar jadaoyaba se.
Odehe, bonsini yao ha ede reb hi bonsi haiha ba,
Jing Apostolrao, khraorao ode daphlungrao ning Antiokei ha, Suria raji ha, Kilikia raji ha, Jentail daphlung dongyarao khe juthai khlim ha du.
Jini dolni bisingni sereba subung oraha thanghi nisi khe jarni grao jang khin ri ba, ode nisi khe khah waimu nang riba thihi jing khna ba, thikhabo jing bonsi khe musibo saniya.
Odebani, jing graosi jahi gibi jang buji hi saikhoyaba subung buthu khe Paul jang Barnaba khe nisi niha jing haiha ba se.
Gabra Jisu Krista ni bumu ni khlai hi jarni hang khe bisar khlaiyayaba bonsi jang baosi subung saikho hi nisi niha haiha ba ham nang thihi jing tharmai du.
Odebani se, Juda jang Sila khe jing haiha ba, bonsi bo ebo grao khe ning nisi khe thima se.
Bese Gathar jang jing khe, ebo grao nangyayaba bubain khe de nisi jarni basaoha dengya kha de ham nang thihi jing thi du.
Saokhuli khe biyaba mogong da ji lah, ar bithi da ji lah, ar mih ni gorna derphai hi sthaiyaba ni bahain bo da ji lah. Ebo buthu khe nisi haiger kha de, nisini khlai hi ham nang. Hamsisi dong lah.
Bonsi haijaoyaba buthu Antiokei ha thang la kha. Boha sohiba ha, subung buthu khe bonsi longthim hi, laisi khe bonsi yaopha kha.
Subung buthu bokhe phuri blai hi, bonsi hamsi ning khaja kha, bede thikhade, bo laisi bonsi khe sibring kha.
Juda jang Sila de gorasali se bani, grao gabang jang bonsi khe sibring hi rao ri ba.
Oraha bonsi budu galao dongbani yaohon ha, bonsi khe haihayarao niha haiphin ha mane khlai hi daphlungrao khe bonsi santi jang haiphin kha.
(Thikhabo, Sila thiyaba de oraha ning dongsong ma bao ba).
Paul jang Barnaba gabang gibin subung jang baosi Antiokei ha ning Gabra slingriyaba grao khe sainthi hi dongthao ba.

Khaisa basain ni yaohon ha, Paul, Barnaba niha thi ba, Duha thangphin hi, khrip nolei ha Gabrani grao khe jing khna riyaba si ha, daphlung dongyarao niha thangpha lang hi, bonsini dongthai khe jing naipha lang nang.
Boha Barnaba de Johan (Marka thiyaba khe) bonsi niha langphama bao ba, thikhabo Paul de bonsi niha bo langphama nangjaoya.
Bede thikhade, bonsi khusi dangpha laiba ha, bo bonsi jang baosi thangphaya hi, Pamphulia ha bo khe dangkhlai kha.
Odebani, hamsi ning bonsi niyalai hi, bonsi degao lai kha. Barnaba, Mark khe jar jang baosi langpha hi, Kupra hahgojo gede rung jang thangla kha.
Paul, Sila khe saikho hi, daphlungrao ne Gabrani khasaoma khe bonsine deng ribani yaohon ha bo thangla kha.
Longjomrao khe rao ripha langhi Suria jang Kilikia raji ha bo thang pha lang kha.
Paul, Derbe jang Lustra habo thang ba, ode, oraha ning bumu Timothe thiyaba, lonyasa saosi dong ba. Bo lonyaba Judajik ni basa, thikhabo boni bupha de Greeksa se.
Lustra jang Ikoniam ha daphlung dongyarao de Timothe khe bakhan khlai re.
Paul bokhe jar jang baosi langphama nangjao ba; odebani boni jogai bujuh raso ba. Bede thikhade, boni bupha de Greek jadi se thihi bo hathan buthu ha dongyarao mithi thar du.
Bonsi khrip nogor buthu ha thangba lamai jang, Jerusalem ni hoja dongyarao ni bisar khe mani mane khlai hi daphlungrao khe thiri du.
Odebani, longjomrao khe lonma ha rao hi, sain midi bo bonsi bangdao phalang ba.
Bese Gathar jang Asia raji ha grao thiba bo magna bani Phrugia ode Galatia raji ha bonsi thang la kha.
Boha Musia raji gabasi sohi dada, Bithunia raji ha bonsi hapsing ma bao ba, thikhabo, Jisu ni Bese jang bo thang riya.
Odebani, Musia raji khe lailang hi, Troas thiyaba ha bonsi thang la kha.
Boha, Paul jang hor ha, saomi lai Makedonia raji ni subung saosi song hi, Makedonia raji ha phai hi, jing khe juru phai, thi hi boni ha khainsuba khe bo nu ba.
Bo saomi khe nuhi srap Makedonia raji ha jing thangma nangma bao ba, Madai se jiniha hamba graojma sainthi mane jing khe longba thihi jing tharmai kha.
Troas ni phrang jing rung jang baigo hi, beleng thing thing Samothraki ha jing thuhi, gibin basain ha Neapoli ha jing thangphin kha.
Oraha ni phrang Makedonia raji ni masi nolei Philippi thiyaba ha jing thang kha. Odehe, oraha basain galao jing dongthao ba.
Lenggo basain ha khorongma ni daoglap baji gede dih dergong ha bithan ja ma baohi jing oraha thang ba. Ode, jing kham hi masainjik bojom japhaiyarao niha jing grao sainthi ba.

Boha bumu Luda thiyaba, rih jaosro phainyaba, Thuatira nolei ni subung, Madai biyaba masainjik saosi, jing grao thiyaba khe khna ba, ode Paul grao thiyaba khe mani mane khlai hi Gabra ning boni khah khe khuru ri kha.
Bo jang boni nokhorrao baptisma laha bani yaohon ha, Ang khe gibi jang Gabra ni lonyajik baokha de, ani noh ha phai hi dong lah, thihi jing khe mani hi bo langpha kha.

Sainsi khali, jing biyaba hathan ha thangba ha, sereba mala lengjik, sgain sgo sma naiba ringyaba jang gajaoyaba khe goron ba, bo jakha de sma naihi jarni bubrarao ne khlai hi gabang rang rih bojai ri re.
Bo Paul jang ode jing jang yaohon rikpha ba, Ebo buthu, nisi ne sogolam ni lama khe sainthiyaba de, Basaothao Madai ni leng buthu se, thihi bo jirikkhao ba.

Bo mnang ni phrang ning olei dang re. Odebani, Paul de jajaoya hi, bo naiphin dada, sgain sgo niha thi ba, Jisu Krista ni bumu jang boni bising ni phrang baigo mane ang ning khe grao ri du, bo ode thi ba. Boha ning bo baigo lang la kha.
Bokhe lengjik ni bubrarao nuhi, bonsi rang maiyaba khe jam ba thihi bonsi khna hi, Paul jang Sila khe bonsi rem hi, hojarao ni sagang ha hathaima ha sikbu ba.
Rom ni bisardarrao niha bonsi langhi thi ba, Ebo Judarao de jini nolei khe gaso suso khlai du.
Bonsi gibin dara sling ri du, bo buthu khe jing ajaoba gathar niya, ode mani babo gathar niya, bede thikhade jing Rom sarao se.
Odebani, subung buthubo Paul jang Sila jang nanglai mane graosi jahi bonsi phai ba,
Ode bisardarrao Paul ar Sila ni rih buthu khe jekhao hi khokhla hi, su mane grao ri ba.
Ode, bonsi gabang su bani yaohon ha, phatho ha bonsi jeb ba, ode raokhiyaba niha hamsisi dikhao hi raokhi mani khlai hi bonsi thi ba.
Phatho ni hoja olei hukhum maihi bonsi khe bising ni khutha ha phraojep hi, bonsi ni igah buthu ha jingjri gain ri ba.
Hogjer maothi maotha ha Paul jang Sila de bi hi ning Madai ni rajabthai khe rajab ba, ode phatho ha dongyarao bo khna ba.
Boha ning hamsi ning banglama phai ba, ode khrip derga khuru thar ba, ode subung jingjri jang khayaba buthu khuru thar ba.

Boha naisoyaba smaohi baijaba de, phatho khoh ni derga buthu khuru hi dongba khe bo nuhi, phatho khoh ha dongyarao khe khaithar kha thihi baoba. Odebani seng khaikho hi jar khe jar sthai la ma bao ba.
Thikhabo, Paul bol jang jirikkhao hi thi ba, Jar khe musibo da khlai, jing khrip bo eraha ning dongthar du.
Phatho naisoyaba thaophari sain hi, bising ha birsing ba, ode lup lup mao hi Paul jang Sila ni sagang ha bo blip pha ba.
Ode bo bonsi khe baji ha lang hi thi ba, Hoi ajurao, sogo mani khlai hi snadi khe ang dang ma? bo ode thi ba.
Bonsi thiphin ba, Gabra Jisu Krista khe lon lah, odese ning jang nini nokhorrao bo goma mai ma.
Ode, bo jang boni noh ha dongyarao khrip subung buthu niha Madai ni grao khe bonsi sainthi kha.
Okhali ni hor ha ning bo bonsi khe lang hi, bonsi suba ha gasa jayaba buthu khe susa ba, ode, boha ning bo jang boni nokhorsibo bonsi baptisma lathar ba.
Ode, jarni noh ha bo langhi, bo ji mane ri ba; ode, bonsi Madai khe lon bani bo jang boni khrip nokhorrao jang hamsi ning khaja ba.
Phorong ha, Rom ni bisardarrao Bo buthu khe haiger ha, thi mane khlai hi subung remyarao khe bonsi haiha ba.
Odehe, phatho khe naisoyaba, Paul niha bonsi ni grao khe thi ba, Bisardarrao nisi khe haiger mane subung haiha ba, odebani, duha baigo hi santi jang thang lah.

Thikhabo, Paul subung remyarao niha thi ba, Jing de Rom ni subung se. Jini gajai jadu jaya tharmaiya hi, noleikhor ni sagang ha suhi, phatho ha jing khe jeb kha. Duha snadi jabani jing khe phirik phirik khaikho ba? Ode ja nang niya; bonsi ning phai hi khaikho phaila thing.
Siphaiyarao bo grao khe bisardarrao niha sainthi ba; ode, Rom ni subung se thihi bonsi mithiba jang hamsi ning bonsi khin kha.
Odebani, bonsi thang hi, bujai hi, baji ha lang hi, nogor ni phrang thangla mane khlai hi bonsi khe khainsu ba.
Paul jang Sila phatho khe haiger hi, Luda ni noh ha hap ba. Oraha daphlungrao jang bonsi goronlai hi khah santi ri hi, bonsi thangla kha.
Paul jang Sila de Amphipoli jang Appolonia khe lailang hi, Thessalonika ha bonsi sohi kha. Oraha Judarao ni sunagog dong ba.
Paul, jarni nalai ni dara lai, bonsi niha thang hi, phintham lenggo basain ha Madai ni grao ni phrang hamsisi sainthi phla ba,

Krista de dukhu khlai ma nang mani grao khe, subung githi ni phrang thang hi baija phin bani grao khebo thiphla hi bo bujai re, Ebo Jisu khe nisi ne sainthiyaba de, bo ning Krista se, thihi bo thi du.
Bonsi ni bising ha gejesi de mani rijao kha, ode Paul jang Sila goronlai kha; Madai khe baoyaba Greek subung hamsi ning ode, masainjikrao ni hoja gabang bo mani kha.

Thikhabo, sereba Judarao de bonsi khe hingsa jahi, sthaima ni sereba sereba sele subung buthu khe labu hi, longthim ba. Khrip nogor khe bonsi gdang sdang khlai hi, Jason ni noh khe bonsi hamya khlai hi, bonsi khe nogor gejer ha langma bao ba.
Thikhabo, bonsi khe maiya hi Jason jang gibin daphlungrao sereba sereba nolei ni hojarao khe labu hi, bonsi jirik khao ba, Habsao khe gdang sdang khlaiyarao eraha phai ba,
Jason, jarni noh ha nohma thao ri ba. Ebo buthu khrip de Raja gibin Jisu thiyaba dong thihi Kaisar ni hukhum khe sbai du, ode bonsi thi ba.
Subung buthu ode nogor ni bisardarrao bo grao buthu khe khna hi, bonsi gdang sdang ja kha.
Odebani, bonsi Jason jang daphlung gibin buthu ni phrang bonsi baslai ha rang lahi, bonsi haiger kha.
Hor ha ning daphlungrao, Paul jang Sila khe Beroia nolei ha bonsi srap haiha kha; ode bonsi oraha sohi ba jang, Judarao ni sunagog ha bonsi hapsing kha.

Oraha ni subung buthu de Thessalonika ni subung buthu thanebo bonsi hamdao. Odebani, khah ha khajama jang grao khe bonsi lamjao hi, bonsi grao thiyaba khe jadu na jaya mithi mani khlai hi sainmidi Madai ni laisi ha bonsi smai re.
Odebani, bo subung buthu gabang ning lon kha; Greek masainjik man gnangrao ode miyahrao bo gabang ning bonsi lon kha.
Thikhabo, Thessalonika ni Judarao, Paul de Beroia nolei ha Madai ni grao khe thi du thihi khna ba jang, orahabo bonsi thang hi, subung buthu khe phuslai hi, bonsi gdang sdang khlai phin ba.
Boha daphlungrao ning Paul khe sagor ni dergong sosi thang mani khlai hi haiha kha. Thikhabo, Sila jang Timothe de oraha ning dongthao kha.
Paul khe lang smaiyarao de Atheni sosi langsmai ba; ode Sila jang Timothe khe gebre hi boniha srap phai mani grao jamayaba khe lang hi bonsi phaiphin la kha.
Paul, Atheni ha bonsi khe jon hi dongba ha, nogor de Madai ni saokhuli jang gablai ba khe bo nuhi bo khah rainjao kha.
Odebani, sunagog ha Judarao jang Madai khe khlimyaba Jentailrao gabang bojom jayarao niha bo grao sainlai re, ode hathaima habo, oraha dongphaiyarao si jang sainmidi bobo nam jalai re.
Epikuria ode Stoik slingriyasarao sereba subung gyanirao bokhe bonsi jophai ba. Bonsi ni bising ha gejesi, Ebo subung grao bangyaba la snadi grao khe thima bao ba? bonsi ode thi ba.
Sereba gejesi jakha de, Raji gibin ni Madai buthu ni grao khe sainthiyaba janai du dou! ode bonsi thilai ba. Bede thikhade, Paul Jisu ni grao ar thanghi baijaphin bani grao khe thi kha.
