Bode hamba khusi dangyaba ni balam ha, malai jang bakhan rijao kha: basathu khe naiso kha, naorai ni basao ha hambi, subung gatharrao ni igah bo su kha, subung dukhisarao khebo juru kha, ode khrip hamba khusi dangyaba ni balam ha khah muh ri kha.
Thikhabo, banjik ansa jadaoyarao khe de banjik ha bumu da reb; bede thikhade saomang ni libima jang Krista ni phrang dikhaolang hi, basai lama nangjao du.
olei ning, bonsi sagang grao hanggaiyaba khe hamya khlai bani bonsi gajai ja re.
Ode niyakhabo, noh magain hi daobai hi seleyaba khe bonsi sling du; sele jaba se ning niya kho, malai khe siji baiyaba ode daobaiba raoyaba, grao thima niyayaba khe bonsi thi re.
Odebani, banjik ansa jadaoyarao de noh japhin hi basai mai dada nokhong si khe naiso la hi, sotrurao musi thima maiya mane ang nangjao du.
Duhabo subung gejesi de soithan ni yaohon rikpha lang hi degao lang la kha.
Lonyaba haingajik jar ni apnarao banjik khe dengpha khade, bonsi khebo kharangma nang du, longjom de banjik gibi khe se ning bo naiso phu mani khlai hi, longjom ni bubain risi riyaba da ja thing.
Longjom ni khrao subung langsmai ba ringyaba, ode grao thiba ar slingri bani gede khah riyarao khe bakhan khlaima nang du.
Madai ni laisi ha ede thi du, Musu jla mai naoba ha boni bukhuh khe da khah, thidu, ode khusi dangyaba de tholop bo mai ma nang du.
Sakhi riyaba gini ja thing, gatham ja thing, sakhi giri thikhade, longjom ni khrao ni basao ha gajai riyaba grao khe da mani lah.
Phap khusi dangyaba buthu khe, khrip subung ni sagang ha jo hi bujai lah, gibin khripbo khinma maiphu mani khlai hi.
Madai jang Krista Jisu ode degla saikhoyarao ni sagang ha nisi ne ang grao ri du, ebo slingriyaba grao buthu khe khah khuru hi mani ri hi, ode gibin khlai hi musi khebo khusi da dang lah.
Asaba ni basao habo yao dengba khe da gebre, malai ni phap buthu ha phantha da ja lah; jar khe jar gathar khlai hi ning dong lah.
Dih khe se ning lingyaba subung da ja si, nini bohoh ne khlai hi, ode jar alang alang bohoh sabani dara jang, grep bidih ni ju khe khaisa khaisa ling lah.
Subung sereba sereba ni phap buthu de srap nujao du, bonsi thane bonsi ni phap de bisar ha soda du, thikhabo, sereba sereba phap de yaohon ha se nujao phai ba.
Olei jasosi ning hamba khusi dang hi dongyarao de bonsi ragao sisi nujao re, ragaosi bonsi nujaoyayaba buthubo, hui hi budu galao dongphuya.
Madai ni bumu jang slingriyaba khe sijiya mani khlai hi, leng ni jowal phayarao si de, jar ni bubra raokhe khrip bakhan mai jare thi hi bao lai la thing.

Bubra lonma dongyarao de bonsi daphlung se bani, bonsi ni bubrarao khe musibo baoma nangya da bao, hamdao hi se bonsi ne khusi dangdao rima nang ba; bede thikhade, bonsi khusi dangriya khe lonma jang hamjaoma ha bonsi jang nokhor si ni subung ja kha.
Ebo grao buthu khe slingri hi sibring lah.
Asaba subungbo, jini Gabra Jisu Krista ni grao gibi jang Madai ni grao khe badai hi gibin grao gathang khe slingriyaba de,

subung phuthan jang bo musibo mithiyayaba se. Niya laiyaba ode grao bangalaiyaba nam khormu khaikhoyaba gede haryaba subung khah ragaoyayaba se. Bo buthu ni phrang se, libima ja thing, nisi naima mijingyayaba ja thing, nisi sijilaiba ja thing, nisi lon soyayaba phap buthu ja thing,
ode, baothai hamya buthu ode grao gibi khe rem phuyayaba buthu baigo hi, Madai baoyaba khe rang rih lab maiba lai bonsi bao du.
Madai khe maniba ha khah manima dong kha de, gabang lab se.
Habsao ha musi khebo jing labu phuya, ar musi khebo jing langpha phuya.
Odese, ji mani ar phin mani jini ha dongyaba buthu ha ning jing khah mani la nang.
Thikhabo, gnang jama nangjaoyarao de naigrik ja thing, dukhon ha ja thing, gibir ja re, ode hamyayaba gabang libima ha bonsi galaising hi, bo libima buthu ha ning hamya jang jamyaba ha giphip la re.
Rang rih harbaoyarao de khrip jadi hamyayaba ni khitha se; bo libima ni khlai hi se gejesi subung de lonma khe gar hi, bonsi jar khe jar gabang khah dukhu jang ripha la re.

Thikhabo, ning Madai ni subung, ebo khrip jinis buthu khe dangkhlai hi, dormo ja thing, Madai khe maniyaba ja thing, lonma ja thing, hamjaoma ha ja thing, dukhu khah laoma ha ja thing, gasainma ha ja thing, riksai lah,
lonma ni hamba ja kha ning gaba hi, thaoglao ni hayu khe remsong lah, bokhe mai mani khlai hi se ning longjaoyaba se, bokhe sakhi riyaba gabang subung ni sagang ha ning bai kha.
Khrip jadi jinis niha hayu riyaba Madai jang Krista Jisu, Pontia Pilat ni sagang ha jar jayaba grao gibi khe khitha rao hi baiyaba ni sagang ha nisi ne ang grao ri kha.
Jini Gabra Jisu Krista nujao phaiphinya si de, bo grao riyaba khe musi thima girisi ode gathar ja hi naiso lah.
Bode bakhan rijaoyaba Madai, khrip ni basao ha Raja dedao thaoyaba, raja dedao thaoyarao ni Raja dedao thaoyaba, Rajarao ni Raja de, bo bubli ha se phnu ri ma.

Boni ha se ning thaoglao ni thijaoyayaba dong ba, gabasi thang phuyayaba jnayaba ha se bo dong ba, bokhe saosibo nuya, saosibo bokhe nubabo nuphuya. Boni ha ning bakhan jang thaoglao ni Raja jayaba dong thing, Amen.

Ebo habsao ha subung gnang jayarao khe phuthan jaya mani khlai hi sling ri lah, lon jayayaba don ha asa da deng, jing yaowai mani khrip jadi bao joyasi jinthane riyaba Madai ni basao hase asa deng mani khlai hi sling ri lah.
Bonsi de hamba khusi dang mani ode, hamba khusi dangba bangdao mani khlai hi, nalaibo khaithiya hi gibi subung buthu jang yaowai phalai manebo sibring lah.
Olei jasosi ning hayu gibi gibi khe bonsi remsong phuma ni khlai hi, bubli sophai ginyaba ni khlai hide, longthai gaiyaba hamdao thao lai don gabang bojom khlai ba se.
Hoi Timothe, nini ha deng ri hi dongyaba khe hamsisi naiso lah. Madai khe man khlaiyayaba gede haglai grao thibaiyaba ode gibi niyayaba gyan bonsi thi hi niya dada badaiyaba buthu khe dangkhlai lah.
Bokhe gejesi de mai nai kha bao hi, lonma khe bonsi lama gma kha.
Khasaoma ning jang baosi dongpha thing.
Paul, Krista Jisu ha dongyaba hayu ni grao hanggaiyaba khe bai mani, Madai nangjaoyaba Krista Jisu ni Apostol ni phrang
Ani basa hamdao thaoyaba Timothe, Abai Madai ode jini Gabra Krista Jisu ni phrang khasaoma, hamjaoma, ode shanti de nini ha dongpha thing.

Jini grengrao dangba lai, hamba hamya tharmaiyaba gathar jadao thaoyaba boni khusi khe ang dangyaba Madai niha ning khajama ni grao khe ang thi du. Bo sain hor ang Madai biyaba buthu ha nisi khe wainso ha du.
Nini mudi buthu khe ang wainso ha du, khajama ha ang gablai phu mani khlai hi hamsi ning ang ning khe goron ma nangjao du.

Lonma gibi gibi nini ha dongyaba khe ang hamsisi tharmai du, bo lonma de jenba ni phrang nini badai Loisi niha dong ba, odehe nini buma Euniki nihabo dong ba, nini habo dong thi hi ang gibi jang tharmai du.
Odebani se, nini basao ha ang yao dengba ha, Madai riyaba ning maiyaba khe wainso hi jing ri mani khlai hi ning khe ang phin thiphin du.
Madai de khin mani bese jinthane riya, khusi dang phuyaba raothai jang, hamjaoma ode jar khe grao sibringyaba bese khe se bo jinthane ri ba.

Odebani, jini Gabra ni grao khe bai mani khlai hi da laji, boni khlai hi phatho ha dongba khebo malai khe da laji. Madai ni raothai khe yaowai hi hamba graojma ni khlai hi dukhu khe malai jang yaowai pha lai lah.

Bode jing khusi dang bani niya hi, bo khusi dangma baoyaba ning ode boni khasaoma jang se bo jing khe sogo hi, gathar longyaba jang bo jing khe long ba. Bo khasaoma de bubli jama ni sagang ha ning Krista Jisu ha bo jinthane yaopha kha.
Bokhe duha de, bo jing khe sogoyahba Krista Jisu nujao phaiyaba ha, duhabo phnujao kha. Bo se thiyaba khe sjam hi, hamba graojma ni hayu ni balam ha ode raothai khe bo phnu kha.
Bo hamba graojma khe bai mani ode haijaoyasa ar slingriyasa ne ang saikhoya kha.

Olei bani se, elei ang dukhu khlai ba. Thikhabo, ang lajiya, snadi khe ang lon ba ang tharmai la du; ode, bo basain sosi ne khlai hi boni ha jing deng riyaba khe, bo naiso hi deng phu nang thi hi ragao sisi ang mithi du.
Krista Jisu ha dongyaba lonma jang hamjaoma khe la hi, ani phrang grao gibi ning khnayaba buthu khe la lah.
Hamba jinis buthu nini ha deng ri hi dongyaba khe, jini ha dongyaba Bese Gathar ni juruma jang hamsisi raokhi hi deng lah.
Asia raji ha dongyarao khrip bo Phugela jang Hermogen sosi ang jang degao kha thi hi ning tharmai du.
Gabra ning Onesiphora ni nokhor khe khasaoma ri la thing, bede thikhade bo ang khe alang alang masayaba se, ang sikol khajaoyaba khebo bo laji phaya.
Rom habo sophai hi khah jang muh jang smai hi smai hi bo ang khe goron ba.
Ephesi habo hamsi ning ang khe bo juruyaba khe ning tharmai du. Gabra ning okhali ni basain ha de boni khasaoma khe mai ri la thing.
Ning ani basa, Krista Jisu ni khasaoma jang ning khe rao ri la thing.
Gabang subung ni sagang ha sakhi ri hi slingriyaba khe khnayarao de subung gibin buthu khe slingri phin phuyaba subung lonma gnangrao niha nisi deng ri lah.
Krista Jisu ni hamba siphaiya lai ang jang baosi dukhu khlai lah.
Siphaiya ha dong mani saikhoyaba khe khaja ri mane khlai hi, asaba siphaiya jbah thangba bubli ha jar khe jar habsao ni khusi buthu ha thaoya.
Solei baha gabayarao bo dara ha lai nanglaiya thikhade bo yaosandi mai phuya.
Phadain gedebo dukhu khlaiyaba de bathai thaidayaba khe mai jima nang du.
Ang grao thiyaba khe khah ri hi bao lah, Gabra ning ningkhe khrip ha bujima ri nang.
Hamba graojma ang thi du, Jisu Krista, David ni greng ni subung, subung githi ni phrang baija phinyaba khe wainso lah.
Bo hamba graojma ni khlai hi se, ang dukhu khlai ba, ode subung hamyayarao lai sikol jang ang khajao ba, thikhabo Madai ni grao khe de khaya.
Odebani, Jisu niha dongyaba sogoma khe, thaoglao muima jang masi bonsi mai mani khlai hi, saikho jaoyarao ni khlai hi ang blaiyasi blaiyasi dukhu khlai ba se.
Ebo grao thiyaba khe lonsing mani dong;
Bo jang baosi jing thih khade,
bo jang baosi jing thang ma se.
Jing dukhu khalao khade,
raji khebo bo jang baosi yaowai ma se;
Jodi bokhe jing dangkhlai khade,
bobo jing khe dangkhlai ma se;
Jing lon laya khabo,
bode lonma gnang slam du,
Jar khe jar dangkhlai la phuya, thi du.

Ebo grao khe tharmai ri lah, grao selai hi grao banglaiya mani khlai hi Madai ni muh ha khah jang muh jang sainthi lah. Ode niyakha de musi lab ja nang niya, khnayarao ne khlai hi hamya se khlaidao ba.
Ning de jar ni khusi dangba lajiya, grao gibi khe gibi gibi slingriyaba Madai jang bujao mani khusi dangyaba lai Madai niha jar khe yaopha mani khlai hi blaiba lai lai phnu lah.
Madai khe man khlaiyayaba gede haglai grao thiba khe dangkhlai lah, bede thikhade bonsi de subung buthu khebo Madai khe khiyal khlaiyadao khlaiyadao khlai nang.
Bonsi grao thiyaba bo gasa hamya lai sip phalang ma se. Bo buthu ni bising ha Humenai ar Philetasbo bonsi jang dongpha du.
Bonsi ning, Baija phinyaba de sophai blai kha thi hi grao gibi khe dangkhlai kha; odebani gabang subung buthu ni lonma khe bonsi dibin sibin khlai re.

Thikhabo, Madai longthai gaiyaba de raothe the song du, boni basao ha sip pha du, Gabra de jar ni buthu khe mithi du thi hi ode, Gabra ni bumu khe layarao side hamya khe dangkhlai ma nang du thi hi reb du.

Noh gedeba ha bokhoh jang mudik buthubo gajao jang guphu jang se ning slamyaba ja blai ba, bondo jang hah ni mudikbo dongba se; sereba khe maya doya khlai mani dong, thikhabo sereba khe maya doya khlaima nangya ginyababo dong.
Sere hamya jinis ang thiyaba buthu ni phrang degao du, bode muilo gnang yaodi, mudik gathar, hamba khusi dang mane salai hi ning dongma se, ode noh bubra ne khlai hi lab jadaothao ja ma se.

Thikhabo, naga ni mijingma khe dangkhlai hi, khah gathar ja hi Gabra ni bumu khe layarao jang baosi, dormo ha ja thing, lonma ha ja thing, hamjaoma ha ja thing, milima ha ja thing, bo yaohon rikpha lah.
Ebo nam khormu lab giriyaba ode gibir jathai ni phrang gibin dong lah, bede thikhade ebo buthu ni phrang se nam khormu baigo ba thi hi ning tharmai lah.
Gabra ni dangyasa de nam jabaiyaba subung jama niya, bokhe gar hi khrip subung ni basao ha maigru gru ode slingriba ringyaba ode khah laoma,
gasaindik dik ja hi bokhe badaiyarao khe gibi khlaiyaba se ja ma nang ba. Madai ning bonsi khe grao gibi khe mithi mani gede ha lang smai hi khah phin mani hajorabo riphu du.
Ode, sgo sgain nangjaoyaba boni nangjaothai dang mane leng ha sgaiyarao khe tharmai hi bonsi sogo ri phu du.
Bubli jamthaoba hade gabang dukhu hadi sophai ma se thi hi tharmai lah.
Subung jar khe khasao layaba, rang rih harbaoyaba, subung sanggayaba, subung phuthan, Madai khe sijiyaba, buma bupha ni grao khe layayaba, khajaba ringyayaba, gusu,
khasaoma hajai phayayaba, map giriyaba, malai khe hamya thibaiyaba, khah saiphuyayaba, bakha lamyayaba, hamba jinis khe nangjaoyayaba,
jar khe girikjao layaba, yaohon ni grao khe baoyayaba, jar khe blajaoyaba, Madai khe hamjaoba thane jar khe sukrima nangjao daoyaba,
bonsi jar khe hamsi ning Madai ni subung phnu ma, thikhabo, boni raothai khe maniyayarao bonsi baigo ma se.
Bonsi ni bising ha subung sereba sereba de noh buthu ha daobai hi, masainjik raoyayaba, phap ni bubain risi hi dongyaba khrip jadi hamyayaba jang giphinyarao khe phuslai hi mani ri re.
Oleiyaba masainjikrao de nalai sling la khabo, grao gibi khe bonsi tharmaiyayarao se.
Janni ar Jambri thiyaba, Moses jang badai hi nanglaiba lai bonsi bo grao gibi khe badai hi bonsi nanglai du, bonsi ni baothai bo hamya ja lang la kha, lonma habo bonsi musi thima giri kha.
Thikhabo, olei sosi so phu nang niya, Janni ar Jambri lai ning, bonsi jar ni blai jaothai khe khrip subung ni sagang ha nujaoma se.
Thikhabo, ning de ang slingriyaba ja thing, ani dongthai ja thing, ani baothai ja thing, ani khah laoma ja thing, ani hamjaoma ja thing, ani dukhu suiyaba ja thing,

nalai ang khe dukhu riyaba ode, ani dukhu buthu khe ning tharmai thar kha. Antiokei ha ja thing, Ikoniam ha ja thing, ode Lustra ha ja thing, ani basao ha sophaiyaba buthu ode, dukhu ri jaoyaba ha ang blaiyasi blaiyasi dukhu khlai kha; thikhabo bo buthu khrip habo ang khe sogo kha.
Gibi ning jadu, sere Krista Jisu ha Madai khe maniyaba ja ma, nangjaoyarao de bonsi dukhu ri jaoma se.
Thikhabo, subung hamyayarao jang subung thokhi baiyarao de, bonsi ni phantha de hamyadao pha lang nang; ode, malai khe bonsi thokhi ma, malai jangbo bonsi thokhijao ma se.
Thikhabo ning de, sere ni phrang ning slingba thi hi wainso hi, ning slingblaiyaba ode raothe the ja hi ning lonyaba ha ning dong lah;
Krista Jisu ha lonma dong bani khlai hi se sogoma maisi ning khe gyan ri phuyaba laisi gathar buthu khe ansa ni phrang ning mithi kha.
Madai grao rebyaba khrip khe Madai ning hang susing hi slingri bani balam ha ja thing, ode, joba ni balam ha ja thing, salai slamyaba ha ja thing, dormo ni balam ha slingriyaba ja thing, gabang se;
Madai ni subung de gathar ja hi, khrip jadi hamba khusi sothar si dang phu mani khlai hi gainsari khe thu lah.

Madai ni sagang ha ode Krista Jisu khe sakhi khlai hi, subung thang hi dongyaba ode subung githirao ni basao ha bisar khlaiginyaba ni sagang ha, bo nujao phin mane ode boni raji khe bumu la hi ang ning khe grao ri du.
Grao khe sainthi lah, bubli habo, bubli niyaba habo sainthi phalang lah; khah laoma jang slingri hi, bonsi ni gajai khe phnu hi bujai lah.

Subung buthu slingriyaba grao gibi khe bonsi khna ma nangyayaba bublibo sophai ma se. Bokhe garhibo bonsi ni khmao buthu sisi migrim jao hi, jar khna ma mijingyarao sainthi mani khlai hi slingriyarao gabang bonsi bojom khlai nang,
ode, gibi grao gede bonsi ni khmao nathong ja nang, ode gda ni kharmu gede bonsi giphin lang lama se.
Thikhabo, ning de khrip jadi grao buthu ha baothai hamba khe la hi, lonma jang dukhu sugu lah, ode haijaoyaba ni khusi dang hi, nini khusi khe sothar si phura khlai lah.
Ang de angkhe yaopha mani bubli sophai kha, ang thang la mani bubli sophai kha.
Hamba jbah nanglaiyaba khe ang jbah nanglai blai kha, khaiba badaiyaba khe ang phura khlai kha, ode lonma khe ang raokhi song la kha.

Duha de anthane khlai hi dormo ni khrothu khe deng ri kha, bokhe bisar gibi khlaiyaba, Gabra ning bo basain ha anthane ri ma se, a ne se ning niya hi, bo nujao phaiginyaba khe jonyarao khrip nebo bo rima se.
Ani ha ning srap phaiphu mani khlai hi blaiba lai ri pha lah.
Dema de ebo duha ni habsao khe wainso bani, bo ang khe haiger hi, Thessalonika gede thang la kha; ode Kresen de Galatia raji gede thang kha, Titabo Dalmatia raji gede thang kha.
Ani ha dongyaba de Luka se ning dongsi ba. Mark khe long hi labu smai lah, bode ang khusi dangba ha, gabang khusi ni subung se.
Tukik khe de Ephesi ha ang haiha kha.
Ning phaiba ha Troas ha Karpa niha sola galao ang dangkhlai buyaba khe labu pha lah, ode ani laisi jang ani migur ni laisi thonyaba khe ning asaba dara jang labu pha.
Gangthing slamyaba Aleksandar de hamsi ning ang khe hamya khlai kha; Gabra ning bokhe boni khusi buthu ni khlai hi baslai ri ma se.
Ningbo bo ni phrang girik hi dong lah, bede thikhade bo jini grao khe hamsi ning badaiyaba se.
Ang ani gibi grao khe sagangthao sainthi ba bubli ha ang jang saosi bo gabaya, bonsi ang khe dangkhlai hise khaithar ba. Ebo ni daitho khe da la thing.

Thikhabo Gabra de ani gede gaba hi, ode Jentailrao khrip bo khna mani ode, grao khe phura sotharsi haiyasa ja phu mani khlai hi raothaibo anthane bo ri ba. Olei ning ang misiraigonma ni bukhuh ni phrang sogojao hi ang dong ba.
Gabra ning ang khe khrip hamya khusi ni phrang sogo nang, ode jar ni sorgo raji ne khlai hi ang khe dimkhao hi so ri ma se. Boni ha ning thaoglao thaoglao ni muima dong thing, Amen.
Priska jang Akuila thu khe, Onesiphora thu ni nokhor jang baosi, ang khlimhayaba khe bonsi niha sori ha.
Erasta de Korinth ha ning dong song kha, thikhabo Trophim khe de Mileti ha bo limba ni ang garbu kha.
Maising sophai mani sagang ha ning phai mani khlai hi blaiba lai ri pha lah. Eubul ning khe khlim ha du, Puden, Lina, Klaudia ode boni daphlungrao khrip bo bonsi ning khe khlim ha du.
Gabra nini bese jang baosi dongpha thing. Khasaoma nisi jang baosi dongpha thing.
Paul, Madai ni dangyasa jang Jisu Krista ni haijaoyasa,
Madai subung saikhoyarao khe, lonma ha didih mani ode, Madai khe khiyal khlaiyaba gede grao gibi khe mithi bani balam ha juruyaba thi du:
mosol joyayaba Madai ning, jenba ni sagang ha ning bo hanggai kha, thaoglao ni hayu khe asa ja hi,
bo thaoglao ni hayu khe bo bubli ha ning bai hi, phnu kha, bo grao khe bai mani khusi khe, Madai jini sogoyahsa grao riba lai deng rijaoyaba ang se.
Ning lonma masi jayaba, ani basa hamdao thaoyaba niha: Bupha jang jini sogoyahsa Krista Jisu ni phrang khasaoma jang shanti dong pha thing.
Khusi ragao mane lagai thaoyaba buthu khe ragao rima ni khlai hi, Kret ni hahgojo hade ning khe ang garbu ba, ode ning khe ang grao riba lai ning, khrip nolei ni khraorao khe saikho lah.
Bikhoh ni Khrao de gajai giriyaba, bihih saosi ni basai, boni basathu lonyaba, suk khlai bani balam ha gajai giriyaba, niya khala, subung suttha niyayaba jama nang du.

Longjom ni hoja de Madai ni jinis khe naisoyaba se bani malai jang siji jaoyayaba subung jama nang du; jar ni grao se ning hamjao layaba, khah raoyaba, ju lingyayaba subung, yao sugu baiyaba, jar ni lab ne khlai hi harbaoyaba subung jama niya.
Subung khe lamjao ba ringyaba, ode khaithiyayaba, hamba khusi khe nangjaoyaba subung, saiphuyaba subung, gasainyaba subung, subung gathar, jar sibringba ringyaba subung jama nang du.

Bo de grao gathang gibi khe yaowai hi, bonsi khe grao slingri phu mani khlai hi, ode badaiyarao khe niyathai phu mani khlai hi, grao gathang gibi khe sling ri hi dongba lai, lonma gnang grao khe remsongyaba subung jama nang du.
Bede thikhade, gabang subung buthu de grao layayaba, haglai thuyaba ode gabang thokhi baiyababo gabang dong, oleiyaba subung buthu de rasorao ni bising ha gabang bang bi.

Oleiyarao de lasisiyaba khe jar ni lab ne khlai hi riksai re. Ode, slingriya ginyaba jinis buthu khe sling ri hi, malai ni nokhor buthu khe bonsi hamya khlai re, odebani bonsi ni bukhuh buthu khe phrao ma nang du.
Bonsi ni bising ni subung saosi, bonsi ni gorasali ning ede thidu: Kret hahgojo ni subung buthu de asaba bubli habo subung mosol, hamyayaba mih, sele, haslarao se.
Ebo sakhi riyaba grao gibi se. Odebani bonsi lonma gibi ha thangphu mani khlai hi bonsi khe sajao si jo lah.
Judarao ni kharmu haglai ha ja thing, niya khala grao gibi khe dangkhlaiyarao grao riyaba buthu khe da mani la thing.
Gathar subung buthu ni khlai hi de khrip jinis bo gathar se, thikhabo subung regeyarao ode lonma giriyarao ni khlai hide musibo gathar giri. Bede thikhade bonsi ni buddi ode khathai buthu bo gusu se.
Bonsi thi du, jing Madai khe tharmai du, thikhabo, bonsi jar ni khusi jang bonsi maniya, Bede thikhade bonsi subung muji jaoyayaba se, ode grao layayaba, ode asaba hamba khusi ha yaowai jayayaba se.
Thikhabo, ning de lonma ni gibi grao jang dormo ni dara khe sling ri lah.
Grarao khe saiphuyaba, man gnang, jar sibring phuyaba, lonthai gibi, hamjaoma gnang subung, ode subung khah laophuyaba jama ni khlai hi sibring lah.

Olei jasosi ning grajikrao khebo bonsi ni dongthai ha man khlaijaoyaba ja mani, malai jang siji jaoyayaba ja mani, ju ni leng ha thaoyayaba ja mani khlai hi bonsi khe sibring lah, Ode, bonsi khe hamba jinis sling rima nang du,
odebani, haingajik gidi daoyarao de bonsi ni basaithu ode bonsi ni basathu khe hamjao mane ja thing;

saiphuyaba ni ja thing, naisoyaba gathar ja mani ja thing, nohkhor ha dongthai ham mani ja thing, gasainyaba ja mani ja thing, bonsi ni basaithu ni grao khe la mani buthu jang bonsi slingri phu nang, Madai grao siji jaoya hi dong mani nang du.
Olei jasosi ning nagaraobo jar naiso la mani khlai hi sibring lah.
Khrip grao buthu ha hamba khusi ha daogari nai mani khlai hi nisi phnu hi, nisi slingriyaba ha nini gibi khe nisi ni man gnang khe,
ning grao thiyaba gibi jathai khe niya hi, dephuyayaba khe nu hi, badaiyarao nini basao ha hamya musi thima maiya hi bonsi laji mani khlai hi.
Dangyasarao de khrip gede ha bonsi ni bubrarao ni bakhla ha hapma nang du, khrip jinis ha bonsi khe khaja rima nang du, bonsi jang grao banglai ma niya.

Yao makhao yaowaima niya, asaba ni balam habo lonjao hi dong mani khlai hi sibring lah, bede thikhade bo jing khe sogoyahba jini Madai slingriyaba khe ode boni muilo khe khrip ha bonsi ne phnu ma nang du.
Khrip subung khe sogo mani khlai hi Madai ni khasaoma de duha nujaophai kha.

Odebani khlai hi, Madai khe khiyal khlaiyayaba ode habsao gede ni jinis libima buthu khah phin hi, duha ni jug ha jar girik hi, gibi jang dong dada, Madai khe khiyal khlai hi dong manebo jing khe sling ri du.
Jing asa khlaiyaba khajama, jar ni dedao thaoyaba Madai ode sogoyahba Jisu Krista nujao ginyaba grao khe jing jon hi ning dong ma se.
Bo ning jar khe jar jinthane ri hi, khrip gajai ni phrang bo jingkhe kho hi, jar ne subung slam mani gathar khlai hi, hamba khusi dangma mijingyaba khe bo jinthane ri kha.
Ebo grao buthu khe bai hi thi lah, ode phura hukhum gnang jang baosi bujai hi jo lah. Saosibo ningkhe hamya da mai thing.
Subung buthu khe sling ri lah, bisardarrao ode hukhum gnangrao ni bakhla ha hap mane, grao mani mane, khrip hamba khusi dang mani slai mani,
saosi khebo hamya thiya mani, nam khormu phnangya mani, gasain mani, ode khrip subung ni bakhla ha hapyaba grao gibi khe wainso phin ri lah.

Jingbo, sagang hade, gibir ja ba, grao layayaba, thokhi baiyaba, libima ni khrip jadi ha suk jang dongyaba, hingsa yaowai hi dongyaba, ode jing rege rege dong ba, ar saosi jang saosi jing thalaiya ja ba.
Thikhabo, jini sogoyah Madai ham bani dara jang maya doya ode boni hamjaoma subung ni basao ha nujaophai hi,
jar ni dormo ha ebo khusi buthu khe dang bani niya, boni khasaoma ni khlai hi se bo jing khe sogo hi, gadain jayaba ha susa hi, Bese Gathar ha jing gadain ja kha.

Bese Gathar khe jini sogoyah Jisu Krista ni dara jang, jini basao ha hamsi ning lupha kha. Odebani se, bonsi khasaoma habo jing khe gibi ja ri hi, thaoglao ni hayu khe jing asa khlaiba lai ning don ni phantha buthu jing japhu ba se,
boni mayama ni khlai hi Madai jang gibi ja hi jing asa khlaiyaba thaoglao ni hayu khe jing mai phu ma.
Ebo grao lonma nangyaba se.

Madai khe lonyarao de hamba khusi dang phalang mani khlai hi khah muh ri lai la thing, bo buthu khe dang mani ang ning khe nangjao du. Bede thikhade bo buthu de bonthane khlai hi gabang hambi, ar labbo lab se.
Thikhabo, gibir jathai jang grao banglaiyaba, greng ni khitha khe singbaiyaba buthu, Dara ni balam ha niyalaiyaba buthu khe dangkhlai lah, bo buthu de muilo jang lab musibo giri.
Asaba subung nam khormu khaikhoyaba khede phin si phin gin bujai bani yaohon hade bokhe bisar da khlai lah.
Oleiyaba subung de biphot ha galai hi, jarkhe bonsi gajai rila ba se.
Artema ja thing, Tukik ja thing, nini ha ang haiha kha ning, Nikopoli ha ani ha asaba dara jang phai lah. Bede thikhade maising songsi ang oraha dong ma bao du.
Ukil Zena jang Apollo thu khe, mophosol thangba ha lama ha musi khebo bonsi dukhu maiya mani khlai hi, blaiba lai lai juru lah.
Ode, jini subung buthubo, nangyaba khe phura khlai mani khlai hi, hamba khusi buthu khe dang hi jarkhe yaopha mane sling lai la thing.
Aniha dongyarao khripbo ning khe khlim ha du. Lonma ha ang khe khasaoyarao ang khe khlim ri la ha.
Nisi khrip niha khasaoma dong thing.
Paul, Jisu Krista ni khlai hi phatho ha dongyaba subung, ode jini daphlung Timothe de: jing hamjaoyaba ode jing jang baosi dukhu khlai phayaba Philemon niha,
ode jini bahandao Aphi niha ja thing, jing siphaiya dongpha laiyaba niha ja thing, nini noh ha longjom bojom jayarao niha ja thing:
Madai, jini bupha ode Gabra Jisu Krista ni phrang khasaoma jang shanti nisi jang baosi nalaibo dongpha thing.
Daphlung Philemon, ang Madai biyaba buthu ha nalaibo nini bumu lahi ani Madai niha khajama ni grao khe ang thi re.
Bede thikhade, Gabra Jisu Krista ni gede ode subung gatharrao khrip gede ni hamjaoma jang lonma ning maiyaba khe ang khna du;
ning lonma ha ang jang baosi yaowai phalaiyaba de nisi niha dongyaba khrip hamba jinis phura sothar si tharmaiyaba ni balam ha de Krista gede ha hamdao phu mani khlai hi,
daphlung, nini dara jang subung gatharrao ni khasu ha smao kha bani nini hamjaoma ha ning khaja hi ang gabang ning shanti mai kha.
Odebani, bo nangjaoba lai dang mane hukhum riyaba khe Krista ha hamsi ning khitha rao la khabo,
hamjaoma ni khlai hi ang Paul ra la khabo, Krista ni subung phatho ha ang jeb jaoyaba ja la khabo, bi dada ning khe khainsu du.
Ang jar ni basa Onesima khe ang sikhol kha jaohi dongba ha maiyaba, bonthane khlai hi nini ha ang khainsu ri du.
Bo de sagang ha ninthane khlai hi musi khusi nangya, thikhabo duha de anthane jang ninthane khlai hi gabang khusi ni subung ja kha.
Bonthane ning ani khasu gojosi khe ang nini ha haiha phin kha.
Bo se hamba graojma ni khlai hi ang sikhol khah jaoyaba ha boni baslai ha bo ang khe khusi dang ri phu mani khlai hi ani ha nisi dongsong ri mani ang hamsi ning nangjao du.
Thikhabo, nini khasaoma khe bol jang khasa riba niya hi, nini grao lai ja phu mani khlai hi nini nangjaothai niyakha de musi khebo ang dangma nangjaoya.
Khaisa basain ni khlai hi ning jang degao laiyaba de thaoglao jang bokhe baslai ha maisong nang thi thihi se,
Bo de leng lai niya hi, leng thane hamdao, daphlung hamdaothao lai ja hi, anthane khlai hi hamdaothai ja hi, nisi ne khlai hi de saomang ha ode Gabra niha de ar jadao nang kho!
Odebani, ning ang khe lugu se bao khade, ang lai ning bo khebo lamjao lah.
Ode nini basao ha asaba gajai khlaiyaba ja thing, nini jinis lagai dong khade ani lagai ha nepha lah.
Ang Paul jar ni yao jang ning ebo khe reb ba se; ang su ri nang, ani ha ningbo lagai dong thi hi ning khe ang thidaoya.
Odebani, hoi daphlung, nini khlai hi Gabra ha ang khe khaja ri lah, ode Krista ha ani khah khe masa lah.
Ang saniba thabo bangdao hi ning khusi dangma se thi hi ang tharmai du bani nini basao ha asa deng hi ninthane ang reb du.
Asaba ja thing, bokhe se ning dangya hi, noh mathao manebo anthane khlai hi salai lah, nisi biyaba buthu ni khlai hi nisi niha ang yaopha ma nangma thi hi ang lon du.
Epaphra, Krista Jisu ha ang jang baosi phatho ha dongyaba, ning khe bo khlim ha du.
Ang jang baosi khusi dangphayaba Marka thu, Aristarka thu, Dema thu, Luk thubo olei jasoni ning bonsibo khlim ha du.
Jini Gabra Jisu Krista ni khasaoma nisi khrip ni bese jang baosi dongpha thing. Amen.
Sagang ni jug ha Madai jar ni greng buthu niha khaisa khaisa khlai hi ode khrip jadi ni balam ha gorasalirao ni jahi grao sainthiyaba de,
ebo basain jamthaoba ha, boni Basa jahi jini ha bo grao thi kha. Bo de khrip somphothi naiso mane khlai hi bokhe saikho kha. Ode bo ning habsao ni jinis buthu khe sangsaiba se.

Bo de jar ni Madai ni muima jnama jang, boni gibi jang baosi, bo raothai jang khusi dangyaba ni balam ha slamyaba jahi, phap buthu khe bo gathar khlai bani yaohon ha basao gede ha dedaothao jahi yaoda gede bo kham hi kha.
Sorgo ni deglarao thabo bumu hamdao hi somphothi naisoba lai ning bonsi thabo bo dedao lang la kha.
Sorgo ni deglarao ni gejer ha sere niha ebo grao khe bo thi ba?
Ning de ani basa se,
dini ha ning khe ang mai kha. thiyaba ar,
Bonthane khlai hi ang bupha ja nang,
Bo bo anthane khlai hi basa jama se.
Basa sagra khe habsao ha bo labuphin hi, Madai thi du,
Madai ni khrip deglaraobo
Bokhe khlim la thing.
Ode, sorgo ni deglarao ni balam ni grao hade ede bo thi du:
Bode jar ni deglarao khe bonsi bar ja ri re,
boni dangyasarao khebo wai ha saoba lai bonsi khe ja rire.
Thikhabo, basa ni grao ni balam hade edehe bo thi du;
O Madai, nini raji de jug jug dong ma se,
Gibiyaba raji ni godabo, nini raji ni sason goda se.
Dormo khe ning hamjao re
dormo niyayaba khebo hamjaoya re;
Odebani, Madai, nini Madai de
Nini lugurao thabo,
ning khe khajama ni thao hudao du.
Ebo khebo bo thi ba,
Hoi Gabra, jenba ha phirthi khe ning slam ba,
sorgobo nini yao ni phrang baigoyaba se.
Bo buthu de jam lang nang, thikhabo ning de dongsong ginyaba se.
Khrip bo buthu de gainsari lai gajam ja lang la ma,
Rih khe thonba lai ning thon nang,
gainsari lai gibin ja lang nang;
Thikhabo, ning de nalai lai ning dong la ma se,
Nini maithai buthubo jam nang niya.
Sorgo deglarao ni bising ha sere ni ha ede thi ba?
Ani yaoda gede kham lah,
Nini sotrurao khe
nini yapha bakhla ha ang dengya si de.
Bonsi khrip khe khusi dangyaba bese buthu, sogolam ni somphothi phantha mai ginyarao ne khlai hi khusi dang mane bonsi haiha jaoyaba niya na?
Odebani, jing khmao jang khnayaba buthu khe khah muh rihi jing khnadao ma nang du. Ode niyakha de, bo jang jing gajain ja ma se.
Sorgo ni deglarao khe yaowai hi grao thiyaba ning rao kha la, hamya ode grao layayaba khrip buthu ning hamsisi khamthan maipha lang kha la,

elei sosi sogoma gedeba khe haiger kha la, jing bedehe khai go phu ma? Bo sogoma ni grao khe Gabra yaowai hi bo jenba ha ning sainthi kha, ode bokhe khnayarao si de bonsi jing khe rao ri pha lang kha.
Madaibo sin buthu ode gmang thaosisiyaba buthu ar khrip jadi raothai buthu jang, bo nangjaoba lai lai ning Bese Gathar jinis ronyaba buthu jang ning bonsi khebo sakhi ri du.
Habsao ha japhai ginyaba, boni balam ha jing thiyaba khe sorgo deglarao ni bakhla hade bo dengya,
Thikhabo, sereba subung brabai ha ebo grao khe sakhi ri hi bo sainthi kha:
Subung la snadi ning mithi du?
Marsi ni basabo snadi bokhe ning khiyal khlai du?
Bokhe sorgo deglarao thane hidao hi ning slam ba,
Muima jang bakhan ni khrothu khe ning ning thu ri ba,
Nini yao ha baigoyaba buthu ni basao ha bokhe ning hoja slam ba.
Boni igah bakhla ha khrip jadi khe ning deng kha.
Odebani, boni igah bakhla ha khrip jadi khe dengkha bani boni bakhla ha dengyayaba musibo boni ha giri. Thikhabo, duha sosi de boni bakhla ha denghi jing boni sadin khe nuya kho.

Thikhabo, Jisu “sorgo ni deglarao thane hi dada slamjao hi dongyaba” thiyaba khe dukhu sugu bani khlai hi se muima bakhan ni khrothu thu rijao hi dongba se thihi jing nu du; Madai ni khasaoma ni dara jang thiyaba khe khrip subung ni baslai ha jennai kha.

Bonthane khlai hi khrip dong ba, boni dara jang khrip dangyaba ne khlai hi de, basa gabang khe muima habo lang khade, bonsi sogoma slamyaba dukhu khlai bani dara jang phura khusi ja rima ning nang du.
Bede thikhade, khlaiyaba ode gathar khlai jaoyaraobo, bonsi jamthar si khripbo subung saosi ni phrang baigoyaba gaja se; odebani, bo bonsi khe daphlung thiba lajiya.
Bo Madai khe thi ba,
Ani daphlungrao ni bising ha nini bumu khe ang thi nang,
Ode bojom jayarao ni gejer ha rajab hi ning khe ang bakhan khlai nang.
Ode, Boni ha ani lonma khe asa deng nang, ode thiphin ba. Ode, Nai lah, ang jang Madai anthane riyaba ansarao khe, odebo bo thiphin ba.

Odebani, ansarao de saomang jang thijao ni phantha ja kha, odebani bobo bo jang baosi phantha maipha kha; bede thikhade, thiyaba jang thiyaba hukhum gnang (bo de sgain soithan se), bokhe sjam phu mane ode,
olei thiba khe khin bani khlai hi thang hi dongyaba thiyaba ni leng jahi dongyarao khrip khe sogo kha.
Bede thikhade, bo juru phayarao de sorgo deglarao niya, bo juru phayarao de Abraham ni greng buthu se.

Odebani, subung buthu ne khlai hi, phap gajai ni map maiyaba slam ri mani khlai hi, Madai ni gede ni jinis buthu hade, Jonthai dedao, malai khe khasao phuyaba ode lonma gnang japhu mani khlai hi, khrip grao buthu ha jar ni daphlungrao jang baosi ja ma nang du.
Bede thikhade, bo jar ning naigrik goron hi dukhu jakha bani, naigrik goronyarao khe bo juru phuyaba se.
Odebani, Hoi daphlung gatharrao, sorgo ne longyaba khe phantha maiyarao, jini grao khe lon hi haijaoyasa ode Jonthai dedao thaoyaba, Jisu khe bisar khlai lah.
Madai ni nokhor khrip ni bising ha, Moses khe lonma gnang jaba lai jasosi ning, bokhe saikhoyaba ne khlai hide bo lonma gnang se.
Nokhor khe slamyaba de jar ni nokhorrao thanebo bonsi bakhan khlaidaoba lai ning, Jisubo Moses thane bakhan maidao mane bo saikho jaoyaba se.
Bede thikhade, khrip ni nohkhor habo saosi noh slamyaba dong, thikhabo khrip jadi slamyaba Madai se.
Bubli sophai ginyaba ne thiyaba jinis dong ginyaba buthu khe ragao so ri mani khlai hi Moses de jar dangyasa jayaba ha Madai ni khrip nohkhor habo lonma gnang se.
Thikhabo, Krista de basa jang baosi Madai ni nohkhor ni phantha dong; ode boni nohkhor buthu de jing ning ja kha, jing khitha raohi jar ni asa ni sanggama ni basao ha remsong hi dong kha de.
Odebani, Bese Gathar thiba lai jasosi,
Dini ha boni khurang khe nisi khna khade,
Hajengling ha nisi ang khe nainaiba ha, grao laya ja bani bubli ha lai nisi khah da rao ri lah.
Odebani, bo greng buthu de angkhe nainai hi bonsi ang khe nai dada,
nokha maithai jang bisa gin ni bising ha ang khusi dangyaba buthu khe bonsi nu kha.
Odebani, bo greng buthu ni basao ha ang khah ha jajaoya hi,
‘Bonsi ni khah ha bonsi nalaibo bao gajai ja re,
Ani lama buthu khebo bonsi mithiya, ang thi du.
Ang sagang ha thamsi jang smai dangba lai,
Ani lenggoyaba ha bonsi hap nang niya, thidu’.
O daphlungrao, girik lah, ode niyakha de, Madai gathang ni phrang galai ri mani khlai hi asaba ni bising ha ja thing, hamya lonyayaba hapsing phaijao nang.
Dini, thi dada dong bani bising ha, nisi ni bising ha sereba, phap ha galai hi, bonsi khah khe bonsi rao riyama ni khlai hi, nalaibo sibring lai lah.
Bokhe jenba ha jing lonsingyaba khe jamthao ba sosi jing remsong hi dong khade, Krista jang masi jayarao jing ja kha thi hi tharmai lah.
Ebo de sastro thiyaba se:
Dini ha boni khurang khe nisi khna khade,
grao layahi nisi dong ba bubli ha lai nisi khah da rao ri lah.
Niyakha la, bonsi khna hi grao layayarao la sere? Egypt raji ni phrang Moses langhi baigoyarao khrip niya na somo?
Nokha maithai jang bisagin bising ha sere ni basao ha khah ha jajaoya ja ba? Hamya khusi dang hi, hajengling ha galaising hi thithar layarao ni basao ha niya kho?
Grao maniyayarao niha garhi, sere niha lenggoyaba ha hapya mani khlai hi bo smai dang ba?
Odebani, bonsi lonya bani khlai hi hap phu nang niya thihi jing tharmai du.

Odebani bo lenggoyaba ha hap phuyaba ni grao hanggaiyaba dong bani bising ha ning girikma jang jing dong lai nang, ode niyakhade nisi ni bising ha asaba habo lenggoyaba ha sophuyayaba lai nisi thaojao nang.
Hamba graojma de bonsi niha so ba lai jasosi ning jini habo sophai ba se; thikhabo, grao khnayaba hamba grao buthu ode lonma ha bonsi maniya bani, bonsi grao khnayaba de bonsi ni khlai hi lab jaya.
Jing bokhe lonyarao ni khlai hi de, bo lenggoyayaba ha jing hap du; bo ode thidu,
Ang thamsi jang smai dangba lai ning,
Ani lenggoyaba ha bonsi hap nang niya!
Habsao sangsai jenyaba khusi buthu khe bo dang blai khabo, ebo grao khe bo nalaibo thi du.
Bede thikhala, brabai hade basain sain sni grao ni balam ha bo elei thi du, Bo basain sain sni basain hade Madaibo khusi dangyaba khrip habo lenggo kha.
Ebo hathan hade: Ang lenggoyaba ha hap phu nang niya, ode bo thiphin ba.
Sereba sereba de bo lenggoyaba ha hap mani grao dong bani, ode sagang ha hamba graojma maiyarao de maniya bani khlai hi bonsi hap phuya kha bani,
Budu glao ni yaohon ha, David sainthima ri hi, Dini ha thi hi bislei bo basain bo saikho phin ba:
Dini ha boni khurang khe nisi khna khade
Nisi ni khah buthu khe da rao ri lah, thi hi bo sainthi ba lai.
Joshua bo lenggoyaba ha subung buthu khe labu khade, boni nolei bijing ha Madai de lenggoyaba gibin basain ni grao khe bo thi nang niya mu.
Bede thikhala, Madai ni subung buthu ne khlai hi, Madai jar ni khusi ni phrang lenggo ba lai, lenggo basain ha lenggo ma nang du.
Sere Madai ni lenggoyaba ha hap du, Madai ning jar khusi dangyaba buthu ha bo lenggoba lai bobo jar khusi dangyaba ni phrang lenggo du.
Odebani, grao maniya bani bonsi galaiba lai, saosibo jing galaiya mani khlai hi bo lenggoyaba ha hap mane blaiba lai lai jing ripha lai nang.

Madai ni grao de gathang se bani, khusi bo dangphu du. Seng bu daothaoyaba thanebo bode budaoyaba se, ode hayu jang bese masi jayaba ode begreng raoyaba gibin gibin khlai hi masi jayaba khe bo berkhao thar ri phu du, ode khah bising ha baothai gibin gibin buthu khebo bo hamsisi mithi phu du.
Jinis sangsaiyaba boni muh ha nujaoyayaba musibo giri. Jini graojma soginyaba ni muh hade jamthar si langtha ode khuru hi ning dong.
Odebani, sorgo jahi lailangyaba Jonthai dedaothao, muima jadao thaoyaba Jisu, Madai ni basa khe, jing mai kha bani, lonyaba grao buthu khe bol jang jing remsong lai nang.
Jing raoyayaba buthu ha jing jang baosi dukhu khlai phuyayaba Jonthai gedeba khe jing maiba niya, jing lai ning khrip jadi ni naigrik bo goron kha, thikhabo phap khusi dangyayaba khe se jing mai ba.
Odebani, jing khasao jaomani ode bubli ha jing jurujaoma nangba ha juru jao mani khlai hi khasaoma ni Raja ni khamthan gede khitha rao hi jing sampha lai nang.

Khrip Jonthai khe subung ni phrang se saikho ba, ode subung buthu ni khlai hi bo grao buthu ni balam ha subung buthu kham hi, Madai ni gede khusi dang mane saikho ba, ode phaphi buthu ne jinis riyaba bandai buthu khe bonsi yaopha du.
Bobo raoyayaba jang gading jao hi dong bani, musibo tharmaiyayarao jang lama gmayarao ni basao ha bo khah laophu ba se.
Ode, subung buthu ne bonsi yaopha ba lai, bo jar ni khlai hibo, jar ni phap buthu khe yaopha ma nang du.
Saosibo bo bakhan khe jar ni khlai hi lalaya, Aron lai Madai jang bonsi longjaoya khade.
Olei jasosi ning Kristabo, jar khe sugu lahi Jonthai dedaothao slam laya, bede thikhade, Madai bokhe saikho hi thi ba,
Ning de ani basa se,
dini phrang ning khe ang basa mai kha.
Ode, gibin hathan habo, elei thi ba,
Ning de Melkisedek jonthai jaba lai,
thaoglao ni Jonthai se.

Jisu de jar ni saomang ha dong bani sainkhali buthu ha, thiyaba ni phrang sogo phuyaba niha bol jang jirik khao hi ode mudi jang gundi jang galai hi, bi dada sainyaba buthu khe bonsi yaopha hi, Madai khe khin bani bo khna kha.
Thikhabo, Basa jahibo, bo dukhu khlai hi grao maniba sling kha.
Gibi khlai hi jaba ha, jar ni khrip grao maniyarao ne khlai hi thaoglao sogoma ni khithabo ja kha.
Odebani Melkisedek jonthai jayaba ni greng ha Jonthai Dedaothao ha bo khe saikho kha.
Bo subung ni balam hade grao thima ni bang bi, nisi khmao nathong jakha bani boni balam ha grao bujaibabo du bi.

Bo bubli khe bao ha khade, slingriyaba nisi jama ja kha mu, thikhabo, Madai ni grao slingriyaba khitha jenba ni phrang nisi ne sling riphin ma se nang du. Makham raotho thane abudih se nisi ne nangdao ba.
Abudih jiyaba si de bonsi nana se bani, dormo ni grao bonsi jiphuya kho.
Thikhabo, makham raoyaba de subung phura khrao jayarao ni khlai hi se, bo buthu de hamba hamya tharmaiyaba gyan jang bonsi baisi ja kha.

Odebani, Krista ni balam ha slingriyaba grao jenyaba buthu khe haiger hi khrao ni gede jing thanglai nang; grao jenyaba ha asa dengyaba, khah phinyaba grao ja thing, Madai ni gede lonma ni grao ja thing,
baptisma ni grao buthu ja thing, subung githi thang phinyaba ni grao ja thing, yao dengyaba ni grao ja thing, ode thaoglao bisar ni grao khe gaiphinya hi,
Madai nangjao kha de, bokhe ning jing dang ma se.
Bede thikhade, phin si khah ha jnama khe mai hi, sorgo gede ni jinis jiyaba khe mai hi, Bese Gathar khebo mai kha.
Ode, Madai ni hamba grao jang bubli sophai ginyaba ni raothai buthu khe bo mai blai kha.
Ode jangbo galaiyarao de, bonsi khah phin mani phin gadain japhin ba du bi. Bede thikhade bonsi Madai ni basa khe jar ne khlai hi kross ha phin riphin hi jnama ha bonsi laji phnu phin du.
Bede thikhade, bo phirthi ha hadi hayaba khe alang alang mai hi, boni bubra ne khlai hi sam lai bonlai gaiyaba de, bo Madai ni hamthai mai du.
Sam busuh gnang buthu khe ode sam borma se jakha de, dangkhlai jao hi, sot rijao re, ode jamthaoba hade wai goron re.
Hoi, ham daothaoyaba daphlungrao, olei jing thi la khabo, nisi niha de ham daoyaba buthu sogoma ha dongyaba jinis buthu khe dang nang thi hi jing lon du.

Nisi khusi dang du, duha sosibo nisi dangsai du, boni bumu ni khlai hi hamjaoma nisi phnu riyaba ode, subung gatharrao ni khusi buthu nisi dang riyaba khe blao mani khlai hi Madai de subung dormo niyayaba niya.
Nisi ni asa khe gibi gibi nu mani khlai hi nisi ni bising ha khrip jadibo, jamthaoba sosi nalai khah muh riyaba khe nisi ri hi ning dong mani khlai hi nisi khe ang hamsi ning nangjao du.
Odebani, nisi sele jaya hi, lonma ha khah lai phalang hi Madai grao hanggaiyaba buthu khe don ni phantha maiyarao ni daogari naijaoyarao nisi ja ma.
Abraham niha Madai grao hanggai khali, jar thane dedaoyaba bumu lama ni boni ha saosibo giri bani, bo jar ning smai dang hi thi ba,
Asaba dara jang ninthane ang hamthai ri nang, ode nini greng buthu khe gabang ang yer ri nang, thi hi thi ba.
Odebani, Abraham de dukhu khah lao dada jon hi Madai jinis hanggaiyaba khe bo mai kha.
Subung buthubo jar thane dedaoyaba ni bumu lahi bonsi smai dang re, bonsi khrip jadi grao bangalaiyaba habo, rao ri mani khlai hi smai dangyaba grao ha se bonsi grao mathao re.
Olei jasosi ning, Madai bo jar grao hanggaiyaba slai phuyathai khe nisi ne phnu ri mani khlai hi grao hanggaiyaba ni don maiyarao niha jar ni bumu lahi phura gibi khlai ba.

Bede thikhala, gibin slai phuyayaba ebo jinis magin grao hanggaiyaba ode smai dangyaba ni khlai hi Madai de mosol niya, odebani jingbo, boni ha khaiyarao go mane khlai hi jing sagang gede ni asa khe shanti jang rempha phu du.
Bo asa de jini hayu ni ser khungkhai jini ha dongyaba, lonma gnang jang raothe theyaba se. Bo asa de, ridim phungyaba khe lailang hi, hathan gathar jadao thaoyaba ha bo hap kha.
Oraha se, jinthane khlai hi, jini sagang gede langsmai mane khlai hi, Jisu hapsing kha; ode Melkisedek Jonthaima jahi dongyaba ni bumu ha thaoglao ni Jonthai dedaothao bo ja kha.
Ebo Melkisedek, Salem ni Raja, Madai ni dedao thaoyaba Jonthai de, Abraham jekhali rajarao khe sthai hi phaiphinba ha, bo jang goron hi bo hamthai ri ba.
Abraham de bokhe boni khrip jinis ni phrang majhi ha masi phantha ri ba, boni bumu ni ortho jakha de, sagangthao ha Dormo ni Raja thi du, ode Salem ni Raja thi du, ode bokhe Shanti ni Raja bo thi du.
Bode buma giri, bupha giri, boni grengbo giri, dong jenyaba basain bo giri, boni hayubo jamba basain giriyaba se; bede thikhade bo Madai ni basa lai se, thaoglao ni Jonthai jahi bo dongba se.
Greng Abraham jbah ni khrip yaodi hamba ni phrang majhi ha masi bo phantha riyaba khe bao lai lah.
Jonthai khusi dangyasa, Levi jadi buthu de, Dara ni grao lai, bonsi ni daphlung Israel subung buthu, Abraham ni greng ni phrang majhi ha masi ri mani grao riyaba khe bonsi mai ba.
Thikhabo, ebo subung, Levi jadi bising ni subung niyayaba, grao hanggaiyaba khe maiyaba Abraham ni phrang majhi ha masi lahi, bokhe bo hamthai ri ba.
Khasidaoyaba khe dedaoyaba se hamthai ri re thiyaba khe niyalai hi de phuya.
Eraha, Jonthai ni dara hade, thiphuyaba subung buthu se majhi ha masi mai re; thikhabo subung saosi Melkisedek ni balam hade, bo thang hi dongyaba ning majhi ha masi mai du.
Ode, majhi ha masi layaba Levi ning Abraham ni yao ni phrang Melkisedek niha majhi ha masi riba thi hi thiphu du.
Bede thikhade, Melkisedek Abraham khe lamjao khali, Levi jar ni bupha ni sao ha se dong ba.

Odebani, Levi ni dara ha Jonthai jayaba khe yaowai hi phura mai phudu thi kha la, (boni bakhla ni subung buthu dara ni grao khe bonsi mai kha thi) Aron Jonthai jaba lai niya hi, Melkisedek jonthai lai jonthai gibin baigoba la, snadi nang ma kho?
Jonthai ni khusi yaowaithai gibin jakha de, dara bo gibin khlai ma nang du.
Boni balam ha thihi dongyaba de gibin jadi ni subung se, bo jadi ni bising ha subung saosibo khaphra ha khusi dang mane yaowaiya.
Jini Gabra de, Moses Jonthai ni grao thiba ha thiphayaba Juda jadi ni subung ning thi hi ragao sisi jing mithi du.
Melkisedek lai jonthai gibin baigo phai hi, ebo grao khe ar ragaodao ri du.
Bode saomang ni dara ha grao slamyaba grao lai niya hi, sjam phuyayaba hayu ni raothai jang se bo jonthai japhai ba.
Bede thikhade, boni balam hade sastro thi du, Ning de Melkisedek lai ning, thaoglao ni jonthai se, thihi bo sakhi ri du.
Sagang ha grao riyaba raoya bani, ode bokhe yaowaiba jaya bani bo dangkhlai kha.
Moses ni Dara de khrip sothar si gibi khlai thar phuya. Asa khe hamdao hi bo ri phaiyaba se, bo ning Madai jang jing khe sampha ri ba se.
Ebo jinis de smai dangyaba niya bani, (bonsi de smai dangya hi ning jonthai slam ba se)
Thikhabo, Jisu khe hanggaiyaba ni raothai jang smai dang hi se bo Jonthai slam ba, ar Madai bokhe thi ba,
Ning de thaoglao ni Jonthai se,
Gabra smai dangyaba de ang slai nang niya kha.
thi hi boni balam ha sainthi ba.
Odebani, ebo smai dangyaba ha Jisu de grao khaya ba hamdao hi gejebdao riyaba japhai kha.
Bonsi bo githi ni bising ha dongsong phuma niya bani, jonthai ha gabang slam ba se;
thikhabo, Jisu thaoglao ha ning bo dong bani bo Jonthai jayaba de thaoglao ni ja kha.
Odebani, boni gede jahi Madai niha phaiyarao khe bo phura sogo phu du, bede thikhade bonsi ne bi ri mani khlai hi bo thaoglao ni hayu ha thang hi ning dong.
Olei Jonthai dedaothao, gathar, musibo gajai giriyaba, ragaoyaba, ode phaphirao ni phrang gibin dongyaba, ode sorgo thabo judao hi suguyaba khe jing mai kha.

Jonthaimarao nalaibo jar ni phap buthu khe bonsi bandai ha yaopha da hi, boni yaohon ha se subung buthu ni khlai hi bonsi yaopha phin re; thikhabo, duha de olei dangya hi, jar khe bonsi yaopha hi, khrip subung ni bandai ha thaoglao ni khlai hi bo jar khe yaopha kha.
Dara ha subung raoyayaba khe jonthai gedeba ha saikho re, smai grao ni dara dongphai bani sothar si dongyaba khe, jonthai dedaothao ha bokhe saikho kha.
Jing grao thima nangjaoyaba de ebo se; olei Jonthai dedaothao sorgo ha muima ni Raja khamthan ni yaoda ha khamhiyaba khe jing mai kha.
Hathan gathar ode thambu gibi gibi, subung dangyaba niya, Gabra songkhuyaba ni dangyaba se.
Jonthai Dedaothao jayarao de jinis yaophayaba ode bandai buthu khe yaopha mane saikhu jaoyaba se; odebani, ebo jonthaibo asaba jinis khe yaopha mane dongma nang du.
Duha bode phirthi ha dongba se thikhade, bo jonthai ja nang niya, dara ha lai jinis riyaba khe yaopha ginyarao dong thi.

Bonsi de sorgo ni jinis buthu ni saokhuli jang sigring ni khusi khe se ning bonsi dang ba, Moses thambu dang mani sagang ha, “hading ha boni saokhuli khe ninthane phnu riba lai jasosi, jamthar si, khrip jadi mani ma nang ma, thi hi bao lah”, Madai thiba lai.

Thikhabo, duha de, dangyasa Krista maiyaba de, bonsi dangyaba thanebo gabang dedao; bede thikhala graodiyahsa ja hi dangyaba grao khayaba de hamdao hi grao hanggaiyaba raodao bani, dara gajam ni grao khayaba thanebo bo dedaoyaba se.
“Sagang ni grao khayaba musi thima giri khade, bo gibin ne khlai hi smai ma nangya kha mu.
Bonsi siji bani se bo ebo grao khe thi ba, nai lah, bo basain buthu de sophai ma ja kha,” ode Gabra thi du,
“Israel noh khor jang Juda noh khor baosi grao gadain ang khah nang;
Egypt ni phrang lang mani bonsi ni yao ha ang rem khali,
Bonsi ni greng buthu ne grao khayaba khe slam riba lai de ja nang niya,
Bede thikhade bonsi ang grao khayaba ha dongsongya,
Odebani bonsi khe ang khiyal khlaiya.”
“Bo basain buthu ni yaohon ha Israel noh khor niha ang grao khaginyaba de ebo se,” Gabra thi du,
“Bonsi ni baothai buthu ha ani dara buthu khe ang deng nang,
Bonsi ni khasu habo ang reb ma se
Ang bonsi ni Madai ja nang
Bonsi de ani subung buthu jama se.
Gabra khe tharmai lah thi hi bonsi
jar ni noharirao khe thilaima nangya kha,
Bonsi khasi daothao ni phrang dedaothao sosi,
Ang khe bonsi mithi thar ma se.
Bede thikhade, bonsi ni hamya ni balam ha
Ang map khlai nang,
Bonsi ni phap buthu khebo wainso nang niya kha.”
Grao khayaba gadain thi hi sainthi bani, bo sagang ni grao khe yaowaiba jaya kha. Ode gajam jinis jang raba ni yaohon hade srap jam ma se.
Sagang ha grao khayaba habo, Madai khe khlim bani dara buthu ode phirthi gede habo hathan gathar dong ba.
Bonsi Thambu masi dang ba, sagangthao ni hathan hade thaophari dengthan basang, masi basang, hon ni dengthan dong ba, bokhe bonsi hathan gathar thi du.
Rih dimsoyaba phin gin ni yaohon hase, bonsi hathan gathar daoyaba thiyaba de dong ba.

Oraha se bahai midim saoyaba gajao ni khapra ode, grao khayaba ni bokhoh, gajao jang luphayaba khe deng du; bo grao khayaba bokhoh ni bising hade bonsi manna dengyaba gajao ni mudik, Aron ni goda ridimyaba, ode grao khayaba longthai bakhlap buthu bo dong.

Grao khayaba bokhoh ni basao hade muima ni Cherubrao dong ba, bo buthu khe khasaoma ni khamthan khe bonsi ni bagrang buthu jang bonsi saikhlim khlai ba. Ebo jinis buthu khe duha de bising bohor jing thiphu nang niya.
Olei jamthar si salai blai hi se, Jonthairao de Thambu sagangthao ni khutha ha, dara-disa ni khusi buthu khe dang hi nalaibo bonsi bising ha hapsing re.

Thikhabo, khutha maginyaba hade Jonthai dedao thaoyaba se ning, maithai si ha phin si, jar ni khlai hi ode subung buthu mithiya hi bonsi dang gajaiyaba buthu khe bandai yaopha mani khlai hi thijao lang hi bo hapsing re.
Eraha, Bese Gathar jang edehe phnu du; Thambu ni ronda ha song hi dongdu si de, hathan gathar jadao thaoyaba de khuru nang niya thi du.
Ebo de dini dakhna ni bubli khe nisi ne phnu riyaba daogari se. Ebo bisar ni dara hase, jinis riyaba buthu ode bandai buthu khe yaopha ba, bo buthu jang de hamba hamya khe phura mithi thar phuya.
Ebo khrip jima-lingma ja thing, dugurthai gibin gibin ja thing, saomang gede ni jinis ni dara buthu ning se. Bo buthu khe gadain slamyaba bubli sophaiya si yaowai mani nephaya ba se.

Thikhabo, Krista de hamba jinis sophaiyaba buthu ni Jonthai dedaothao bo japhai kha; bo khusi dangyaba Thambu, subung ni yao jang dangyaba niya, (boni ortho de jinis sangsaiyaba bo niya), boni muima jang gibi jatharyaba se.

Burunsa buthu jang mususa buthu ni bithi jang niya hi, jar ni bithi khe lang hi ning hathan gathar jadao thaoyaba ha phin si jang blai thar mani khlai hi bo hapsing hi, olei se thaoglao khoyaba khe bo slam ba.
Burun buthu jang musu jla buthu ni bithi jang musu jikkhla ni thaphla jang, gusu subung buthu khe saikhru hi, bonsi ni basao gathar jama ni khlai hi, bonsi khe bo gathar khlai phu kha la,

Krista, thaoglao Bese ni dara jang, Madai niha mukhang phinya hi bithi yaophayaba la, thang hi dongyaba Madai ni khusi dang mani khlai hi, jing hamba hamya tharmaiyaba khe khusi dangyaba githi ni phrang bo bislei jing khe gathar khlai dao nang!

Odebani, dara jang bode grao khayaba gadain ni graodiyahsa jaba se; sagang grao khayaba ni bakhla ha gajai khlaiyaba buthu ni phrang sogo mani khlai hi, thihyaba ha khajao kha bani, longjao hi dongyarao de thaoglao hanggai hi dengyaba khe bonsi mai phu ma.
Bede thikhade, braha grao khayaba dong, oraha grao khayaba ni thiyaba khebo buji ma nang du.
Grao khayababo bokhe khayaba thang hi dongdu si de grao musibo niya, bo thihba ni yaohon hase bo khe yaowai ma.
Odebani, sagang grao khayababo thijao jang niya hi de rao phuya.

Dara ni grao riyaba khrip jadi Moses khrip subung buthu niha bo sainthi bani yaohon ha, musu jla buthu ni ode burun buthu ni bithi khe la hi dih jang migur gajao jnayaba ode hussop khe bo lang hi, Dara ni laisi basao ha ar khrip subung buthu khebo saiphra ba.
Ebo ning Madai nisi ne saikho riyaba grao khayaba ni thijao se, thihi bonsi thi pha lang ba.
Olei jasosi ning thijao jang Thambu jang Madai ni bikhoh ha yaodi dongyaba khrip khebo bo saiphra ba.
Gibi de ebo se, dara ni bakhla hade khrip jadi khe ebo thijao jang ning gathar khlai re, thijao baigo riya thikhade phap buthu ni map maiya.
Odebani, sorgo ni jinis jang baosi jayaba buthu ning, olei gathar jama nang du thikhade, sorgo ni jinis gibi gibiyaba la bonthanebo bandai hamdao hi gathar khlai mani grao ning.
Yao jang dangyaba, hathan gathar bo gibi gibiyaba laiyaba hade Krista de hapsingya, duha de Madai ni sagang ha jini baslai ha song mani khlai hi, sorgo ha bo hapsing kha.
Jonthai dedao thaoyaba maithai phorong jar ni thijao niya hi, mih ni thijao khe lang hi, hathan gathar ha bo hapba lai, bo de jarkhe yaopha mani khlai hi bo hapya.

Niyakha la, habsao sangsai jenba ni phrang la hi, alang alang dukhu suguma nang kha mu. Thikhabo, duha ni bubli jamthao ba ha, bo jar ning bandai ha kho hi, phap khe gajain khlai mani khlai hi, phinsi jang jamthar ri hi bo nujao kha.
Ode, subung ni khlai hi phin si thih ma nang kha, boni yaohon ha se bisar ja ma.

Olei jasosi ning Krista gabang subung ni phap buthu khe horkhu lang mani khlai hi phin si bandai ha bo yaopha la kha. Ode, sere subung sogoma mai mani khlai hi bokhe jonyarao niha de phin gin habo nujao phaiphin ma se.

Judarao ni dara de hamba jinis dongphai ginyaba buthu ni daogari se ning gibi gibiyaba niya. Odebani se maithai phorong nalai bonsi bandai yaophayarao, bandai yaopha mane khlai hi boni rogong ha phaiyarao asaba khalibo phura ja phuya.
Phura khlaiphu khade, Madai khe maniyarao se eboni balam ha phin si ha khrip gathar khlaithar hi, phap tharmaiyaba bonsi dong nang niya kha, ode, bandai yaophayaba khe bonsi gar nang niya na somo?
Thikhabo, bo bandai riyaba buthu maithai phorong phap tharmaiyaba khe wainso ri phinyaba se jadao ba.
Bede thikhade, musu jla buthu ode burun buthu ni thijao jang phap buthu khe sjam phuma niya.
Odebani, habsao ha Krista phai bani bubli ha bo thi ba:
Bandai riyaba buthu jang jinis yaophayaba buthu khe ning nangjaoya,
Anthane khlai hi saomang se ning a ne salai ri ba.
Saomang saokhrip hi bandai riyaba buthu ode,
phap bandai riyaba buthu hade gijisa bo ning khajaya.
Boha se ang thima, O Madai,
Nai lah, nini nangthai khe dang mani khlai hi ang phai du.
Laisi bajab thonyaba ha ani balam ni grao khe bo reb du, ang thi du

Sagang ha, Bandai buthu, jinis yaophayaba buthu, saomang saokhripyaba buthu ode phap bandai yaophayaba buthu khe ning nangjaoya, khajababo ning khajaya, thi hi bo sainthi khali bo buthu dara ni grao ha lai bonsi yaophayaba se.
Ode, ebo grao khebo bo thi du, Nai lah, ning nangjaoba lai dang mani khlai hi ang phai du. Ang phai du thiyaba de, bo yaohon ni khe raodao rima ni khlai hi bo sagang ni khebo sjam kha.
Madai nangjaoba lai, Jisu Krista ni saomang khe thaoglao ne khlai hi phin si ha srap yaopha kha bani jing gathar ja kha.
Khrip jonthai sain baigoba khe sain hi, khusi dang hi bonsi song dada, nalai lai ning bonsi bandai yaopha re; thikhabo, bo bandai buthu ni phap buthu khe musi dara jangbo bonsi sjam phuya.
Thikhabo, Krista de thaoglao ni khlai hi phap buthu ni bandai phin si se ning yaopha bani yaohon ha, Madai ni yaoda gede bo kham hi kha.
Boni phrang se, boni sotrurao khe jar ni yapha bakhla ha dengyasi de bo jon hi ning dong ba.
Jinis yaophayaba masi jang se ning, gathar khlai jaoyarao de thaoglao ni khlai hi phura ja kha.
Odehe, Bese Gathar bo elei ning jinthane tharmai ri hi thi du,
Gabra thi du, Bo basain buthu ni yaohon ha,
bonsi niha grao ang khaginyaba de ebo buthu se,
Bonsi ni khasu ha ani dara buthu khe ang dang nang,
bonsi ni baothai buthu habo ang reb ma se.
Bokhe garhibo, Bonsi ni phap buthu ode bonsi ni gajai buthu khe wainso nang niya kha, ode bo thi ba.
Odebani, ebo buthu khe gibi jang map jakha de, phin phap ni bandai khe yaopha ma nangya kha.
Odebani daphlungrao, Jisu ni thijao ni balam jang hathan gathar hade,
khitha rao hi hap phuyaba khe jing mai hi, rihjeng phungyaba, boni saomang khe lailang hi, lama gadain ode hayu khe bo jinthane khru ri kha.
Madai ni noh khor basao ha jonthai dedao thaoyaba khe jing mai kha bani.
Odebani, phap andar jayayaba, khah susayaba ha dong hi, saomang khebo dih thar jang susa hi, lonma ha ragao sisi tharmaiyaba gyan khe la hi, rogong gabasi ha jing thang la nang.
Jing asa khlaiyaba grao gathang maniyaba khe, raothe the jing remsong lai nang, bo grao hanggaiyaba de lonma gnang se.
Hamjaoma phnu mane ode hamba khusi dang mani jing saosi khe saosi sugu lai mane jing bao lai nang.
Gejesi dongba lai, bojom jaba khe dang khlaiya hi, nangyaba khe dang mani khlai hi sibring lai lah. Basain sampha dao samphadao japhaiba khe nai hi ar sibringdao lai la kho.
Gibi grao bujima khe jing mai bani yaohon habo, jing phap khusi dang khade, phaphirao ni khlai hi bandai musibo giri.
Bo thanebo khinthao saja ni bisar, ode badaiyarao kham khripyaba thamsi ni wai de duha soya kho.
Moses ni Dara khe maniyayaba de, gini gatham ni sakhi jang, maya doya khlaiya hi sthai re.
Madai ni basa khe gasep hi, grao khayaba ni thijao, bo gathar khlaiyaba khe ning siji hi, khasaoma ni bese khe haglai baoyaba de, bislei saja mai nang thi hi nisi bao du?
Baslai laba de ani khusi se, ang baslai su nang, thi du, ode, Gabra de jar ni subung buthu ni khlai hi bao ma se, thiyaba khe jing tharmai du.
Madai gathang ni yao ha galaiyaba de khinthao sisiyaba grao se!
Sagang ha nisi bede dong ba wainso lah. Gabra ni jnama ha nisi dong bani yaohon ha dukhu hadi nisi goron khali blaiya si blaiya si nisi dukhu ajaoba khe wainso phin lah.
Sainsi khali hade, nisi sijijao ba ode dukhu rijaoyaba ni nisi mlao thalao khlaijao ba, bakhali ba ha olei dukhu khlaiyarao sakhi jahi dukhu khlaipha ba.

Ning sikhol jang khajao hi phatho ha dongyarao ni dukhu habo dukhu khlai ba, ode jar ni don somphothibo khusi jang lang mani ri ba, ebo khe tharmai hi nini ha ar masi dedao thaoyababo dong kho thi hi mithi du.
Odebani, jar lonsingyaba khe da dangkhlai lah; boni yaosandi de bi.
Madai nangjao ba lai nisi dang blai hi, jinis hanggaiyaba khe nisi maiphu mani khlai hi nisi khah laoma nang du.
Bede thikhade, sastro thi du,
Khaisa bubli ni yaohon ha phaiginyaba
srap phai ma ning,
budu lao nang niya.
Thikhabo, ani dormo ni subung buthu lonma ha ning thang hi dong ma se,
Sere subung yaohon druphin du
ani khah ha bokhe gijisabo khaja nang niya.
Thikhabo, jing de jam mani yaohon druphinyaba dol ni subung niya, jing de lonma mai hi goyarao ni bising ni subung se.
Lonma de jinis asa khlaiyaba buthu, asaba dara jang dong thi hi tharmaiyaba, jinis nuyayaba khe ragao sisi tharmai soyaba se.
Lon bani khlai hi jini greng buthubo bakhan khlaijao ba se.
Lonma jang habsao khe Madai grao ha khrip sangsaiba se thi hi jing tharmai du, odebani jinis nuphuyaba buthu khe jinis nuphuyayaba ni phrang bo sangsai ba se.

Lonma jang ning Abel de Kaina thanebo bandai hamdaoyaba Madai niha yaopha ba. Odebani bokhe dormo subung se thi hi sakhi bo ri du, bede thikhade Madai ning bo jinis riyaba buthu ni balam habo sakhi ri kha. Bo thi langla khabo, duha sosibo grao thi du.
Lonma jang ning Enok de thihyaba khe nuya hi ning bo sugu langjao ba, Madai ning sugu lang bani bokhe nuya kha. Sugu lang bani sagang ha ning Madai khe bo khaja riba thi hibo sakhi ri lang kha.
Lonma giri khade Madai khe khusi khlai phuya, asababo Madai niha phaiyaba de, bokhe lonma nang du thi hi ode, bokhe smaiyarao khe bo yaosandi ridu thi hi lonma nang du.

Lonma jang Noah de jinis nujaoyayaba buthu ni balam ha Madai sainthi dayaba khe bo nangyaba se bao hi, Madai khe khinyaba gathar khe la hi, bo jar ni noh khor khe sogo mani khlai hi bo rung dain ba. Bokhe habsao gajai ja riba, thikhabo lon bani bo dormo somphothi ni phantha ja lang la kha.
Abraham khebo long khali ha lonma jang ning somphothi ni phantha lama ni Madai longyaba grao khe mani ba. Odebani bo thangginyaba lama khebo tharmaiya hi bo baigo lang ba.

Lonma jang raji andar, malai ni raji ha naorai jahi dongba lai bo dongsong hi, rih ni noh buthu ha bo dong ba, olei jasosi ning grao hanggaiyaba graoma mai phayaba, Isak jang Jakob thubo bonsi jang baosi dong ba.
Bode longthai gaiyaba buthu gnang nogor, Madai ni bisar jang dangyaba ode slamyaba khe naibai hi jon hi bo dong ba.
Lonma jang Sara-bo bo hanggaiyaba khe lonma ha bokhe saikho bani bo grajik jahibo bumu thao phuyaba raothai khe bo mai ba.
Subung saosi, githi lai jabani yaohon ni phrang se nokhasao ni sathrai buthu lai bang hi ode sagor dergong ni hajeng khe sainso phuya si bangba lai bumu hajai phai kha.

Ebo buthu khrip lonma ha dong song hi, grao hanggaiyaba buthu khe maiya hi ning bonsi thih lang la kha, thikhabo bonsi gajain ni phrang naiha hi bonsi khaja ba. Ode phirthi hade raji gibin ha mophosol thang hi subung naorai ja hi dongba lai se thi hi bonsi khe tharmai ri kha.
Olei thiyarao de jar ni raji ne khlai hi smaiyarao se thi hi hamsisi phnu la du.
Bonsi dangkhlai hi baigo buyaba raji khe wainso khade, bonsi phaiphin mani bubli khe hajora mai nang mu.
Thikhabo, raji hamdaoyaba, sorgo ha dongyaba bokhe bonsi nangjao du. Odebani Madai ning bonsi ni Madai thijaoba khe bo lajiya, bedethikhala, bonsi ne khlai hi bo nogorbo salai ri kha.
Lonma ha Abraham khe khah naiba ni bubli ha, Isak khe bo bandai yaopha ba. Grao hanggaiyaba buthu khe maiyaba de boni basa saosi mang mang dongyaba,
Isak ni phrang nini bongso thijaoma se thi hi Madai ning boni ha sainthiba, bokhe ning bo bandai yaopha ba.
Madai de subung githi ni bising ni phrang subung khe bo mathang phin phudu thi hi bo longsing du; odebani thihba ni yaohon ha mathang phinba lai jasosi ning, bo phin maiphin ba.
Lonma jang Isak de jinis sophai ginyaba ni balam ha Jakob jang Esau khe bo hamthai ri ba.
Lonma jang Jakob de, thihma ni sagang ha, Josef ni basathu gini khebo bo hamthai riba, ode boni yaothu khe asa jang gonggalai hi Madai khe bo khlim ba.
Lonma jang Josef de thihma ni sagang ha Israel ni greng buthu thang mani grao khe bo thi ba, ode boni manggathi khe bonsi phip mani balam ha bonsi khe hukhum ri ba.
Lonma jang Moses hajaiphai khali ha, nana majang sebani khlai hi Raja hukhum riyaba khe khinya dada boni buma bupha nokha dain tham hui hi bokhe deng ba.
Lonma ha Moses dephai bani yaohon ha Pharao ni bisik ni basa thijaoma khe bo nangjaoya ja ba.
Khaisa bubli ni bising ha phap ni bandai ha suk khlaiba thane, Madai ni subung buthu jang baosi dukhu hadi khlai mani bo saikho ba.
Krista ni khlai hi naisle jaoyaba dukhu de Egypt raji ni khrip gnang thanebo muilo jadao bao ba, bede thikhade boni yaosandi maiginyaba khe bo nai hi ning dong ba.
Lonma jang raja ni thamsi khebo khinya hi Egypt raji khe bo haiger hi baigo lang ba; nuphuyayaba Madai khe nu bani bo dukhu ajaoba se.
Lonma jang baiglai busu ni mel thijao jang phaidayaba khe bonsi mani hi, basa sagra khe sjamyaba de Israel bongso ni basa sagra buthu khe bo dophaya mani khlai hi.
Lonma jang sagor gajao khe hah grain ha thangba lai, bonsi bailang ba. Egypt raji ni subung buthubo lailang ma bao ba, thikhabo bonsi dih ha glik thar ba.
Lonma jang Jeriko khe nokha sain sni daoding bani yaohon ha bo gubu ba.
Lonma jang sao khe phain jiyaba Rahabbo naikhaoyarao khe hamsisi noh mathao ri bani lonyayarao ni bising ha bo jamphaya.
Duha ar snadi thi nang kho? Gideon thu, Samson thu, Jeptha thu, David thu, Samuel jang gorasalirao ni balam ha thima ni ani bubli jang ja nang niya.
Bo buthu se lonma jang Raja ni raji khe la hi, gibi jang bonsi bisar khlai hi, grao hanggaiyaba buthu khe bonsi mai hi, misiraigonma buthu khe bonsi mejep hi,

waislai hur hur jing jaba khe bonsi sthai ba, seng buyaba khe bonsi lailang ba, raoyayaba ni phrang raodaothao slamjao hi bonsi dong ba, jbah ha subung bol raoyaba bonsi ja kha, raji gibin ni siphaiyarao khe bonsi rik khlai kha.

Masainjikrao bo bonsi ni subung githirao thang phinyaba khe bonsi maiphin kha. Gibin subung buthu de dukhu rijao hi bonsi dong ba, baija phinyaba hamdaoyaba khe bonsi maiphu mani khlai hi sogoma bo bonsi nangjaoya.
Gibin subung buthu bo dukhu rijao hi, bonsi sujao ba, ode gejesi jakha de sikhol jang khahjao hi phatho khoh ha dengjaoyarao bo bonsi dong ba.

Gejesi de longthai jang lem ba, gejesi jakha de bondo rasoyaba jang rasojao ba, gejesi jakha de seng jang dainthai jao ba, ode melma bugur jang burun bugur khe phin hi bonsi ejang ojang daobai ba, rege rege dukhu rijao hi bonsi dong ba, mosol jang bonsi dukhu rijao ba.
Bo buthu ne khlai hide, habsao ha dong ba jaya kha, hajengling buthu ha, hading buthu ha, longkhip buthu ha, ode hakhor buthu ha ejang ojang bonsi daobai hi dong ba.
Bo buthu khrip de bonsi lon bani khlai hi bakhan mai la khabo, jinis hanggaiyaba khede bonsi mai nang niya.
Bede thikhade, Madai ning jinthane khlai hi sagang ha ning hamdaoyaba jinis khe bo salai kha, bonsi ar jing gabaya hi bonsi khe phura ja riya mani khlai hi se bo dang ba.

Odebani, olei sakhi bang hi jimi phung ba lai, jini sersi giding gading hi dongba ha, jing khe dibin sibin khlaiyaba ode jini ha phap dongyaba khe dangkhlai hi, jini sagang gede khai ba badai laiyaba ha, tha, jing khaipha lang nang.

Jisu, jini lonma slamyaba ode phura phlaiyaba khe nai hi ning donglai nang; bode boni sagang ha khajama deng bani laji khe musi baoya hi kross ha khah laohi dukhu phlai dada Madai ni khamthan ni yaoda gede bo kham hi kha.
Nisi raoya hi gmang giji jaya mani khlai hi, olei subung phaphirao bo jang bonsi nanglai hi dukhu phlaiyaba khe bao lah.
Phap jang nanglai hi thijao baigo si nisi nanglaiya kho.
Basathu lai sibringyaba ni grao maniyaba khe nisi blao kha;
Ani basa, Gabra ni sason grao khe haglai da bao lah;
ar bo joba ha ning khah ha jajaoya da ja lah.
Gabra de bo hamjaoyarao khe sason khlai re,
Boni basa maniyaba si khe bo su re, thi du.
Sason ni grao se bani khah laoma jang nisi blaiya si dukhu khlai ma nang du. Basathu ni basao ha nisi dangba lai, nisi ni basao ha bo dang du. Bupha basa khe sason khlaiya hi sere dong du?
Khrip ni basa maiyaba sason khlaiyaba grao khe nisi maiya khade bo jar ni basa gibiyaba niya hi basa haglang se ja ma thi hi nisi mithiya.

Bo jing khe sason khlai mani khlai hi subung ni gede buphabo jing mai hi, bonsi khe jing manbo khlai du. Jini hayu ni khlai hi Bese gede ni bupha ni hukhum bakhla ha jing ar hapma nangdao nang niya na somo?
Bonsi de jar jar ni bujithai jang khaisa basain ni khlai hi jing khe bonsi sason khlai re, thikhabo bode jini lab ne khlai hi se dong ba. Bede thikhade jingbo boni gathar khe phantha mai ma se.
Sason ni dukhu bubli hade khajama nujaoya, dukhu nangba se nujao re. Thikhabo, dukhu ni yaohon ha se gong hi dongyarao ne khlai hi de dormo ni hamba bathai mai re.
Odebani, yao galaiyaba khe sugu lah, ode yasgu raoyayaba khe nisi rao ri lah.
Ode, igah khora de jar ni igah greya hi ham hi dong mani, nisi ni igah buthu ni khlai hi lama belengyaba buthu khe slam lah.
Khrip subung jang milima ar gathar khe smai hi riksai lah, gathar jaya khade saosibo Gabra khe nu nang niya.
Madai ni khasaoma khe saosi bo maiya hi dongya mane ode, gabang subung rege rege khlai phuyaba, ode gaso suso khlaiyaba ni basla ja hi yader suya mani khlai hi girik lah.
Sere gaori jabai hi, Esau lai Madai khe baoyayaba subung jaya mani khlai hi girik lah. Bo de makham san si ji hi jar basa sagra jayaba khe phain jiba.
Boni yaohon hade hamthai ni don phantha khe maima nangjao hi, mudi galai hi smai la khabo, khah phin mani hajora maiya kha bani, dangkhlai jaoba thi hi tharmai lah.
Nisi sohiyaba hading khede, dopha phuya, wai hur hur jingyaba; jimi gisim jang andar jrim jrim ja hi dimphung hi baryung sipyaba,
bibul ni khurang hoh jayaba jang grao thiyaba khurang ni sar khe baigoyaba lai de niya, bo khurang ni sar khnayarao de musibo gibin grao khe bonsi niha thiphinya mani khlai hi bonsi khainsu ba.
Mih sosibo hading khe dopha khade, longthai jang lemthai ma thi hi grao riyaba khe bonsi dukhu sui phuya kha;
bonsi jinis nuyaba de khinthao thao se bani, Moses sosibo, the the mao ba thi hi bo thi ba.
Thikhabo, nisi de Zion hading niha, Madai gathang ni nogor, sorgo ni Jerusalem niha, sorgo ni degla sainso phuyayaba buthu niha,
sorgo ha bumu gakhuyaba basa sagra jayaba ni longjom niha, khrip subung ni bisar khlaiyaba bisardar niha, dormo subung phura khlaijao hi dongyarao ni bese buthu niha,
grao khayaba gadain ni graodiyahsa Jisu niha, thijao saiphrayaba, Abel ni thijao thabo hamdaoyaba grao sainthiyaba niha se nisi sohidao ba.

Girik lah, grao sainthiyaba khe nisi nangjaoya jajao nang. Phirthi ha bonsi niha grao sainthiyaba khe nangjaoya jayarao ning saja khe lailang phuya kha la, jing bo sorgo ni phrang jinthane grao sainthiyaba khe jing dangkhlai kha la jing braha lailang phu ma!
Odebani, bo bubli ha boni khurang jang phirthi khe bo smao ba, thikhabo duha bo ebo grao khe hanggai kha, Phin si phirthi khe se ning niya hi, nokhasao khebo ang smaophin ma se, thi du.
Phin si phin ang smao phin ma se thi dada smao jao hi dongyarao khe slamyaba jinis buthu lai disai hi bonsi dong mani grao ode, smao phuyayaba buthu khe se ning dongsong mani grao khe bo thi ba.
Odelei ning jing ebo raji smao phuyayaba khe mai kha bani, khaja hi jing dong lai nang, man jang bokhe khin hi, boni khajama jang Madai ni khusi khe jing dang lai nang;
bede thikhade, jini Madai de sao khripyaba wai se.
Daphlung jang nisi hamjao lai hi ning dong lah.
Naorairao ni basao ha hamba phnu ma khe da blao lah. Olei dang hi sereba de mithiya hi sorgo ni deglarao khe noh mathao ri kha.
Phatho ha dongyarao khe bonsi jang baosi nisi phatho dong phaba bao lah; dukhu rijao hi dongyaraobo, saomang ha jar dukhu jaba lai ning bao lah.

Disingyaba khe khrip subung bakhan khlai thing, sisaigin ni thuyambo gusu khlaiya hi ragao ri la thing; khah nangyaba phap khusi dangyarao ode gaori jayarao khe Madai ning bonsi ni balam ha bisar khlai ma se.

Rang harbaoyaba ni phrang degao lah, nisi jar jar niha jinis dongyaba ha ning khah khusi ja lah. Bo jar ning, Nisi khe asaba khalibo ang haiger nang niya, nisi khe dangkhlai hibo ang thang nang niya, thi hi bo thi du.
Odebani jing de khitha raoma jang thi du:
Gabra de ang khe juruyaba se
Ang khin nang niya.
Subung la ang khe snadi khlai phu ma?
Nisi ni hojarao, Madai ni grao nisi ne sainthiyaba buthu khe wainso song hi, bonsi ni dongthai ha bathai thaiyaba buthu khe bao dada, bonsi ni lonthai khe nai hi sling lah.
Jisu Krista de miya habo, dini habo, thaoglao habo nalai lai ning masi se.

Slingrithai gibin gibin ode gmang thaosisiyaba buthu khe langla jao hi da dong lah. Khah khe khasaoma ha rao riba de hamba se, ji mani buthu ha rao riya hi, ji mani waimu nangyarao de khah jang muh jang mai nang niya.
Jini hade eleiyaba khapra dong, oraha de thambu ha khusi dangyarao jang bonsi jipha thaoya.
Jonthai dedao thaoyaba phap ni bandai ne hathan gathar jadao thaoyaba, mih ni thijao lang hi hapsingyaba ni manggathi buthu khe nolei bakhla ha bonsi sao re.
Odebani Jisu bo jar ni thijao jang ning subung buthu khe gathar khlaiphu mani khlai hi, nogor ni khorong daoglap baji ha bo dukhu khlai kha.
Odebani, bokhe bonsi naijiyayaba khe lang hi, nolei ni baji gede jing thang la nang.
Ebo nolei hade maithai jang dong mani, jini musi giri; nolei dong phaiginyaba khe jing jon nang.
Odebani boni balam jang bakhan ni bandai khe Madai niha jing yaopha lai nang, bode boni bumu jang gabayaba bathai se.
Hamba khusi dangyaba ode saosi jang saosi juruma da blao lah; oleiyaba bandai buthu khe Madai khaja ri du.

Nisi ni hojarao ni grao khe mani lah, bonsi ni grao ni bakhla ha hap lah; nisi ni hayu buthu khe naisoyaba bonsi se; bonsi se Madai niha nisi ni graojma khe sainthi ma. Bonsi ni khusi khe khah waimu jang dangya hi, khaja dada bonsi khusi dangphu mani khlai hi bonsi ni grao khe mani lah. Khah waimu jang dang khade musibo nisi ne khlai hi lab ja nang niya.
Anthane khlai hi bi ri lah, khrip jinis ha man jang jing dangma nangjao bani, hamba hamya tharmaiyaba gathar jini ha dong thi hi jing ragao sisi tharmai du.
Nisi niha Madai ning srap ang khe haiphin ha mani khlai hi, anthane bi ri mani nisi khe ang ar khainsudao du.
Duha santi ni Madai, subung githi ni bising ni phrang jini Gabra Jisu phin khaikho hi lang smaiyaba, thaoglao grao khayaba thijao ni khlai hi melma bubra dedao thaoyaba de,

boni muh ha boni khusi nisi ni gede dong hi, bo nangjaoba lai dang mani khrip hamba khusi jang Jisu Krista ni khlai hi nisi khe phura ja ri thing. Bo Jisu Krista niha ning thaoglao jang muima dong thing. Amen.
Daphlungrao, nisi khe jing sibringyaba grao khe nisi khna mane ang nisi khe khainsu du, nisi niha ang gijisa se ning ang reb ba.
Jini buphlung Timothe khe haiger kha thi hi nisi tharmai mane ang nangjao du; bo bubli ha bo phaisram kha de, nisi jang goron laima ni ang labu pha nang.
Khrip nisi ni hojarao jang subung gatharrao khripbo angkhe khlim ri la ha. Itali raji ni phrang phaiyarao nisi khe khlim ha du.
Nisi khrip ni basao ha khasaoma dong thing. Amen.
Madai ar Gabra Jisu Krista ni dangyasa Jakob, jadi jhigin dra dri jayarao khe bo khlim ba.
Ani daphlungrao, jadi jadi nisi nai naiyaba khe goron khade, khrip khusi ni grao se thihi bao lah,
nisi lonma ha nai naiyaba goronyaba de nisi niha khah laoma slamba se thihi nisi tharmai lah.
Odehe, musibo baojoya hi nisi phura japhu mani ode, nisi khrao japhu mani khlai hi dukhu khah laoma nisi niha phura khusi ja thing.
Nisi ni bising ha asaba bo buddi gyan baojo kha de, khrip subung niha joya hi ode khaithiya hi riyaba Madai niha sain la thing, odese, mai ma.
Bede thikhade, gijisa bo lonya jaya hi lonma lahi sain la thing, lonsoyayaba de sagor ni dih bar jang sip phra hi dithon baipha ba lai jasosi se.
Lonsingyayaba subung de longthai dih rim ma khayaba, bo khusi dangyaba side gejepyaba ja kha de,
Gabra ni phrang asaba khebo mai nang thi hi da bao la thing.
Daphlung songthan hidao hi dongyaba de sugu jaoba ni bubli ha bonsi khaja la thing.
Gnang subung bo jar khe basasa khlai bani bo khaja la thing, bede thikhala, gnang subung sam bubar lai jam ginyaba se.

Sain de boni dongthai jagabyaba jang baigo du, odehe, sam lai rain hi, boni bubar de grai du, ode boni majangma bo saolang la du. Olei jasosi ning gnang subung bo jama se; boni hayu dukhu jang yaowai bani bo jam ma se.
Naigrik ha dukhu khah laoyaba de boni khophal hambi bao lah. Nai naiyaba khe dukhu khah laokha ning, Madai ning jar hamjaoyarao niha ri mane hanggaiyaba hayu ni khrothu khe bo mai ma se.
Saosibo naigrik goron ba ha, Madai se ang khe naigrik ri ba, thihi da thi thing. Madai khe phap jang naigrik phuma niya, bobo saosi khebo naigrik riya.
Thikhabo, khrip subung de jar ni libima jang se naigrik goron ba; bo libima jang se subung khe sikpha hi, bo phainjao re.
Odehe, libima ni basa phap khe bonsi hajai ri du; ode phap dephai kha thi kha ning thihyaba ha so ri re.
Ani khasaoma ni daphlungrao, thokhi jaohi da dong.
Hamba jinis riyaba ode phura jinis riyaba de basao gede ni jnama buthu ni bupha ni phrang akhai buyaba se. Boni ha se gibin jayaba ode sigring lai giding phin hi gibin slai phuyaba musi bo giri.
Bo dangma baoyaba phura japhu mani khlai hi, bo slamyaba buthu bathai thai jenyaba ja mani khlai hi, grao gibiyaba jang bo jing khe hajai riba se.
Ani khasaoma ni daphlungrao, ebo grao khe ning tharmai lah! Khrip subung grao joba khe selaiya hi, khna mani gede selai lah, thamsi baigoya hi nisi khah lao lah.
Subung ni thamsi jang de Madai ni dormo khe slam phuya.

Odebani, nisi niha rege rege dongyaba khrip buthu ode hamyayaba baothai gablaiyaba khe gajai khlai hi, nisi ni bese buthu khe sogo phumani raothai gnang dongyaba, grao nisi niha gai hi dongyaba khe basasa jahi mani lah.
Bede thikhade, grao khnayaba se ning ja hi, jar khe thokhi laya hi, khusi dang hi grao maniyaba ja lah.
Asababo grao khnayaba ja hi, maniyaba jaya khade, derphnai ha jar ni hajai phayaba mukhang khe naiba lai jasosi se.
Hamsi ning jar khe nai hi, bo thang la re, ode jar ni mukhang khe bede ja kha thihi srap bo blao re.
Thikhabo, sere phura sadin ni dara khe nai hi, bokhe hamsisi khiyal khlai hi, khna dada bo blao phinyaba jaya hi, mani dada khusi dangyaba de, bo khusi dangyaba ni hamthai mai ma se.
Sere jar khe dormo subung bao lahi, jar ni slai khe ning mathaoya hi, jar ni khah khe thokhiyaba de, bo subung ni dormo de haglai se.

Madai jang Bupha ni sagang ha dormo gathar ode phap gaba phayayaba de ebo se: mathisarao, banjikrao bonsi dukhu ni bubli ha naihiyaba ode habsao ni gusu rege dophaya hi jar khe hamsisi naiso layaba se.
Ani daphlungrao, muima ni Gabra, jini Gabra Jisu Krista ha lonma nisi asa dengyaba ha subung khe naidao naiyadao da ja lah.
Nisi githim laiyaba ha subung saosi gajao ni yaosi dam gain hi, gainsari majangyaba khe thu dada bo hapsing phai kha la, ode dukhisa subung saosi gainsari gomor khe gain hi hapsing phai kha la,
Gainsari majangyaba thuyaba nisi khiyal khlai hi, bokhe, Ning de hathan hamba ha kham la, nisi thi du. Ode subung dukhisa khede, Hogora song lah, thi hi nisi thikhade,
nisi ni bising ha naidao naiyadao jayaba phap baothai layaba ni bisar khlaiyarao ja nang niya na?
Ani khasaoma ni daphlungrao, khna lah! Madai ning habsao ha suliyayarao khe lonma ha gnang jama ni ode bo jar khasaoyarao niha bo hanggaiyaba raji khe hok ni khlai hi bo saikhoyaba niya?
Thikhabo, nisi de suliyayarao khe laji se phnu du. Subung gnangrao de nisi khe suhi dohi, bisar khoh ha nisi khe sik singyaba la bonsi niya?
Bumu man jadaothao ha rihi dongyaba la bokhe sijiyarao bonsi niya na?
Madai ni laisi ha ede thi du, Ning jar khe hamjao la ba lai ning nisi ni nohharirao khe hamjao lah, thihi raja ni dara khe nisi gibi jang mani kha de, nisi hamba khusi dang kha.
Thikhabo, nisi naidao naiyadao jakha de, nisi phap khusi dangba se. Ode, nisi dara khe baiglaiyarao jahi, dara nisi khe gajai ja rima se.
Asaba dara khe jamthar si mani lakhabo, masi grao ha hamya khlai kha de, bo khrip ni basao ha gajai ja ma se.
Bede thikhade, gaori da ja thiyaba de Da sthai bai, olei bo thi du. Gaori jaya la khabo, ning sthaibai kha de, ning dara khe hamya khlaiyaba ning ja kha.
Odebani, sadhin ni dara bakhla ha bisar khlai hi dong ginyarao lai jasosi, grao thihi khusibo dang lah.
Khasaoma giri hi khusi dangyaba, khasaoma giri hi ning bisar khlaijao ma se. Khasaoma dongyaba subung ni khlai hi bisar ni basao ha musi khinmani giri.
Ani daphlungrao, sereba, Ani ha lonma dong, thihi bo khusi dangya khala snadi lab ja ma? Olei lonma jang bo jar khe sogo la phu nang?
Daphlung ja thing, bahandao ja thing, musibo giri hi nalaibo makham ji mani baojo kha la,
nisi ni bising ha subung saosi boni ha, Shanti jang thang lah, ode suk jang hoh gablai hi dong lah, ode thi kha la, boni saomang ni khlai hi nangyaba buthu khe ning riya kha la, snadi lab ja ma?
Olei jasosi ning, lonmabo khusi dangya thikhade bo githi se.

Thikhabo, sereba subung, Nini ha lonma dong, aniha khusi dangyaba buthu dong, thihi thi nang thikha la, ang thi nang, Nini lonma khe gibin a ne phnu ri lah, ang de khusi danghi ani lonma khe nisi ne ang phnu ri nang.
Madai de saosi se ning thihi ning lon du; ning hamba khlai kha, sgain sgo buthubo lonhi lele mao du.
Hoi gibir subung! Khusi dangya hi lonma se ning de musibo niya thihi ning mithima nangjao du?
Jini phagra Abraham jar ni basa Isak khe khapra basao ha yaopha khali, khusi dang bani khlai hi bokhe dormo ni subung se thihi baoya na?
Boni lonma jang bo khusi dangyaba de masi jahi boni lonma phura jaba thihi ning tharmai du.
