Bonsi sin riyaba saobisi ja kha thiba khe ang khna ba, Israel greng buthu khrip jadi ni subung lakh masi rjing jang bisagin rjingbri, bonsi olei sin ri kha:
Juda jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin, Reuben jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin,
Aser jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin, Napthali jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin, Manase jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin,
Simeon jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin, Levi jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin, Issakar jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin,
Jebulun jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin, Josef ni jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin, Benjamin jadi ni phrang rjing jhigin sosi sin ri lang kha.

Eboni yaohon ha ang naiha ba de; subung bangba sainso phuya, khrip jadi ni bising ni subung, khrip bumu ni bising ni subung, khrip grao ni subung, gainsari guphu thu hi, saman bedep buthu khe lang hi, singhason ha ar Melmasa ni sagang ha songba khe ang nu ba.
Bonsi khurang bol jang, Sogoma de singhason ha khamyaba, jini Madai jang Melmasa ni phrang se ja ba, thihi bonsi jirikkhao ba.
Boha khrip sorgo ni degla singhason jang khraorao ar hang gnang mih buthu bonsi songding ba. Singhason ni sagang ha ning blip pha hi, Madai khe khlim hi bonsi thi ba,
Amen! suguyaba ja thing, muima ja thing, gyan ja thing, khajama ni grao thiyaba ja thing, raothai ja thing, bol ja thing, jini Madai niha ning thaoglao thaoglao jang dong thing! Amen!
Odehe, khraorao ni bising ha saosi, “Ebo gainsari guphu thuyarao la sere, braha ni phrang phai ba?” thi hi bo ang khe singphai ba.
Ang boni ha thi ba, “Gedema, ning ning mithima se thi.”
Bo aniha thiphin ba, “Ebo buthu de gabang dukhu ni phrang baigo hi, bonsi ni gainsari buthu ragaosisi susa hi Melmasa ni thijao jang phu rijaoyarao se.
Odebani, Madai ni singhason ni sagang ha bonsi dong hi, bikhoh ha ning sain jang hor jang boni khusi dangyaba ja hi, singhason ha khamyaba bonsi ni basao ha jar ni thambu khe dimding ba.
Bonsi hukhri nang niya kha, bonsi dih bo gang nang niya kha. Bonsi sain nang nang niya kha, asaba khalibo dungyaba jang dukhu ja nang niya kha;
Singhason ni gejer gejer ha dongyaba Melmasa bonsi ni Melma bubra ja lang la nang, bo ning hayu ni dikhor ha langsmai nang, Madai ning bonsi ni muthai ni phrang khrip mudi khe rusa rima se.”
Sin masniyaba khebo khru ba jang gontha gejer lai nokhasao de siri siri ja ba.
Boha, sorgo ni degla Madai ni sagang ha songyaba sni buthu khe ang nu ba, bonsi ne bibul masni bo yaopha ba.

Sorgo ni degla gibin saosi, bahai midim saoyaba gajao ni bokhoh labu hi khapra rogong ha bo songphai ba. Singhason ni sagang ha gajao ni khapra basao ha khrip subung gatharrao biyaba buthu baosing pha mani khlai hi, bahai midimyaba gabang boniha bonsi yaopha ba.
Sorgo degla ni yao ni phrang de bahai midim saoyaba ni waikhudi khe subung gatharrao biyaba buthu jang ning Madai niha sohi kha.

Odehe, sorgo ni degla ning bahai midim saoyaba bokhoh khe bo laha hi, khapra ha waithai khe gablai ri hi, bokhe phirthi ha dangkhla ba. Odebani, nokhasao grung grung grimyaba sar buthu, khurang ni sar buthu nokhasao jablai jablai gurjliyaba buthu, ode banglama smaoyaba buthu dong phai ba.
Boha sorgo ni degla sniyarao bibul masni langyarao khe dam mane bonsi salai kha.

Degla sagangthao boni bibul khe damba, gidithai jang wai, thijao jang gibringyaba baigo phai hi, bokhe phirthi ha dangkhla kha; phirthi phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si kham thar kha, boha gakhrangyaba buthubo khrip kham thar ba.
Sorgo ni degla gniyaba boni bibul khe damba, boha ning hading gedeba lai kham hi sagor ha bokhe dangsing ba.

Sagor khe phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si khe thijao ja ri hi, sagor ha hang gnang dongyaba khrip phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si thih ba, rung buthubo phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si hamya khlaijao hi dong ba.

Sorgo ni degla gathamyaba boni bibul khe dam ba jang, sathrai gedeba, waimijing lai jing hi sorgo ni phrang, dikhong buthu phantha tham saikhao hi phanthasi ni basao ha ode dihmu buthu ni basao ha ning bo graiphai ba.
Bo sathrai ni bumu de Khayaba se. Bo ning dih khe phantha tham ha phantha si saikhao hi phantha si khe bo dikha ri hi, bo gabang khah kha bani, bo dih khayaba hathan ni subung gabang ning thih kha.

Sorgo ni degla briyaba boni bibul khe dam ba jang, sain khe phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si, dain khebo phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si ode, sathrai buthu phantha tham ha phantha si khe hamya khlai ba, odehe, jnama buthu khe phantha tham ha phantha si saikhao hi bonsi andar khlai jao ba, sainbo phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si andar ja hi dong ba; olei jasosi ning horbo phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si andar japha ba.

Boha ang naiha bade, nokhasao gejer ha daoling birbai hi khurang bol jang edehe thiba khe ang khna ba, Sorgo ni degla gibin gatham bonsi ni bibul khe dam ba jang phirthi ha dongyarao ne khlai hi bubain risi bi dou! Bubain risi bi dou! Bubain risi bi dou! thi hi bo jirikkhao phai ba.
Sorgo ni degla bowayaba boni bibul khe dam ba jang, nokhasao ni phrang phirthi ha sathrai graiblaiyaba khe ang nu ba; boniha hakhor khithu giriyaba ni chabi khe bo yaopha ba.

Bo ning hakhor khithu giriyaba khe bo khru ba jang, hakhor ni phrang saohi dih khlaiyaba hagab gedeba baigo phaiba lai waikhudi hamsi ning lung lung baigo phai ba, bo waikhudi jang sain jang barbo andar jathar ba.
Bo waikhudi ni phrang de guyung buthu baigo phai dada phirthi ha galai hi, phirthi ha yung khangkhrai ni raothai lai bonsi ne raothai ri ba.
Bonsi ni bathain ha Madai sin riyaba subung buthu khe garhi de, phirthi ni samphang gathang ja thing, bonlai ja thing, bongphang musi khebo hamya khlaiya mane bonsi khe thi ba.
Sin riyayaba buthu khede bonsi sthaima riya hi, nokha dain bowa se ning dukhu ri mane bo grao ri ba, bonsi ni dukhu rithai de yung khangkhrai basla dikba lai se.
Oleiyaba basain buthu hade subung buthu jar thih lama ne smai nang, thikhabo bonsi mai nang niya; thih lama nangjao nang, thikhabo thihyaba de bonsi khe dangkhlai hi khai ma se.
Guyung buthu ni hajaithai de, jbah ne khlai hi gorai salaiba lai se. Bonsi gajao ni raja ni krothu lai thu ba, bonsi ni mukhangbo subung ni mukhang lai se.
Bonsi masainjik lai khnai deng du, bonsi ni hathai buthubo misiraigonma ni hathai buthu lai se.
Ser ni phi lai jasosi phi bonsi niha dong, bonsi ni bagrang jabyaba khurang de gorai ni roth gabang jbah ne khaiyaba sar lai se.
Bonsi ni bermaibo dong, yung khangkhrai ni bis lai bonsi ni raothai dong, bonsi ni bermai dain bowa sosi subung khe dukhu ri phure.
Hakhor khithu giriyaba ni degla se bonsi ni basao ha raja gedeba jahi bo dong ba, Hebrai grao jang boni bumu khe Abaddon thi du. Greek grao jang de Apolluon thi du.
Sagangthao ni bubain risiyaba lailang kha; odebani bubain risi gibin phinginyaba sophai ma ja kha.
Sorgo ni degla dohyaba boni bibul khe dam ba jang; ode Madai ni sagang ha gajao ni khapra bogrong mabri ni phrang khurang baigo phai ba khe ang khna ba.
Bo khurang de bibul diyaba sorgo ni degla, doh niha Euphrates dikhongma ha sorgo ni degla bri khajao hi dongyarao khe haiger lah, ode bo thi ba.

Odebani, bo maithai jang badain, bo basain ode, bo gontha ha subung phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si khe sthai mane bonsi salai hi, sorgo ni degla bri salai blai hi, remthao jao hi dongyarao khe bonsi haiger kha.
Siphaiya gorai basao ha gayarao bangba jakha de bonsi rjing jang bisatham subung ja du, thi hi bonsi thi ba khe ang khna ba.

Odehe, nujaoyaba ha gorai buthu ode bonsi ni basao ha gayarao ani muthai hade elei ja du: Gorai buthu ni basao ha gayarao de wai lai jao du, sapphir longthai lai gisim thaphla ode waithai lai gurmu phi buthu khe pha hi, gorai buthu ni bokhro buthu de misiraigonma ni bokhro lai se, bonsi ni bukhuh ni phrang wai jang waikhudi ode waithai buthu baigo phai ba.
Bonsi ni bukhuh ni phrang baigo hi, saja matham wai jang waikhudi ode waithai buthu ning subung khe phantha tham saikhao hi phantha si khe sthai kha.
Gorai buthu ni raothai bonsi ni bukhuh buthu ni phrang ode bonsi ni bermai buthu hase dong ba; bonsi ni bermai de jbu lai se, bonsi ni bokhro bo dong, bo jang se subung buthu khe sari re.

Olei saja habo sthaiya hi thaoyaba khrip gibin subung buthu bonsi ni yao ha baigoyaba buthu bonsi ni biyaba ni phrang bonsi khah phindaoya, sgain sogo khe biyaba ode, gajao ja thing, rangkhrao ja thing, gangthing ja thing, longthai ja thing, bongphang ja thing, saokhuli slamyaba, nu phuyayaba, khnayayaba odehe hamphuyayaba khe ja thing, biba khe bonsi thao daoya.
Bonsi ni sthai baiyaba buthu, bonsi ni montro buthu, bonsi ni mijingma odehe khao jibaiyaba khebo bonsi ni khah ha phindaoya.

Odehe, sorgo ni degla gibin, raodao thaoyaba, sorgo ni phrang akhai phai ba khe ang nu ba; bokhe bonsi jimi merei hi, boni khro basao ha jengglong mander su ba; boni mukhang de sain lai se, boni igah buthu waislai lai se.
Boni yao jang laisi basasa thonyaba khe khu hi labu ba. Boni igah yaoda gede sagor ha gasing hi, boni igah yaosi gede hakhong ha ga ba,
misiraigonma hoba lai khurang bol jang bo jirikkhao ba. Bo jirikkhao blai ba jang nokhasao grimyaba masni buthu de bonsi khurang buthu khe haiger kha.

Nokhasao grimyaba masni buthu ni khurang haiger ba jang, srap reb ma bao ba, thikhabo, sorgo ni phrang ang khurang khna kha, Nokhasao grimyaba masni buthu grao thiyaba khe hui lah, da reb thao, bo thi phai ba.
Odehe sagor jang hakhong ha sorgo ni degla song hi dongba khe ang nuba ha, nokhasao gede jar ni yao khe sugu hi,

nokhasao jang boni bising ha dongyaba jinis buthu, phirthi jang boni bising ha jinis dongyaba buthu, odehe sagor jang boni bising ha jinis dongyaba buthu khe slamyaba, thaoglao thaoglao thang hi dongyaba ni bumu khe lahi thi ba, Duha bubli yesi laoya kha;
thikhabo, sorgo degla sniyaba boni bibul khe dam mani basain buthu ha, Madai ni grao dengkhaoyaba jar ni dangyasa gorasalirao niha bo thiba lai ning, phura japhai ma se, odehe bo thi ba.
Boha, sorgo ni phrang khurang ang khna ba jang bo ang jang sain lai phin ba, Sagor jang hakhong ha songyaba sorgo ni degla ni yao ha laisi bajap khuru hi dongyaba khe labu lah, bo ode thi ba.

Odebani sorgo ni degla niha ang thang hi thi ba, ebo laisi bajap basasayaba khe ang sain ba, bo aniha thi ba, Neh, ebokhe lahi ji lah; nini bohoh hade khajao nang, thikhabo nini bukhuh hade beredih lai dijaoma se.
Sorgo ni degla ni yao ni phrang laisi bajap basasayaba khe laha hi ang jithar ba; boha ani bukhuh hade beredih lai di ba, ang jiblai bani yaohon ha ani bohoh hade khajao kha.
Odehe, bonsi ani ha thilang ba, Ning khe gabang subung buthu, jadi buthu, grao buthu, ode Rajarao niha Madai grao riyaba khe asaba dara jang ning baiphin ma nang ma se, bonsi odehe thiba.
Odehe, nol belengyaba, suyaba goda lai bonsi anthane ri hi, ani ha thi ba, Bai ja, Madai ni bikhoh jang khapra khe su hi, boni bising ha Madai biyarao sainso lah,
bikhoh ni barising ni hakhli gejer khede suya hi garbu lah, Jentailrao ni yao ha ri blai kha, bonsi se nogor gathar khe badain jang bisagin dain gin bising ha gasep ma.

Odehe, ani grao khe mithi phayaba gini de, grao thida phu mani khlai hi ang raothai ri nang, ode rih miyao duduyaba khe phin hi basain jang rjing jhigin bisatham sosi bonsi grao sainthi ma se, thi hi bo a ne sainthi ba.
Ebo buthu de, Oliv buphang phang gin ar thaophari dengthan boitho magin, phirthi ni Gabra ni sagang ha songyarao se.

Bonsi khe sere dukhu rima bao du, bonsi ni bukhuh ni phrang wai baigo phai hi, bonsi ni sotrurao khebo saokhrip ma se. Sere bonsi khe dukhu rima baoba lai bao du, olei jasosi ning bonsi sthaijao ma se.

Ebo grao buthu khe thi bani bising ha hadi haya mani khlai hi nokhasao khe phrao phuyaba raothai bonsi niha dong, thijao ja rima ni khlai hi dih ni basao habo raothai bonsi niha dong, bo asaba bubli habo nangjaoba lai phirthi ni basao ha yao sugu hi khrip jadi biyaba didao riphuyaba raothaibo bonsi niha dong.
Bonsi grao khe mithipha ri blai ba jang hakhor khithu giriyaba ni phrang mih rege baigo phai hi, bonsi jang nanglai nang, bonsi khe de nang, ode bonsi khe sthai ma se.
Odehe, bonsi ni manggathi buthu nogor gedeba ni daoglap ha galai hi dong nang. Bo nogor bese ni gede hade Sodom jang Egypt bonsi thi du, bonsi ni Gabra ni nogor ning.
Khrip subung, khrip jadi, khrip grao, ode khrip sengphong ni subung buthu, manggathi khe nokha saintham gejer bonsi nai lai nang, mangkhlong ha bonsi phip ri nang niya.

Ebo gorasali gini phirthi ha dongyarao ne khlai hi bonsi gabang dukhu riba ni bonsi thiyaba ni basao ha phirthi ha dongyarao khaja nang, khusi jang jinis riyaba buthu khe bonsi saosi jang saosi yaopha lai ma se.
Bedethikhala, saintham gejer ni yaohon ha Madai ni phrang hayu hang khe bonsi ni bising ha hapsing hi, bonsi jar ni igah jang bonsi songkhu kha, ode bokhe naiyarao hamsi ning khinlai kha.
Odehe, nokhasao ni phrang khurang bol jang bonsi khna ba, Eraha phai lah, ode thiphai ba. Odebani, bonsi ni sotrurao nai hi dongba ha ning, jimi ha bonsi gakhu lang la kha.

Odehe, boha ning banglama hamsi ning rao hi smao phai ba, odehe nogor hathan majhi saikho hi masi khe bo gubu ri ba; ode banglama maoba ha subung rjing sni thi dada, thang hi dongyarao hamsi ning khin hi sorgo ni Madai niha se ning bonsi muima yaopha kha.
Bubain risi maginyaba lailang kha. Bubain risi mathamyaba srap sophai ma ja kha.

Sorgo ni degla sniyaba jar ni bibul khe dam ba jang, sorgo ha bol jang jirik khaoyarao, Habsao raji ni raji de jini Gabra jang boni Krista Raja ni raji ja lang la kha. Bo se jug jug bisar khlai ma! odehe bonsi thi ba.
Odehe, Madai ni sagang ha raja ni khamthan buthu ha khamyaba, khrao khonbri buthu blip pha hi, Madai khe bonsi khlim ba,
Dongsaiyaba Gabra Madai khrip dangphuyaba,
Nini raothai gedeba khe ning lakha bani,
odehe, nini bisar khe jenkha bani nini ha khajama ni grao khe jing yaopha du.
Jadi buthubo thamsi baigo kha,
odehe, nini thamsibo sophai kha,
subung githirao ni basao ha ning bisar khlai khali sophai kha,
Nini dangyasa, gorasalirao, subung gatharrao, subung gedeba-khasiba,
khrip nini bumu khe man khlaiyarao ne,
yaosandi ning rima ni bubli ode,
phirthi khe hamya khlaiyarao khe ning hamya
khlai mani bubli sophai kha! bonsi odehe thi ba.

Odehe, sorgo ni Madai ni bikhoh khe khru hi, bikhoh ni bising ha bo grao phayaba bokhoh khe ang nu kha. Odehe, nokhasao jablai jablai gurjli hi, khurang ni sar buthu baigo phai hi nokhasao grung grung grim hi, banglama smao phai dada, gidithai galai phai ba.
Nokhasao ha sin gedeba gmang thaosisiyaba nujao phai hi, masainjik sain khe phin hi, boni igah bakhla ha dainbo dong, odehe sathrai majhi gin khrothu thu hibo nujao phai ba.
Bode sao khonggin se, sao goma ni sa jao hi bo hoi ba.

Odehe, nokhasao ha sin gibin gmang thaosi nujao phin ba. Odehe Dragon gajao dedaothaoyaba, bokhro khro sni odehe bogrong grong sni dongyaba, boni bokhro ha raja ni khrothu masni thu hibo nujao phin kha.

Boni bermai jang nokhasao ni sathrai buthu khe phantha tham saikhao hi phanthasi khe baikhla hi, phirthi ha bo garai thar ba. Nana hajaiba jang srap molo phu mani khlai hi Dragon sao goma jayaba ni sagang ha bo song hi ning dong ba.
Bo jakha de, jadi buthu ni basao ha ser ni goda jang bisar khlaiginyaba nana miyah bo mai kha. Bo nana khe Madai niha odehe jar ni raja ni khamthan gede bo sugu lang kha.
Bo masainjik khe Madai ning bo salai riyaba hathan ha, nokha maithai jang rjing jhigin maithai do bising ha kharang phu mani khlai hi bo khailang la kha.
Boha sorgo ha jbah jahi, Mikael jang boni sorgo ni deglarao bo Dragon jang bonsi nanglai ba. Dragon jang boni deglarao jbah dainlai ba,
thikhabo bonsi de kha, odehe sorgo ha bonsi ni khlai hi musi hathan giri kha.
Dragon dedao thaoyaba jbu ho grasa Diabol jang Soithan thiyaba habsao bubim khe thokhiyaba de dangkhla jao hi, boha boni deglaraobo bo jang baosi dangkhla pha jao ba.
Odehe sorgo ni phrang khurang bol jang:
Duha jini Madai sogoyahba,
Boni raothai, boni raja ni raji odehe
Messia ni hukhum sophai kha.
Jini daphlungrao gajai riyaba,
jini Madai niha sain hor gajai riyaba
dangkhla jao kha.
Melmasa ni thijao ni khlai hi, odehe
bonsi mithi pha riyaba grao ni khlai hi,
bonsi khe de kha,
Bo thiphama sosi jar ni hayu khebo musi baoya.
Odebani, O sorgo buthu odehe nisi boni bising ha dongyarao, khaja lah!
Thikhabo, O phirthi jang sagor, nisi ni bubain risi bi dou!
Bede thikhade Diabol nisi niha akhai phai bani khlai hi,
khaisa bubli se ning dongsiba thi hibo tharmai bani,
thamsi jang bo gablai du! thi hi bo thiphai ba khe ang khna ba.
Dragon khe phirthi ha dangkhla jao kha thi hi bo tharmai ba jang, nana miyah maiyaba masainjik khe bo riksai kha.

Thikhabo, masainjik de jbu ho sophuyayaba bokhe deng mane salaiyaba hajengling ha birsing phu mani khlai hi daoling gedeba ni bagrang buthu saikhao gini khebo bonsi ri hi, oraha ning bubli masi odehe bubli buthu odehe bubli gejer ni bising ha bonsi bokhe kharang ma se.
Odebani, bo masainjik khe dih rao rihi gajao ri phu mani khlai hi jbu hoh dikhong ha lai rao rihi bukhuh ni phrang dih suhon ba.
Thikhabo, phirthi ning boni masainjik khe juru hi, boni bukhuh khe sasi hi, Dragon ning boni bukhuh ni phrang dikhong baigo riyaba khe molo thar ba.
Dragon bo masainjik ni basao ha hamsi ning thamsi baigo hi, boni greng dongyarao, Madai grao riyaba buthu khe mani hi, Jisu ni grao khe lonma jang baiyarao nanglai mani khlai hi bonsi baigo kha.
Odehe, Dragon sagor ni dih dergong ha songhi kha.

Sagor ni phrang mih rege baigo buba khe ang nu ba, bogrong grong jhi odehe bokhro khro sni dong; boni bogrong buthu hade raja ni khrothu dong, boni bokhro buthu hade Madai khe sijiyaba ni bumu buthubo dong.

Ang mih rege nuyaba misisathrai lai se, boni igah buthubo musuburma ni igah lai se; boni bukhuhbo misiraigonma lai se. Dragon de jar ni raothai jang jar ni singhason ni hukhum gedeba khe boniha ri ba.

Bo mih rege ni bokhro ni khro si thima jasi bumai nang hi dukhu jaba lai nujao ba, thikhabo, thima jasi sayaba hamphin lang la kha. Habsao ni subung khripbo hamsi ning gmang hi, boni yaohon rikpha ba.
Mih rege niha hukhum ri kha bani subung buthu Dragon khe khlim ba. Subung buthu thi ba, Mih rege lai sere dong, sere bo jang nanglai phu ma? Mih rege khebo bonsi khlim ba.
Mih rege niha sanggayaba odehe Madai khe sijiyaba grao buthu thiphuyaba bukhuh ri ba; odehe badain jang bisagin dain gin sosi raothai ni hukhum ri ba.
Odebani, Madai khe siji mani khlai hi bo bukhuh khru hi, Madai ni bumu khe odehe dongyaba hathan odehe sorgo ha dongyarao khe bo siji kha.
Subung gatharrao jang nanglai hi de mani raothaibo bonthane ri ba, khrip greng, khrip subung, khrip jadi grao, odehe khrip jadi ni basao ha grao ni hukhum khebo bo ri ba.
Odebani, phirthi ha dongyarao khrip habsao sangsai jenba ni phrang sthai jaoyaba Melmasa ni hayu laisi bajap ha bumu gakhuyayarao khrip mih rege khe, Madai khe khlimba lai bonsi khlim ba.
Sere niha khmao dong, khna la thing!

Sere leng ne langjao khade, bo leng jahi thang nang; asababo seng jang subung sthai khade, bode seng jang ning sthai jaoma se. Ebo ha subung gatharrao khah lao hi lonma gnang jang dong ma nangthai khe phnu du.
Odehe mih rege, hah bakhla ni phrang baigo phai ba khe ang nu ba; Melmasa lai bogrong grong gin dong, Dragon lai grao jo ba.
Mih rege sagang ni khrip hukhum khe boni sagang ha yaowai hi phirthi jang boni basao ha dongyarao khrip khe thima jasiyaba bumai ham phinyaba mih rege sagang ni khe bonsi khlim ri ba.
Bo mih rege ning gmang thaosisi khusi gedeba buthu khe dang hi, khrip subung ni muh ha sorgo ni phrang phirthi ha wai galai ri re.

Sagang ni mih rege ni baslai ha gmang thaosi khusi raothai rijao hi dongyaba buthu khe dang hi, phirthi ha dongyarao khrip khebo thokhi hi, seng ha bumai nang hi, ham phinyaba mih rege khe bakhan khlai mani khlai hi boni saokhuli khe bonsi slam lai ba.
Odehe, mih rege ni saokhuli grao jophu mane odehe mih rege ni saokhuli khe bima nangjaoyayaba si khe sthai phu mani khlai hi, mih rege ni saokhuli niha hang ri mani raothaibo ri ba.
Bo mih rege se khrip subung gede khasi, gnang, dukhisa, leng jang leng niyayaba bo bonsi ni yaoda gede ha ja thing, bonsi ni bathain ha bol jang sin nising ri hi,
mih rege ni bumu ja thing, boni bumu ni lombor ja thing, sin riyaba giri khade saosibo jinis barai hi phain phuya.
Eraha jing girikma nang du. Sere bujima dong mih rege ni lombor khe khru thing, bode subung ni lombor se. Bo lombor de rjado bisatham madoh se.
Odehe, ang naiha bade, Zion hading ha ning Melmasa song hi dong. Boni ha subung lakh masi rjing jang bisagin rjing bri, bonsi ni bathain buthu ha boni bumu jang bupha ni bumu reb jaoyarao dong ba.
Odehe, sorgo ni phrang diyungma raoyaba ni sar lai ode nokhasao grimyaba ni sar lai ang khna ba. Bo sar khnayaba seranda damyarao bonsi seranda buthu khe damyaba ni sar lai se.

Singhason ni sagang ha ode, jinis hang gnang buthu ni sagang ha ode khraorao ni sagang ha rajabthai gadain khe bonsi rajab ba. Ode phirthi ni phrang khoh jaoyarao, subung lakh masi rjing jang bisagin rjingbri buthu khe garhi saosibo bo rajabthai khe buji phuya.

Bo buthu masainjik jang rege rege dongyaba niya hi gathar ha naiso layaba subung se. Melmasa thangyaba si ha bonsi rikpha du. Bonsi Madai jang Melmasa ne khlai hi bathai thai jenyarao jama ni, subung buthu ni bising ni phrang khojaoyaba se.
Bonsi ni bukhuh hade hamya grao baigoya, bonsi gibin naiya.
Odehe, sorgo ni degla gibin nokhasao ni gejer ha ang nu ba. Bo ning phirthi ha dongyarao khrip sengphong, khrip greng, khrip jadi grao, ode khrip subung niha thaoglao ni hamba graojma boni ha dong.
Bo ning khurang bol jang, Madai khe khin hi, boni ha muima khe yaopha lah, boni bisar ni bubli sophai kha. Phirthi odehe sorgo, sagor odehe dihmuh buthu sangsaiyaba khe khlim lah! odehe bo thi ba.

Sorgo ni degla giniyaba boni yaohon rikpha ba, Bo raoya kha, Babulon nogor gedeba, bo subung khe khah nang baiyaba bai si ni thamsi jang grep bidih ni ju khe khrip jadi ne ling riyaba raoya kha! bo odehe thiphai ba.

Odehe, sorgo ni degla gibin, gathamyaba bonsi ni yaohon rikpha hi, khurang bol jang thi ba, Sere mih rege odehe boni saokhuli khe khlim hi, bonsi ni bathain ha ja thing, yao ha ja thing, sin dongyaba si khe,
Madai ni thamsi ni grep bidih ni ju buphangma khe, bo thamsi ni bela ha gablai si bonsi ling nang, ode sorgo ni degla gatharrao jang Melmasa ni sagang ha waithai jang bo sasi hi dukhu rijao ma se.
Bo buthu saja riyaba waikhudi jug jug lung lung ja hi, mih rege jang boni saokhuli khe khlimyarao ode boni bumu jang sin layarao ni saja jamthaoya kha, thi hi bo jirik khao ba.
Eraha Madai grao riyaba buthu khe mani hi, Jisu khe lonma ha remsongyaba subung gatharrao ne khlai hi dukhu suima nangthai khe phnu du.

Ode, sorgo ni phrang khurang ang khna ba, Edehe reb lah: Duha ni phrang subung githi, Gabra ha thihyarao ni bonsi khophal hambi dou! thi hi bo thiphai ba. Bese de, Jadu dou! Dukhu jang khusi dangyarao lenggoma mai kha, bonsi khusi dangyaba buthu bonsi ni yaohon rikpha ma se, bo odehe thi ba.
Odehe, ang naihaba de, jimi guphu khlai hi ang nu ba, jimi basao hade Marsi ni basa lai jasosi, gajao ni Raja khrothu thu hi, sunggi budaoyaba khe di hi kham dada dongba khe ang nu ba.

Odehe, bikhoh ni phrang sorgo ni degla gibin saosi baigo lang hi, jimi basao ha khamyaba niha bol jang, Nini sunggi khe khaikho hi, mai ra lah, mai ra mani bubli ja kha, hogo phirthi ni mao rothar kha dou! bo ode thiba
Odebani, jimi basao ha khamyaba jar ni sunggi khe khaikho hi, phirthi ni mai khe bo ra kha.
Sorgo ni bikhoh ni phrang sorgo ni degla gibinbo baigo bu hi, bobo sunggi budao thaoyaba khe dipha ba.

Odehe, sorgo ni degla gibin wai ni basao ha hukhum dongyaba, khapra ni phrang baigo bu hi, sunggi budao thaoyaba khe yaowai hi, “phirthi ni grep bathai ni bajab buthu khe hogo bojom khlai lah; hogo grep bathai buthu min thar kha”, thi ba.

Odebani, sorgo ni degla jar ni sunggi khe phirthi ni basao ha bo haiding hi, phirthi ni grep bajab buthu khe bojom khlai hi, grep bathai sepyaba hakhor ha, Madai ni thamsi ni hakhorma ha bo dangsing kha.
Nogorma ni baji ha grep ni ju sepyaba hakhor ha grep buthu khe bo gasep kha; grep sepyaba hakhor ni phrang gorai ni khuh ha ser phayaba sosi thuba ode mel jang rja tham lai thijao riyen phai kha.

Odehe, sorgo ha gibin sin gedeyaba ode gmang thaosisiyaba khe ang nu ba: sorgo ni degla sniyaba yaohonthao ni saja masni buthu khe bonsi labu ba, bo saja buthu hade Madai ni thamsi jamthar si sothar kha.
Boha, derphnai sagor lai ja du, wai jang gibringyaba khe ang nu ba, ode mih rege jang boni saokhuli ar boni bumu ni lombor deyarao, Madai ni seranda khe di dada song hi dongba khebo ang nu ba.
Bonsi Madai ni khusi dangyasa Moses ni rajabthai jang Melmasa ni rajabthai khe rajab ba:
O Gabra Madai, khrip dangphuyaba,
Ning khusi dangyaba buthu de muima gmang thaosisi,
O jadi buthu ni Raja dedao thaoyaba,
Nini lama buthu de gibi jang dormo se!
O Gabra, sere nini bumu khe man khlaiya hi bakhan khlai nang?
Ning se ning gathar se.
Khrip jadi phai hi, ning khe bonsi khlim ma se,
Bede thikhade nini bisar buthu khe phnu kha! ode thi du.
Boni yaohon ha ang naiha ba de, sorgo ni bikhoh hathan gathar jadao thaoyaba khebo khru phai ba.
Bikhoh ni phrang saja masni di hi, sorgo ni degla sni buthu phai hi, rih guphu gili duduyaba, jna phayaba khe phin hi, gajao ni wadu jang bonsi ni khahbao buthu ha phit thi sop ba.
Thaoglao ha thang hi dongyaba Madai ni thamsi ha gablaiyaba khaojeb masni, hang gnang mabri buthu ni bising ha masi, sorgo ni degla buthu ne bo ri ba.
Madai ni muima jang bo raothai ni phrang waikhudi, bikhoh ha gablai ri hi sorgo ni degla sni buthu saja masni langyarao bonsi jamya side, bikhoh ha saosi bo bonsi hap phuya.
Odehe, bikhoh ni phrang khurang baigo hi, sorgo ni degla sni niha thi ba, Thang dada, Madai ni thamsi masni buthu ni bokhoh khe phirthi ha lukhla lah! odehe bo thiba khe ang khna ba.

Odebani, sagang thaoyaba degla thang hi bo bokhoh khe phirthi ha lukhla ba, ode mih rege ni sin layarao odehe boni saokhuli khe khlimyarao ni khlai hide, biyadi regeyaba jang bonsi gasa jalang la kha.
Sorgo ni degla giniyaba boni bokhoh khe sagor ha lukhla kha, odebani, subung githi ni thijao lai dih ja lang la kha, sagor ni hang gnang mih khrip thih thar ba.
Sorgo ni degla gathamyaba boni bokhoh khe dikhong buthu ha ode dihmuh buthu ha lukhla kha, odehe thijao ja thar kha.
Boha dih ni degla thi ba, O ning dangsaiyaba dongblaiyaba subung gathar, ebo buthu ni balam ni grao hamsi ning bisar gibi ja kha dou!
Subung gatharrao jang gorasalirao ni thijao khaikho bani, bonsi ling mani khlai hi ning thijao riyaba khe bonsi lingma ning nang ma se! thi hi thi ba khebo ang khna ba.
Khapra ni phrang khurang baigo hi, Jadu dou, Gabra Madai khrip raothai gnang, nini bisar de gibiyaba ar dormo se! thi hi thiphin phaiba khebo ang khna ba.
Sorgo ni degla briyaba boni bokhoh khe sain ha lukhlai ba, ode sain jang subung buthu khe hang ba.
Odebani, subung buthu sain jang hangthai jao ba, bonsi khah phin hi, boni ha muima yaopha ba thane saja ni basao ha hukhum gnang Madai ni bumu khe se bonsi siji dao ba.
Sorgo ni degla bowayaba boni bokhoh khe mih rege ni singhason ni basao ha bo lukhla ba. Odebani boni raji andar jathar ba; subung buthu hamsi ning dungjao kha bani bonsi slai wai ba.
Bonsi khusi dangyaba buthu hamdao ba thane bonsi ni jayaba buthu ar bonsi ni gasa buthu ni khlai hi sorgo ni Madai khe se bonsi siji dao ba.
Sorgo ni degla dohyaba boni bokhoh khe Euphrates dikhongma ha lukhla ba. Sainja gede ni phrang Rajarao phai mani lama salai mani khlai hi dikhongma ni dih khe bo drit mathao kha.
Odehe, Dragon ni bukhuh ni phrang ar mih rege ni bukhuh ni phrang ar mosol gorasali ni bukhuh ni phrang khaoroma lai jadi jadi bese regeyaba gatham baigo phai ba khebo ang nu ba.
Bo buthu de bese sgain, gmang thaosisi dangyarao se. Madai khrip dangphuyaba raothai gnang, muima basain ni jbah ha gaba mani habsao bubim ni Rajarao khe bojom khlai mani bonsi baigo langyarao se.
Khna lah, makhao lai ang phai du dou! Smao hi ning dong hi, sal khlai blai hi dongyaba ni khophal hambi, bo rih giri hi laji nang niya!
Odehe, Rajarao khe hathan masi ha, Hebrai grao ha Armageddon thiyaba ha, bonsi bojom khlai kha.
Odehe sorgo ni degla sniyaba boni bokhoh khe bar ha lukhla ba, ode bikhoh ni singhason ni phrang khurang bol jang baigo phai hi, Blai kha! thi hi thi ba.

Odehe, nokhasao jablai jablai gurjli hi khurang baigao phai ba, odehe nokhasao grim hi, banglama hamsi ning rao hi smao ba, odehe phirthi ha subung dong jenba ni phrang olei sosi banglama rao ba giri.

Odebani nogor gedeba khe phantha tham phi hi, jadi buthu ni nogor buthu gubu thar kha. Babulon nogor gedeba khe Madai tharmai hi ning bo thamsi jang grep bidih lingyaba ju ni bela ha bonsi ne ling ri kha.
Hahgojo khrip jamthar kha, hading buthu bo giri kha.
Odehe, nokhasao ni phrang gidithai gede gedebo thai si thai si ha herdan lai risiyaba subung buthu ni basao ha galai ba, bo saja hamsi ning raokha bani gidithai ni khlai hi Madai khe bonsi sari ba.

Odehe, bokhoh masni deiyaba, sorgo ni degla sni buthu ni bising ha saosi de phai hi, ang jang sainlai ba, Phai sang, gabang dih ni basao ha khamyaba sao phainjiyaba dedao thaoyaba ni saja khe ang nisi ne phnu nang.
Phirthi ni rajarao bokhe bonsi gaori japha re, boni nangjaoma ni ju jang phirthi ha dongyarao khebo baola khlai re, bo ode thi ba.

Odebani, sorgo ni degla, bese jang hajengling ha angkhe lang ba, oraha mih rege gajao jnayaba ni basao ha masainjik khamba khe ang nu ba. Bo mih rege Madai ni bumu khe sijiyaba gablai si thu du, bokhro khro sni, bogrong grong jhi dong.

Bo masainjik rih jaosim jang gajao jnayaba khe thu hi, gajao jang dam gnang longthai ar guphu jang sal khlai dada, boni nangjaoma regeyaba jinis buthu ar gusu ha gablaiyaba gajao ni bela khe boni yao jang bo lang ba.
Boni bathain hade grao makhao huiyaba bumu dong BABULON NOGOR GEDEBA NI SAO PHAINJIYARAO NI BUMA ODE JINIS REGE REGEYABA NI BUMA, thi hi reb ba.
Ar bo masainjik subung gatharrao ni thijao jang Jisu ni khlai hi bandai yaopha layaba ni thijao jang baola jahi dongba khe ang nu ba.
Bo masainjik khe nuba jang ang hamsi ning khin ba.
Thikhabo, sorgo ni degla ning ani ha thi ba, “Snadi jabani ning gmang ba? Bo haingajik ode bo mih rege, bokhro khro sni, bogrong grong jhi gnang buthu ni grao makhao khe nini ha ang thi nang.

Mih rege khe ning nuyaba sagang hade bo dong ba, thikhabo duha giri kha, nokhasao gejer ni phrang bo baigo phai hi, jamyaba ha bo thangphin lama se. Odehe, phirthi ha dongyarao, habsao sangsai jenba ni phrang hayu ni laisi bajab ha bumu gakhuyayarao mih rege khe nuphin khade, sagang ha bo dong ba, thikhabo duha de giri kha. Bonsi phaiphin khade bonsi hamsi ning gmang ma se.”
Ebo jinis khe buji mane de gyan jang khah ha hamsi ning girikma nang du. Bokhro khro sni buthu de masainjik khayaba hading ding sni khe se thi ba, ode raja sni buthubo bo ning:
eraha dongyaba bowa buthu de galai hi, saosi de dong kho, thikhabo gibin saosi braha dong tharmaiya, bo phai khabo phung si se ning dong ma.
Mih rege dongyaba duha giri kha, bonsi jai ja du, bo sni ni bising ha dongyaba ning; thikhabo, bo sjam jaoma se.
Bogrong grong jhi ning nuyaba raja jhi buthu de raja niyayaba buthu se; bonsi gontha si se ning mih rege jang raja lai dong mani hukhum dong ba.
Ebo jhi buthu grao si jahi bonsi ni raothai jang bonsi ni hukhum khe bonsi yaopha ma se.

Bonsi ning Melmasa jang nanglai ma, Melmasa bonsi khe de ma se: Ode boni yaohon rikphayaba, bo saikhoyaba, subung lonma gnangrao jang baosi khe bonsi de ma se; bode rajarao ni Raja, Raja gedeba ni Raja gedeba se, bo odehe thi ba.
Degla ning ani ha thi ba, Sao phainjiyaba ni khamthan ha ning dih gabang nuyaba buthu de, subung buthu khrip subung buthu, khrip jadi ode grao gibin gibin khe se ja du, thi ba.
Ning mih rege nuyaba boni bogrong grong jhi buthu ning sao phainjiyajik de jajaoya ja nang, ode ran hi rih giri nisi khe deng ma se; boni bahain khe wai ha sao hi bonsi ji ma se.
Madai ni grao sophaiya side bo nangjaoba lai yaowai mane ode grao masi jama ni khlai hi ar, bonsi ni raji khe mih rege niha yaopha mane khlai hi Madai ning bonsi ni khah ha khusi dang blai kha.
Ning masainjik nuyaba de phirthi ni rajarao ni basao ha bisar khlaiyaba, nogor gedeba hase ja ma, bo odehe thi ba.
Boni yaohon ha sorgo ni degla gini sorgo ni phrang akhaiba khe ang nuba. Hukhum dedaothao dongyaba; boni muima jang phirthi khe bo jdan thar ri ba.

Khurang bol jang, Bo raoya kha! Babulon nogor gedeba raoya kha! Sgo sgain buthu ni dongthan jalang la kha. Odehe khrip jadi ni bese gusu ni dongthan, khrip jadi dao rege rege bojom jathan, khrip jadi mih rege regeyaba ni dongthan jalang la kha!

Bede thikhade, khrip jadi buthubo bo nangjaoma ni thamsi ni grep bidih ju khe bonsi ne ling ri kha. Phirthi ni rajaraobo bokhe hamjao re, odehe phirthi ni bepharirao bo nangjaoba lai lai yaowai hi bo gnang ja kha, thi hibo bai ba.
Odehe sorgo ni phrang khurang gibin ang khna phin ba:
Ani subung buthu, oraha ni phrang baigo lah,
Boni phap buthu ha nisi maipha jao nang,
boni saja buthu habo nisi maipha jao nang.
Bede thikhade, bo masainjik ni phap buthu,
sorgo sosi dak so hi kha,
boni hamya buthu khebo Madai ning khna thar kha.
Nisi ni basao ha dangba lai ning, boni basao habo dang lah;
Bo khrip khusi dangyaba khe phantha gin bangdao hi su lah;
Boni bela gibringyaba ha ning phantha gin bangdao hi gibring ri lah.
Bonsi jarkhe dejao layaba ode jar khe suk khlai layaba khe,
dukhu jang khah waimu ha su lah.
Boni khah ha rani lai ang bisar khlai ba,
ang banjikrao niya, musi khah waimu mai nang niya, bo odehe thi ba.
Odebani boni saja de sainsi ni bising ha ning sophai thar ma se;
thihyaba ar suk, asari de wai ha saokhrip jao ma se.
Bede thikhade, boni basao ha
bisar khlaiyaba Gabra de bol raoyaba se, thi hi khurang bol jang bo thiphai ba.
Odehe, phirthi ni raja bo jang baosi gaori japha hi jar ni nangjaoma ha suk khlai hi dongyarao bo khamyaba waikhudi khe nu kha ning, khah bao dohi dukhu jang gra ma se.

Odehe, boni saja ha dukhu japha jao ma, bonsi khin bani gajain ha bonsi song nang, odehe, Nisi ni bubain risi bi dou, nisi ni bubain risi bi dou! O Babulon nogor, raothai dedao thaoyaba, gontha si ni bising ha ning nini basao ha hamya japhai kha! bonsi odehe thi ma se.
Odehe, phirthi ni bepharirao de gra hi bokhe bonsi bi ma se. Bonsi jinis labuyaba buthu khe saosi bo baraiya kha bani;

bonsi ni jinis buthu de gajao, rangkhrao, longthai dam gnang, longserkhi, rih gili duduyaba, bongphang midimyaba khrip jadi, miyung ni hathai jang slamyaba khrip jadi, dam gnang bongphang jang slamyaba khrip jadi, sugayung jang slamyaba, ser jang slamyaba, rih jaosim, rih rehendi, rih gajao jnayaba, guphu ni longthai jang slamyaba,

bongphang ni yaderma, mosola, mai, bahai midim saoyaba sathrai, murra, dup-dhuna, grep ni ju, oliv ni thao, honduri, musu buthu ode melma buthu, gorai jang roth buthu, leng, subung ni hayu buthu sosibo jahi, bo buthu khe saosibo bonsi baraiya kha.
Bonsi Ning bathai nangjaoyaba, nini hayu nebo libiyaba buthu de bonsi ning khe dangkhlai lang kha; nini muima jang majangma khrip jam kha, ar maiphin nang niya kha, thihi thi ba.
Ebo jinis buthu khe bephar khlaiyaba, bo ni phrang gnang jayaba buthu boni saja ha dukhu japha ma, khin bani bonsi gajain song hi, gra ba.
“Bo gmang thaosisi jakha na! Nogor gedeba, rih gili duduyaba, jaosim ode rih gajao jnayaba phin hi, gajao, longserkhi jang sal khlaiyaba de!

Ar grao thaosi ni bising ha ning boni gnang khrip jam lang la kha,” thihi bol jang gra dada bonsi khah baodo ma se. Odehe, rung bubrarao jang rung ha moposol thangyarao, bephar khlaiyarao khrip subung gajain ha bonsi song hi,
bo khamyaba waikhudi khe bonsi nuhaba jang jirik khao hi, Ebo nogor laiyaba nogor gedeba gibin dong kho? bonsi thi ba.

Bonsi jar jar ni bokhro buthu ha haduri phinkhru hi gra nang, Gmang thaosisi ja kha dou! hai! Nogor gedeba khrip bo boni gnang khe yaowai hi, sagor ni khrip rung ebo nogor ni khlai hi se bonsi gnang ja ba, gontha si ni bising ha ning bo haglai ja lang la kha, bonsi odehe thi ba.
O sorgo jang nisi subung gatharrao, haijaoyarao ode gorasalirao, boni basao ha khaja lah; bede thikhade, masni khe gai khlai bani Madai ning bonsi khe saja ri kha.

Odehe, sorgo ni degla raodao thaoyaba mairong honkhliyaba longthai jang baosi longthai gedeba khe sugu hi, sagor ha bo dangkhla ba, Babulon nogor de olei jasosi ning bol jang dangkhla jao nang, odehe bokhe nuphin nang niya kha. thi ba.

Nini bising hade khurang majangyaba, asaba seranda ni khurang, suphin damyaba khurang, bibul ni khurang khna nang niya kha! Nini bising hade jinis slamba ringyaba musi khebo nu nang niya kha. Nini bising hade mairong honyaba khurang khebo khna nang niya kha!

Nini bising hade thaophari jna nang niya kha, nini bising ha daman jang damanjik ni khurangbo khna phin nang niya kha. Nini bepharirao de habsao ni subung gedebarao ja kha, nini montro ringyarao de khrip jadi khe sibir thar kha! bo odehe thiba.
Boni bising hade gorsalirao ni thijao jang subung gatharrao ni thijao buthu, phirthi ha sthaiyaba khrip ni thijao khe bo ri re, oraha ning maiba se.
Ebo ni yaohon ha gabang sorgo ni subung buthu ni khurang lai ang khna ba: Hallelujah! Sogoma ja thing, muima ja thing, raothai ja thing, jini Madai ni gaja se.

Boni bisar buthu gibi jang bo dormo se. Sao khe phainjiyaba gedeba, jar ni gaori jang phirthi khe rege rege khlaiyaba khe gajai ja ri jao kha. Boni basao ha se jar ni dangyasarao ni thijao ni baslai khe bo la kha, bonsi odehe thi ba.
Bonsi phin thi ba, Hallelujah! Bo khamyaba waikhudi jug jug lung lung dim ma se! bonsi odehebo thi ba.
Odehe, khrao khonbri hang gnang mih buthu blip pha hi, Amen, Hallelujah! thi hi Raja ni khamthan ha khamyaba Madai khe bonsi khlim ba.
Odehe, singhason ni phrang khurang baigo phai ba, Nisi boni khrip dangyasa, gede, khasi, bokhe khinyarao, jini Madai khe khlim lah.
Odehe, subung buthu ni khurang, dih raoyaba ni khurang ho jaba lai, odehe nokhasao grimba ha grung grung jaba lai ang sar khna ba, Hallelujah, Gabra jini Madai, raothai gnang de bisar khlai du dou!
Khajama lai jing khaja lai nang, muima khlai lai nang. Melmasa disingma ni bubli sophai kha, damanjikbo salai blai kha.
Rih gili duduyaba, guphu jablai jablaiyaba odehe gathar khe bonsi thu ri mane hukhum ri kha. Rih gili duduyaba de subung gatharrao dormo khusi dangyaba buthu se.

Odehe, sorgo ni degla ning ani ha thi ba, Ebo khe reb lah: Melmasa noh jayaba mel ha jama jayarao de bonsi ni khophal hambi. Bo ning ani ha, Ebo grao buthu Madai ni grao gibiyaba se, bo odehebo thi ba.

Boha ning bokhe khlim mane khlai hi boni igah rogong gabasi ang blip pha ba, thikhabo bode ani ha, Olei da khlai lah. Ang ning jang nini daphlungrao lai ning Jisu ni grao nisi mithi pha riyaba khe maniyaba, nisi ni daphlung jang dangyasa angbo saosi se thi. Madai khe se khlim lah. Jisu ni grao khe mithi pha riyaba thidayaba bese se, bo odehe thi ba.
Sorgo khruba khe ang nu ba, oraha ani sagang ha gorai guphu, boni basao ha gayaba, Lonma gnang ode Gibi bonsi thiyaba khebo ang nu ba; bode gibi jang bisar khlai hi, jbahbo bo nanglai re.
Boni muthai buthu de wai lai se, boni bokhro hade raja ni khrothu gabang thu du; odehe bo bumu rebyaba de bokhe garhi saosi bo tharmaiya.
Thijao jang gasai phrayaba sola galao khe thu hi, boni bumu de Madai ni grao se.
Sorgo ni siphaiyarao rih gili dudu rih guphu ode gathar khe thuyarao gorai guphu ni basao ha kham hi bo jang baosi rikpha du.

Boni bukhuh ni phrang seng budao thaoyaba baigo phai ba, ode bo ning jadi buthu khe dain thar ma se. Odehe ser ni goda jang sason khlai nang. Madai khrip dang phuyaba ni raothai jang grep ni ju sepyaba hakhor ha thamsi jang bo gasep jao ma se.
Boni sola galao ha ar boni yaphung ha rajarao ni Raja, hojarao ni Hoja thi hi bumu reb du.

Odehe, sorgo ni degla saosi sain ha song hi dongba khe ang nu ba, bo ning nokhasao gejer ha dao bir baiyaba khrip niha khurang bol jang, Madai ni gedeba mel ha ji mani khlai hi bojom ja la phai! thi ba.

Rajarao ni mogong ja thing, siphaiya hojarao ni mogong, subung birrao ni mogong, gorai buthu ni mogong ode bonsi ni basao ha gayarao ni mogong, khrip subung leng jang leng niyayarao, subung gedebarao, khasibarao, bonsi jamthar si ni mogong buthu khe ji la phai! thi hi bo jirikkhao ba.
Gorai ni basao ha gayaba jang boni siphaiya ni dol jang nanglai mani khlai hi, mih rege jang phirthi ni rajarao baithim laiba khe ang nu ba.

Mih rege khe bonsi rem hi, boni baslai ha sin gmang thaosi buthu khe dangyaba, gorasali mosol khebo bonsi rempha ba. Bo gorasali se jinis gmang thaosisiyaba khusi dangyaba jang mih rege ni lombor layarao ode boni saokhuli khe biyarao khe bo thokhi re. Bonsi gini khebo gathang ning wai ni kharnai ha bonsi dangsing kha.

Bo gibin buthu khrip khe gorai ni basao ha gayaba ni bukhuh ni phrang seng baigo phai khali ning bonsi sthaijao kha; odehe khrip dao buthu khripbo bonsi jima nangjaoba lai bonsi ni bahain buthu khe jithar kha.
Odehe, sorgo ni phrang sorgo ni degla saosi akhai phaiba khe ang nu ba, bo ning hakhor khithu giriyaba ni chabi jang sikhol gedeba khe labu ba.
Bo ning dragon, jbu grasa, sgain sogo, soithan khe rem hi, maithai jang rjing si ni khlai hi bokhe kha ba.
Maithai jang rjing si soyasi jadi buthu khe thokhi phin phuya mani khlai hi, hakhor khithu giriyaba ha dangsing hi bokhe phrao jeb hi lep phung kha.

Boha singhason khe ang nu ba, oraha khamyarao khrip bo bisar khlai mane hukhum rijaoyarao se. Jisu ni grao khe bonsi mithipha ri bani khlai hi, ode bonsi Madai ni grao ni khlai hi bokhro dainso jaoyarao ni bese buthu khebo ang nu ba. Bu buthu mih rege jang boni saokhuli khe khlimyaba niya, bonsi ni bathain buthu ha, bonsi ni yao buthu habo mih rege ni sin laya. Bonsi thangphin hi Krista jang baosi maithai jang rjing si bonsi sason khlai ba.
Maithai jang rjing si soya si de, gibin subung githirao baija phinya. Bo se sagangthao baija phin ba se.

Sagangthao baija phinyaba ha dongphayarao ni khophal hambi. Bonsi ni basao hade thih maginyaba ni hukhum khe bonsi mai nang niya kha. Odehe Madai jang Krista ni jonthairao jahi, bo jang baosi maithai jang rjing si bonsi sason khlai ma.
Maithai jang rjing si ni yaohon hade, soithan khe jebyaba ni phrang bonsi haiger kha.
Odehe, phirthi grongbri ni khrip jadi, Gog ar Magog rao khe thokhi hi, jbah nanglai mani khlai hi bojom khlai ma se; bonsi bangba jakha de sagor ni dergong ha hajeng bangba lai ja du.
Odehe, bonsi de phirthi grongbri ha dongyarao khe naiding hi gatharrao ni khorongma jang nogor hamdao thaoyaba khe bonsi gajeb ba. Thikhabo sorgo ni phrang wai galai phai hi, bonsi khamthar kha.

Boha bonsi khe thokhiyaba Soithan, mih rege jang mosol gorasali dongyaba waithai jinghi dongyaba wai ni kharnai ha bonsi khe dangkhla kha, oraha sain hor jug jug saja rijao hi bonsi dukhu rijao ma se.
Odehe, singhason jnama dedao thaoyaba odehe boni basao ha khamyaba khe ang nu ba. Boni sagang ni phrang phirthi jang nokhasao khaithar ba, ode bonsi ni khlai hi hathan giri kha.

Subung githirao, gede, khasi, singhason ni sagang ha kham hi laisi khu hi dongba khe ang nu ba. Odehe laisi bajab gibin, hayu ni laisi bajab khebo khu ba. Subung githirao laisi bajab buthu ha khusi dang ba lai ning bonsi ni balam ha bisar khlaijao kha.

Sagor de boni bising ha subung githi dongyarao khebo haiger kha. Thihyaba ode subung githi ni noleibo, subung githi dengyaba buthu khebo bonsi haiger hi, khusi dangba lai ning bonsi bisar khlaijao kha.
Odehe, thihyaba jang subung githi ni nolei khe bonsi wai ni kharnai ha dang sing ba. Ebo wai ni kharnai de thih maginyaba se.
Sere hayu ni laisi bajap ha bumu giri bokhe wai ni kharnai ha bonsi dang sing ba.
Boha, nokhasao gadain ar phirthi gadain khe ang nu ba; odehe sagang ni nokhasao ar sagang ni phirthi jamlang la kha, ode sagor bo giri kha.
Odehe nogor gathar Jerusalem gadain, damanjik basai la mani majang sisi sal khlai blai hi dongba lai ning Madai niha sorgo ni phrang akhai phaiba khe ang nu ba.

Singhason ni phrang khurang bol jang jirik khao hi edehe thiba khe ang khna ba: Khna lah, Madai ni noh de subung ni bising ha dong pha nang. Bonsi de jar ni subung buthu ja nang, odehe Madai bonsi jang dongpha nang, bonsi ni Madaibo bo ja ma se.

Bonsi ni muthai ni phrang khrip mudi buthu khebo rusa ri nang, bonsi thih phin nang niya kha. Khah baima ja thing, grayaba ja thing ode gilim gasabo japhin nang niya kha. Jinis gajam buthu de jam lang la kha, thi hi bo sainthi phai ba.
Singhason ha khamyaba ning, Nai lah, khrip jinis khe ang gadain slam kha dou! bo odehe thi ba. Reb lah, ebo grao buthu de lonma ni grao gibiyaba se, bo odehe thiphin ba.
Odehe ani ha thi ba, Ebo grao buthu phura ja kha. Ang Alpha ar Omega, ang ning khitha jang buju se. Dih gang jaoyarao si dih ling mani hayu ni dikhor ni phrang ang magna dih ri ma se.
Bokhe deyaba si de ebo jinis buthu khe don phantha mai nang, boni Madai ang ja nang, bonsibo ani basa ja ma se.
Khinba raoyaba subung, rege regeyaba, sthaibaiyaba, montro ringyaba, saokhuli khe biyaba, khrip mosol jang thokhibaiyaba ni phantha de waithai ha khamyaba wai ni kharnai se.

Odehe bokhoh masni, saja yaohonthao ni masni buthu ha gablai si labuyaba sorgo ni degla sni ni bising ha saosi phai hi, aniha thi ba, Phai, Melmasa ni bisik, damanjik khe ninthane ang phnu nang, bo odehe thiphai ba.
Bese jang hading dedaothao judaothaoyaba ha bo ang khe sugu hi, sorgo ni Madai ni phrang akhai buyaba nogor gathar Jerusalem khe bo anthane phnu ri ba.
Nogor de Madai ni muima jang jnathar ba, boni jnayaba ni majangthai gabang ning muilo gnang, Jaspar longthai lai, krustal longthai lai se.
Boni khorong dedaothao ode judaothao se, derga gedeba majhi gin ja du, derga gedeba buthu ha Israel jadi jhigin ni bumu reb du.
Sainja gede derga gedeba matham, sain kharthi yaoda gede derga gedeba matham, sain kharthi yaosi gede derga gedeba matham, sain jroba gede derga gedeba matham dong.
Nogor ni khorongma asama ni longthai gaiyaba majhi gin boni ha dong, bo buthu ha Melmasa ni haijaoyasa jhigin buthu ni bumubo dong.
Bo ang jang sainlaiyaba sorgo ni degla ning nogor, derga gedeba ode boni khorongma buthu khe su mani khlai hi gajao ni goda di hi bo dong ba.
Nogor de grongbri ja du, bo laoba jang warba baosi se. Boni gajao ni goda jang nogor khe bonsi su ba. Laoba jakha de mel khonbri ja du, bo laoba warba juba baosi gaja se.
Bode boni khorongma khebo bonsi su hi, subung suyaba khe yaowai hi, sorgo ni degla ning su ba, muh jang rjasi bisagin mubri lai ju du.
Khorongma de jaspar longthai jang dangyaba se, nogor derphnai lai ragao du, gajao gathar jang slamyaba se.

Nogor ni khorongma longthai gaiyaba buthu muilo gnang longthai khrip jadi jang majang riyaba se, bonsi asa ni longthai sagangthao gaiyaba Jaspar longthai se, bo maginyaba sapphir longthai se, bo mathamyaba kalkedon longthai se, bo mabriyaba samaragdin longthai se,

bo mabowayaba de sardonuk thiyaba longthai se, bo madohyaba de kornelian longthai se, bo masniyaba de kruso longthai se, bo majaiyaba de berul longthai se, bo masguyaba de topaz longthai se, majhiyaba de krusopras longthai se, bo majhisehyaba de jasinth longthai se, bo majhiginyaba de amethus longthai se.

Derga gedeba majhigin buthu de sugayung longthai jang slamyaba se, derga gedeba maphrong masi masi khlai hi slam ba. Odehe bo nogor ni daoglap de gajao buphangma musi gibringyayaba derphnai lai ragao du.
Bo nogor hade bikhoh musi ang nuya, Gabra Madai raothai gnang ode Melmasa bonsi ni bikhoh se bani.
Bo nogor khe jna ri mani khlai hi sain jang dainbo nangya, Gabra ni muima jang bokhe jnapha ri bani, Melmasa de boni thaophari se.
Boni jnama jang khrip jadi daobai nang, ode phirthi ni rajarao bonsi ni muima jang bonsi labu ma se.
Sain ha boni derga gedeba buthu nalaibo phrao nang niya, horbo ja nang niya.
Odehe, jadi buthu bonsi ni muima ode bakhan buthu jang baosi bonsi labu ma se.

Thikhabo, jinis gusu musibo hap phu nang niya, khusi rege rege dangyarao ar mosol grao joyarao ode thokhi baiyaraobo hap phu nang niya, Melmasa ni hayu ni laisi bajap ha bumu rebjaoyarao se ning hap phu ma.
Odehe, sorgo ni degla, hayu ni dilam riyenyaba dikhong, krustal longthai lai musibo gibringyayaba, Madai jang Melmasa ni singhason ni phrang baigo hi riyenyaba khe bo a ne phnu ri ba,

bo dikhong de nogor ni khorong daoglap gejer gejer ha ning su phla phai ba. Dikhong ni ejang nar hayu ni bongphang, jadi gibin gibin bathai thai jhigin, dain phorong thaiyaba dong ba; bo bongphang balai buthu khrip jadi ni hamthai se.
Oraha musibo sarithai dong nang niya kha.
Bo nogor ni bising ha Madai jang Melmasa ni singhason hase bo donghi ma, ode boni dangyasarao boni khusi khe bonsi dang nang,
boni mukhang khe nu hi ning dong nang, bonsi ni bathain habo boni bumu khe reb ma se.
Hor ja nang niya kha; thaophari ni jnama ode sain dungyababo dong nang niya kha, Gabra Madai ning bonsi khe naiso lama se, odehe bonsi jug jug Raja jahi dongla ma se.

Sorgo ni degla ning ani ha thi ba, “Ebo grao buthu lonma ni dong, ar grao bo gibi se, Gabra ni gorasalirao ni bese Madai ning thi du, srap sophai ginyaba jinis buthu khe jar ni dangyasarao ne phnu ri mani khlai hi bo sorgo ni deglarao khe haiha ba se.”
Khna lah! ang sangga ning phai ma ja kha. Ebo laisi bajap ha sainthi dayaba grao buthu khe maniyarao ni khophal hambi! thi hi bo a ne sainthi phai ba.

Ang Johan ning ebo jinis buthu khe nuyaba ar khnayaba se. Odehe, ebo jinis buthu khe ang khna ba ode ang nuba jang, a ne phnu riyaba sorgo ni degla ni igah rogong ha khlim mani khlai hi ang blip pha ba;

thikhabo, bo angkhe thi ba, Olei da khlai, ang de ning jang baosi dangyasa, nini daphlung gorasalirao odehe ebo laisi bajap ni grao buthu khe maniyarao dangyasa saosi se. Madai khe se khlim lah, bo odehe ang khe thi ba.
Odehe, ani ha thi ba, “Ebo laisi bajap ha sainthi dayaba grao buthu khe hui dada da deng, bo bubli duha sophai ma ja kha.

Phap khusi dangyaba phap khusi dang hi ning dong la thing, subung regeyaba rege hi ning dong la thing, subung dormo gibi jang ning dongpha lang la thing, subung gathar gathar ja hi ning dong la thing, thi hi bo sainthi ba.
“Khna lah, ang sangga ning phai ma ja kha, khrip subung jar jar khusi dangba lai ning ri mani khlai hi ani yaosandi ani ha dong.
Ang ning Alpha ar Omega, bo sagangthao ar yaohonthao, khitha ar buju se.”
Hayu ni bongphang basao ha bonsi hukhum yaowai phu mani ode, derga ha nogor hap phu mani khlai hi bonsi ni gainsari ragao sisi suyarao ni khophal hambi.
Hakhli hade sisa buthu, montro ringyarao, sthaibaiyarao, saokhuli khe biyarao, mosol khe haryaba subung, thokhi baiyarao de dong ma se.”
Ang Jisu ning, ebo grao khe longjomrao ne khna ri mani khlai hi, ani sorgo ni deglarao khe ang haiha du. David ni buphangma ode boni greng, ang phorong ni sathrai jnadao thaoyaba se.
Bese jang damanjik thi du, Phai!
Khrip khnayaba buthu Phai! thi la thing.
Dih gangyaba si de phai la thing; bo nangjaoyaba si de hayu ni dih khe magna ling la thing.
Ebo laisi bajap ha sainthi dayaba khe khnayaba si de mithi pha ri du, asababo ebo grao buthu khe bara ri khade, laisi bajap ha saja reb hi dongyaba buthu khe boni basao ha Madai ning bara ri ma se.
Sere ebo laisi bajap ha sainthi dayaba grao buthu ni phrang khma kha de, ebo laisi bajap ha rebyaba nogor gathar jang hayu bongphang ni phantha khe Madaibo bokhe khaikho ma se.
Ebo jinis mithi riyaba ning, Jadu, ang sangga ning phai ma se, bo odehe thi ba.
Amen. Phai la ga, Gabra Jisu.
Gabra Jisu ni khasaoma boni subung gatharrao jang dong thing. Amen.
